eng: In the end did I punish those who rejected Faith and how terrible was My rejection of them!
nupe: Gancin Mi cia za nanzhi ajin kafirinci nan wan ngba ke nangban yan etan winwan yan Soko yi nao

eng: Seest thou not that Allah sends down rain from the sky With it We then bring out produce of various colours And in the mountains are tracts white and red of various shades of colour and black intense in hue
nupe: Ye le yea kendoe Sokoe du ele be dagan sanmao naa Yi cia yangici sun-sunzhi laatinya be ele iri yan sun-sunzhi ma yi kakayin U ma ke jin dan mini patizhio ekohi nanzhiy yi bokun to dzuruzhiy nan atso ma yi iri kakayin ganni be ndocizhi nanzhi shizhiko sarauyin nan

eng: And so amongst men and crawling creatures and cattle are they of various colours Those truly fear Allah among His Servants who have knowledge for Allah is Exalted in Might Oft-Forgiving
nupe: To mini yan zawangizhio to dabbazhio to dabba yan emanwozhi atsozhi yi iri kakaayin acinga ayi baeni bo Akika Manzhi gbaugi gae sundan Soko mini wuzhiuzhi bo Akika Soko Etsu zankpe uyio Etsu gafara

eng: Those who rehearse the Book of Allah establish regular Prayer and spend in Charity out of what We have provided for them secretly and openly hope for a commerce that will never fail
nupe: Akika za nanzhi egba litafi Soko nan ama sallah kugikini nan a mae wu dukiyazhi nan Yi la yaa nan fi eko wangizhio to swiswoci to gangbao nan akika za wuncinzhi e cewo nan a zunyaanan

eng: For He will pay them their meed nay He will give them even more out of His Bounty for He is Oft-Forgiving Most Ready to appreciate service
nupe: Ebo acino Soko ga ladazhi shekpan yaa u maa kezhe bea mini falalauzhio Akika Soko Etsu gafara uyio Etsu yebo jin

eng: That which We have revealed to thee of the Book is the Truth- confirming what was revealed before it for Allah is assuredly- with respect to His Servants - well acquainted and Fully Observant
nupe: Litafi nan tso Yi jin wahayi u be ya wyo nan wun ga yi gaskiyao U maa gaskiya ya be nanzhi be shiudzo nan Akika Soko yi be kpikpe u mae le yannan wuzhiuzhi danyn-ninbo nan ye

eng: Then We have given the Book for inheritance to such of Our Servants as We have chosen but there are among them some who wrong their own souls some who follow a middle course and some who are by Allah´s leave foremost in good deeds that is the highest Grace
nupe: Ganci yi cia Litafi laa gi gun ya eza tsitsacizhi mini wuzhi yi zhio ade miniabo nanejin ti tacinu gun nan ama de nanzhi yi eza tacingizhi nan ama de nanzhi a shidzo be etu alhairizhi be yarda Sokoe nan Wuncin ga yi daraja nantso wancin nao

eng: Gardens of Eternity will they enter therein will they be adorned with bracelets of gold and pearls and their garments there will be of silk
nupe: Wato aljannazhi nan aga jin dawwama fi nan aga ganfi bo a ci ga pa nin fi bo be gadozhi nana jin be zinariyae to aluluyinan tufuwazhi ma mini aljannao u gayi ede yan alharirio siliki

eng: And they will say Praise be to Allah Who has removed from us all sorrow for our Lord is indeed Oft-Forgiving Ready to appreciate service
nupe: Aci gan Yebo kpata ajin tabbata ya Soko nana yangban-yin lakeyabo ya yi nan Akika Tsoci yi Etsu gafara uyio Etsu yebo jin

eng: Who has out of His Bounty settled us in a Home that will last no toil nor sense of weariness shall touch us therein
nupe: Etsu nana yi cin fi emi yan danbo dano mini falalau bo nan yia le wahala ndondo ye miniu boa yi maawo ebo ndondo miniu boa

eng: But those who reject Allah - for them will be the Fire of Hell No term shall be determined for them so they should die nor shall its Penalty be lightened for them Thus do We reward every ungrateful one!
nupe: Za nanzhiy maa a jin kafirinci be Sokoe nan egagba yan enan jahannama wunajin tabbata yaa a ga -- rayi beayin acia tsuaa maa jin sauki yan azaba yaa Acinga ga yi e ga kafiri ndondo gbao

eng: Therein will they cry aloud for assistance Our Lord! Bring us out we shall work righteousness not the deeds we used to do! - Did We not give you long enough life so that he that would should receive admonition and moreover the warner came to you So taste ye the fruits of your deeds for the wrong-doers there is no helper
nupe: A ma fe yi kabara fi miniu bo aafe gan gan Ya wyo Tsoci yi! A yi ku tinya Yi yaada lotun guru nantso jin iri nanzhi yi fe jin lea nan Aci ga ya ezhe gan A sa Yi ya ye rayi kpaloa nan a kunn nan za nan gasantu miniebo na ga santu naa Gangba jinci mabe eba ye E fe fin azaba azwalumizhi a de zandondo nan ajina taimako naa

eng: Verily Allah knows all the hidden things of the heavens and the earth verily He has full knowledge of all that is in men´s hearts
nupe: Akika Soko yi be kpikpe yan yannanzhi swo fi sanmazhio to kin bo nanAkika Soko yi be kpikpe yan yannanzhi swo fi yangbanzhio nan

eng: He it is That has made you inheritors in the earth if then any do reject Allah their rejection works against themselves their rejection but adds to the odium for the Unbelievers in the sight of their Lord their rejection but adds to their own undoing
nupe: Soko ga la ye cia fe halifazhi kpe kinbo Zaeni ndondo nan ga jin kafirinci nan egagba yan kafirincia wuyan yau Kafirinci yan kafirizhi man wuna bea yandondo eba Tsociaboa sai dai hallaka kafirinci yan kafirizhia bea yandondoa sai dai hasara

eng: Say Have ye seen these ´Partners´ of yours whom ye call upon besides Allah Show Me what it is they have created in the wide earth Or have they a share in the heavens Or have We given them a Book from which they can derive clear evidence- Nay the wrong-doers promise each other nothing but delusions
nupe: Gan gan Ye le yea za nanzhi ye la a pa mi baci nan ye cie jin bauta yaa ke Soko lugwa nan e lawu Mi yin kiy zhiy a jin halittau kpe eti kinbo kashi a pama ganni be Sokoe eba jin-jin yan sanmao kashi yi la Litafi ndoci la yaa kayin nantso a fe hujja yaa nan U jin acina akika azwalumizhi de a de yannanzhi e la jin dozhi alkawali naa sai dai eta

eng: It is Allah Who sustains the heavens and the earth lest they cease to function and if they should fail there is none - not one - can sustain them thereafter Verily He is Most Forbearing Oft-Forgiving
nupe: Akika Soko ga la egwa sun sanmazhi to kin aci dua yino akika a ma ga du-du zaeni ndondo la egwa sunu wo baci Soko boa Akika Soko Etsu hakuri uyio Etsu gaafara uyio

eng: They swore their strongest oaths by Allah that if a warner came to them they would follow his guidance better than any other of the Peoples But when a warner came to them it has only increased their flight from righteousness-

eng: On account of their arrogance in the land and their plotting of Evil but the plotting of Evil will hem in only the authors thereof Now are they but looking for the way the ancients were dealt with But no change wilt thou find in Allah´s way of dealing no turning off wilt thou find in Allah´s way of dealing

eng: Have patience at what they say and remember our servant David the man of strength for he ever turned to Allah
nupe: A hakuri eti iri egan nanzhiye e gan nan Wyo mao pa wuzhi yi Dawuda nan gboka nan akika eza uyio na ezhe keba alamari u kpata wuna ku ya Soko nan

eng: It was We that made the hills declare in unison with him Our Praises at eventide and at break of day
nupe: Akika Yia patizhi jin foro yau aajin afe -- mi tasbihi jin ya Soko to yeshi to Lazhin

eng: And the birds gathered in assemblies all with him did turn to Allah
nupe: To elugizhi nanzhi a kuyekan nan kpata ma afe ela mi tu forouzhi

eng: We strengthened his kingdom and gave him wisdom and sound judgment in speech and decision
nupe: Yi maamulkiu gboka yi ma twaurya be hikimae ganni be kpikpe yan hukunci bae tsakani za nazhi gae sunwun nan

eng: Has the Story of the Disputants reached thee Behold they climbed over the wall of the private chamber
nupe: Ngba labari yan za nazhiy sunwun-na be eba wyo yaani Ka mi na a gun lo masallacinan

eng: When they entered the presence of David and he was terrified of them they said Fear not we are two disputants one of whom has wronged the other Decide now between us with truth and treat us not with injustice but guide us to the even Path
nupe: Kami na a gandan eba Dawudao na dansuna cia wanu aci gan Ga sundan ma yiza guba nanan yie sunwun-sun zaenia za ba ci jin gun ebo acino a hukunci ba tsakani yibo be gaskiyae Wyo tso mao ga jin zwalunci ma mao wu yi ba yan eko gboro

eng: This man is my brother He has nine and ninety ewes and I have but one Yet he says ´commit her to my care´ and is moreover harsh to me in speech
nupe: Akika za nnan yegi mi yio u yi be nangizhi har shitsun din nini mima de nangi ninikete uci ganUu la ya mi-nkpa u ma mi kutso be egan wunciny

eng: David said He has undoubtedly wronged thee in demanding thy single ewe to be added to his flock of ewes truly many are the partners in business who wrong each other Not so do those who believe and work deeds of righteousness and how few are theyand David gathered that We had tried him he asked forgiveness of his Lord fell down bowing in prostration and turned to Allah in repentance
nupe: Dawuda ci gan Akika wuna wuna wyo jin gun na u gan wyo la nangi wyo yo be yan wun zhi na akika ekun dondo yan za nan zhie la dukiyazhi keba eti wo ceo nan e jin dozhi zwalunci jin sai de za nanzhiy ga imani jin acie lotun guru na eza degi ma u ga iri za wuncinzhi yio Kanga gancin Dawuda otso akpe ke yiu ma cin le nan u ci wa gafara yan Tsociu u ci nikin cici u ci fe jin ruku u cia alamariuzhi kpata laaya Soko

eng: So We forgave him this lapse he enjoyed indeed a Near Approach to Us and a beautiful place of Final Return
nupe: Yi cia fa beu yin be wun ciny Akika ma u de tsonba Yi u ma de ezhe keba wangi

eng: O David! We did indeed make thee a vicegerent on earth so judge thou between men in truth and justice Nor follow thou the lusts of thy heart for they will mislead thee from the Path of Allah for those who wander astray from the Path of Allah is a Penalty Grievous for that they forget the Day of Account
nupe: Ya wyoe Dawuda akika Yia wyo laafe halifa ta eti kin bo acino fe jin hukunci tsakani zazhio be gaskiyae ga kara lami tu etun yangban ma kacina uga wyo gbin ke eko Soko lugwa nan egagba yan azaba na gboka na ga ajin tabbata yaa ebo efo egagba nan a batan nan

eng: Not without purpose did We create heaven and earth and all between! that were the thought of Unbelievers! but woe to the Unbelievers because of the Fire of Hell!
nupe: Yi ma jin sanma to kin to kin to yan nanzhi fi tacinabo nan eti kperea wuncin ga yi yekpa yan kafirinzhio azaba yan enan wunaji tabbata ya kafirizhi

eng: Shall We treat those who believe and work deeds of righteousness the same as those who do mischief on earth Shall We treat those who guard against evil the same as those who turn aside from the right
nupe: Kashi Yi ga za nanzhi a imani jin acie lotun nan laazhe kpe eti kinbo nan Kashi yi ga za na zhie tswa Soko nan laazhe ye ni be eza banzazhiy

eng: Here is a Book which We have sent down unto thee full of blessings that they may mediate on its Signs and that men of understanding may receive admonition
nupe: Litafi u yio na yi be albarkae nan Yi cinu cin be ya wye ebo a fea kpaye eti a yauzhio u mau laufe sinsantun u ya zanazhi yi be hankaliy nan

eng: To David We gave Solomon for a son- How excellent in Our service! Ever did he turn to Us!
nupe: Yi ma la ryatwa yan egi Sulaimanu ya Dawuda Madalla be wuzhi nanae lo eba Sokonan

eng: Behold there were brought before him at eventide coursers of the highest breeding and swift of foot
nupe: Ka-mi na a ta dabbazhi zhi safuo yau aci gi gbaro be lozuny nan

eng: And he said Truly do I love the love of good with a view to the glory of my Lord- until the sun was hidden in the veil of night
nupe: U ci gan Akika mi wa gan min lo etun alheri ndoci u cia tamba ce ta mi ke sallah Laasar lugwa har sai nan igidia swo dan yekanubo nan

eng: Bring them back to me then began he to pass his hand over their legs and their necks
nupe: Uci gan E kuazhin be tsun mi u ci fe kaa yan be ebiy biciazhio to koroazhio

eng: And We did try Solomon We placed on his throne a body without life but he did turn to Us in true devotion
nupe: Akika Yia Sulaimanu mancin le Yi cia nankan kpace ndoci yan eza tsutsuci ceta eti esaubo Uci kezhe da ba Soko be jin-jin ibadae

eng: He said O my Lord! Forgive me and grant me a kingdom which it may be suits not another after me for Thou art the Grantor of Bounties without measure
nupe: U ci gan Tsoci fa be mi yin Wyo mao twami rya be mulki nan Zandondoade iriu zunma mi boa nan Akika Wyo ga yi Etsu ryatwao

eng: Then We subjected the wind to his power to flow gently to his order Whithersoever he willed-
nupe: Yi cia efe jin foro yau u cie dazan be umurniu yin karayin lo bandondo nan uga eye wu nan

eng: As also the evil ones including every kind of builder and diver-
nupe: To shaitanzhi nanzhie tu eba iri ndondo nan zhi e gbin nuwan nan

eng: As also others bound together in fetters
nupe: To ndocizhi a pa fi mini kuruzhio

eng: Such are Our Bounties whether thou bestow them on others or withhold them no account will be asked
nupe: Nan na kpata eryatwa yi uyio nan de lisafia nan Wuna bao wyo tso la twarya ko ma wyo a yano sun gwa

eng: And he enjoyed indeed a Near Approach to Us and a beautiful Place of Final ReturnAkika ma u de tsonba yi ganni be ezhe keba wangiy
Commemorate Our Servant Job Behold he cried to his Lord The Evil One has afflicted me with distress and suffering!
nupe: Wyo mao pa wuzhi yi Ayuba Kami na u fe yi Tsociu ye nan u ci gan A kika shaitan yana egwa la two mi gan ni be etane

eng: The command was given Strike with thy foot here is water wherein to wash cool and refreshing and water to drink
nupe: Aci ganu gan A kin gba be bici o yin Nuwan yeko nan ga tin-ya bo nan uu fu wyo mao fe o finu

eng: And We gave him back his people and doubled their number- as a Grace from Ourselves and a thing for commemoration for all who have Understanding
nupe: Yici twaurya be iyaliuzhiy be ndocizhi ganni bea yin Yegun u yio dagan eba Yi bo u ma yi sinsan tu ya za nanzhiy ga de han-kali nan

eng: And take in thy hand a little grass and strike therewith and break not thy oath Truly We found him full of patience and constancy How excellent in Our service! ever did he turn to Us!
nupe: A tsukun gwalagi nan yi be gwalagi shitsuny nan la sungwa wyo cio lao din iyali wye ebo wyo-bea Kuti nan wyozhi nan nyin ya ma Akika Yi tsun Ayuba tsun eza hakuri Madalla be wuzhi nan nae akika eza uyio nae dokun be ezheke lo eba Soko nan

eng: And commemorate Our Servants Abraham Isaac and Jacob possessors of Power and Vision
nupe: Wyo ma o pa wuzhi Yi Ibrahima to Ishaka to Yakubu Za nanzhiy gboka nan a yio a ma yi eza hankalizhi

eng: Verily We did choose them for a special purpose- proclaiming the Message of the Hereafter
nupe: Akika Yia tadzu be edzuta yan pipa yan efo zobae

eng: They were in Our sight truly of the company of the Elect and the Good
nupe: Akika ma eba yi bo a dan mini eza tsitsaci zhio a ma yi eza alhairi zhi

eng: And commemorate Isma´il Elisha and Zul-Kifl Each of them was of the Company of the Good
nupe: Wyo mao kezheo pa Ismaila to Alyasau to Zulkiflu kpataa dan mini eza alhairi zhio

eng: This is a Message of admonition and verily for the righteous is a beautiful Place of Final Return-
nupe: Nan na yetun wangizhi a yio akika ma za nazhie tswa Soko nan a yi be zoba wangiy

eng: Gardens of Eternity whose doors will ever be open to them
nupe: U ga yi Aljannazhi nan a fi tutunyin nan ekozhi kpata ma yi kpikpeci ebo a bo

eng: Therein will they recline at ease Therein can they call at pleasure for fruit in abundance and delicious drink
nupe: A gakpetso fi nin yanu bo a cia fe gan gan a la yangici mari-marizhi a bea ya a to yan nazhi a fin nan

eng: And beside them will be chaste women restraining their glances companions of equal age
nupe: A ma yi be ynzagi yezun nnizhiy nanzhie tswa ba cin le azhi ya ebaazhii kawanyin nan

eng: Such is the Promise made to you for the Day of Account!
nupe: Nan nan u ga yi yanna zhi a jin alkawali nao ebo efo ega gbao

eng: Truly such will be Our Bounty to you it will never fail-
nupe: Akika nan nan arziki Yi uyio nan ma azoa nan

eng: Yea such! but - for the wrong-doers will be an evil place of Final Return!-
nupe: Nan nan Yan egi mi aljannazhi dano nan Akika ma za nanzhie gbin iyaka Soko tu nan zoba dede ga ajin tabbata yaa

eng: Hell!- they will burn therein - an evil bed indeed to lie on!-
nupe: Enan yan jahannama nan a gan danu nan akika yantaci za nan nanzhi a bi ye

eng: Yea such! - then shall they taste it- a boiling fluid and a fluid dark murky intensely cold!-
nupe: Nan nan egagba uyio a fea fin nuwan yipa ganni be nuwan yan etin zhiy

eng: And other Penalties of a similar kind to match them!
nupe: To ndoci nan beu nan yi dozhinn a ma yi iri iri

eng: Here is a troop rushing headlong with you! No welcome for them! truly they shall burn in the Fire!
nupe: Acia gana gan Nan nanzhiotso jamaazhi a yio nanzhiafin enao ganni be yeyin nan Kafiri kozhi cia gan gan Yi fa yangban be bibea yina akika kpata enan bo a gan fio

eng: The followers shall cry to the misleaders Nay ye too! No welcome for you! It is ye who have brought this upon us! Now evil is this place to stay in!
nupe: Kafiri wawagizhi otso cia gan gan Aa to yetso Yi fa yangban be ye yina ngan ye ga tswa ekpa yan zoba dede nan nan ya yi yio akika dannan nan nan wuna bi ye

eng: They will say Our Lord! whoever brought this upon us- Add to him a double Penalty in the Fire!
nupe: Acia gan gan Tsoci yi Zandondo nan ga degwa dan egagba dede nan-nao nan beu azaba sarauyin dan mini enao

eng: And they will say What has happened to us that we see not men whom we used to number among the bad ones
nupe: Aci ke gan kiy la yi ci laa le bagi ndocizhi yea yino Ebo nan kami na yidan izheo nan yi fe leaye le ke eza dedezhi nan

eng: Did we treat them as such in ridicule or have our eyes failed to perceive them
nupe: Kashi yi fe laami laa Kashi eye yizhi tsa pan yao yi ci lea yea yino

eng: Truly that is just and fitting- the mutual recriminations of the People of the Fire!
nupe: Akika ewun-sun nan nan tsakani egimi nanzhio gaskiya uyio

eng: Say Truly am I a Warner no god is there but the one Allah Supreme and Irresistible-
nupe: Gan gan Mi de gangba jinci mi mi yio yandondo ma danbo naajin bauta ya be gaskiyae naa sai Soko nini ke te nan kagbou ta eti alittazhi kpatao nan

eng: The Lord of the heavens and the earth and all between- Exalted in Might able to enforce His Will forgiving again and again
nupe: Etsu nane kpa sanmazhi nan to kin to yan nanzhi fi taacina bo nan Etsu zankpe uyio Etsu gafara

eng: Say That is a Message Supreme above all-
nupe: Gan gan Wuncin labari uyio nan wancin nan

eng: From which ye do turn away!
nupe: Ye ma zunma zhe tau yecia pan keu lugwa

eng: Surah  No knowledge have I of the Chiefs on high when they discuss matters among themselves
nupe: Mide kpikpe ndondo eti malaika wancikozhi boa kami nan e gan gan elo bezhin be Tsociy naa

eng: ´Only this has been revealed to me that I am to give warning plainly and publicly
nupe: Umajin wahayi ndoci e jin be ya mi yina sai de mi de yi za naejin gangba naatula nan

eng: Behold thy Lord said to the angels
nupe: I am about to create man from clayKami nan Tsoci wye gan be malaikazhiy gan Akika Mie wa gan miajin alitta yan zawangi be eguny

eng: When I have fashioned him in due proportion and breathed into him of My spirit fall ye down in obeisance unto him
nupe: Kami nan Mi gau jin gunmi nan Micia efe yan ruhi Mi be fiu nan kpatae yaa ya zhi kinbo ye jin sujadae yau

eng: So the angels prostrated themselves all of them together
nupe: Malaikazhi kpata cida sujada yau

eng: Not so Iblis he was haughty and became one of those who reject Faith
nupe: Sai de Iblisu nana gbotika nan ucia fe dan mini kafiri zhio

eng: Allah said O Iblis! What prevents thee from prostrating thyself to one whom I have created with my hands Art thou haughty Or art thou one of the high and mighty ones
nupe: Soko cigan Kiy kan wye sujada jin ya alitta nan Mi jin be egwa Mi yin nao Wyo gbotika gbo kashi wyoa fe dan mini za nanzhie wo tia san nao

eng: Iblis said I am better than he thou createdst me from fire and him thou createdst from clay
nupe: Uci gan Ngan mi ganu ebo nan ena wyoajin mi yino egun ma wyoa jin wun yino

eng: Allah said Then get thee out from here for thou art rejected accursed
nupe: Soko cigan adzun tinya dagan mini Aljannao akika wyoa fe eza cice yaci

eng: And My curse shall be on thee till the Day of Judgment
nupe: Laana Mi ma ta etiobo har da fo nan aga alkiyami nan-na

eng: Iblis said O my Lord! Give me then respite till the Day the dead are raisedUci gan Tsoci pata ya mi har da fo nan agaa naakin nan
Allah said Respite then is granted thee-
nupe: Soko ci gan Akika wyo dan mini za nan mia pata ya nan

eng: Till the Day of the Time Appointed
nupe: Har da efo yan lokaci nan yi be iyakae nan

eng: Till the Day of the Time Appointed
nupe: Har da efo yan lokaci nan yi be iyakae nan

eng: Iblis said Then by Thy power I will put them all in the wrong-
nupe: Uci gan Mi zhi kuti be zankpeo yin akika mi gaa gbin bae nio

eng: Except Thy Servants amongst them sincere and purified by Thy Grace
nupe: Sai de wuzhi wyozhi nanzhiy wyo ga yangbanazhi tadzu nan

eng: Allah said Then it is just and fitting- and I say what is just and fitting-
nupe: Soko gan Akika yan gaskiya be gaskiya tsabae u ga Mie gan ya ye yeo

eng: That I will certainly fill Hell with thee and those that follow thee- every one
nupe: WALLAHI Mi ga jahannama she pin yin be wyo yin to za nanzhi ga emi tuo nan-baenio

eng: Say No reward do I ask of you for this Qur´an nor am I a pretendermGan yagan Mi wa lada ndondo be ye yina eti etun nan mie lo nan boa mi ma la kpaka ndondo ta ye yea
This is no less than a Message to all the Worlds
nupe: Wun de fea sai sinsantu ya alitazhi kpaata

eng: This is no less than a Message to all the Worlds
nupe: Wun de fea sai sinsantu ya alitazhi kpaata

eng: And ye shall certainly know the truth of it all after a while
nupe: WALLAHI Ma yea be kpe gaskiya laabari nae yae na zunma lokaci ndocio

eng: The revelation of this Book is from Allah the Exalted in Power full of Wisdom
nupe: Cin cin yan Litafi nnan dagan eba Soko bo nan yi Etsu zankpe nan u ma yi Etsu hikima nan

eng: Verily it is We Who have revealed the Book to thee in Truth so serve Allah offering Him sincere devotion
nupe: Akika Yi cin Litafi cin be ya wye be gaskiyae ebo acino fe jin bauta ya Soko wyo mao la adinio tadzuo yau

eng: Is it not to Allah that sincere devotion is due But those who take for protectors other than Allah say We only serve them in order that they may bring us nearer to Allah Truly Allah will judge between them in that wherein they differ But Allah guides not such as are false and ungrateful
nupe: Akika adini natso ga tadzu nan u ga yi yan Soko za nanzhiy ma a gwasun kuti ndocizhi ke Soko lugwa nan ajin afe gan gan Yi yejin bauta jin ya kutizhi ebo a la yi yaa tsoaba Soko Akika Soko ga hukunci ba tsakaniabo eti yannazhi e la ce dozhi leba eti ubo nan Akika Sokoe la kafiri ndondo nan yi ganmanan zunci nan ke ekoa

eng: Had Allah wished to take to Himself a son He could have chosen whom He pleased out of those whom He doth create but Glory be to Him! He is above such things He is Allah the One the Irresistible
nupe: Wunaba Soko ba gan wuna degi da wuna tsa za nan ga bau nan mini alittauzhio Lili kpata ajin tabbata yau akika wun ga yi Soko Etsu nini kete nan a ce alittazhi kpata kagbo nan

eng: He created the heavens and the earth in true proportions He makes the Night overlap the Day and the Day overlap the Night He has subjected the sun and the moon to His law Each one follows a course for a time appointed Is not He the Exalted in Power - He Who forgives again and again
nupe: Wuna alitta yan sanmazhi to kin jin be gaskiyae wyune la yeshi fan a la kpe igidi umae la igidi fan kpe yeshio Uma igidi to etswa jin foro ya ye ndondoa eda zan har da iyaka ndoci nan a ba yau nan Akika Soko Etsu zankpe uyio Etsu gafara

eng: He created you all from a single person then created of like nature his mate and he sent down for you eight head of cattle in pairs He makes you in the wombs of your mothers in stages one after another in three veils of darkness such is Allah your Lord and Cherisher to Him belongs all dominion There is no god but He then how are ye turned away from your true Centre
nupe: Wuna alitta ye jin dagan rayi ninio uga yi Annabi Adamuo Uci kezhea yinmiu jin dagan miniu bo u ma kezhe jin alitta ya ye mini dabba niimazhio har iri gutwota U cia alitta ye jin shiri dan mini Gbako nnan yezhio Alitta yezhi ma yi ekpo ekpo dan mini bazhiko gutao Soko ye ga dano nao wun ga yi Tsoci ye yeo wunga wun mulki kpatao a de Etsu ndocia sai winy Kiy be la acie la ye pan ke eko lugwao

eng: If ye reject Allah Truly Allah hath no need of you but He liketh not ingratitude from His servants if ye are grateful He is pleased with you No bearer of burdens can bear the burden of another In the end to your Lord is your Return when He will tell you the truth of all that ye did in this life for He knoweth well all that is in men´s hearts
nupe: Ye gaajin kafirinci akika Soko Etsu kunkunke uyio U ma jin yeda be kafirinci yan wuzhiuzhi yina Ye ma ga jin yebo yau wuna jin yeda be wunciny ya ye Ama de zandondo naa la kara lefi yan zandoci naa Gancin eba Tsoci ye ga yea zheban lo uma ya ye labari yan etun nanzhi ye lo nan akika Soko de kpikpe yan yannazhi fi yangban zawangizhio nan

eng: If ye reject Allah Truly Allah hath no need of you but He liketh not ingratitude from His servants if ye are grateful He is pleased with you No bearer of burdens can bear the burden of another In the end to your Lord is your Return when He will tell you the truth of all that ye did in this life for He knoweth well all that is in men´s hearts
nupe: Ye gaajin kafirinci akika Soko Etsu kunkunke uyio U ma jin yeda be kafirinci yan wuzhiuzhi yina Ye ma ga jin yebo yau wuna jin yeda be wunciny ya ye Ama de zandondo naa la kara lefi yan zandoci naa Gancin eba Tsoci ye ga yea zheban lo uma ya ye labari yan etun nanzhi ye lo nan akika Soko de kpikpe yan yannazhi fi yangban zawangizhio nan

eng: When some trouble toucheth man he crieth unto his Lord turning to Him in repentance but when He bestoweth a favour upon him as from Himself man doth forget what he cried and prayed for before and he doth set up rivals unto Allah thus misleading others from Allah´s Path Say Enjoy thy blasphemy for a little while verily thou art one of the Companions of the Fire!
nupe: Kaminan egun ndoci ga to zana wuna fe yi Tsociu ye uci ga kezhe da ebau Gancin u ga niima la yau dagan nko wuntso zawangia aduwa nan ufe jin lo eba Soko shidzo batsozhio nan batan Ucia fe la yandocizhi a pa Soko baci ebo ula zawangizhiukuufi egbino Gan gan Fe woma degi be kafincio yin akika wyo dan mini egi-mi nan zhio

eng: Is one who worships devoutly during the hour of the night prostrating himself or standing in adoration who takes heed of the Hereafter and who places his hope in the Mercy of his Lord - like one who does not Say Are those equal those who know and those who do not know It is those who are endued with understanding that receive admonition
nupe: Ngba za nana ku gikini be ibadajiny dan lokaci yeshio na u cie jin sujada ucie ke nankin gi gbarona wine sundan efo zoba u mae kezhe jin kauna yan yegun Tsoci nan Ngba u ga zhe ye ni be zanan wine jin nnazhia nae Gan gan Ngba za nanzhi-yi be kpikpe nan a ga zhe nini be zananzhiy a de kpikpea nan Akika za nanzhi ga de ankali nan a gae kpayeo

eng: Say O ye my servants who believe! Fear your Lord good is the reward for those who do good in this world Spacious is Allah´s earth! those who patiently persevere will truly receive a reward without measure!
nupe: Gan gan ya ye wuzhi Mizhi nanzhia imani jin nan a fe tswa Tsoci ye re Za nanzhi ga lotun wangi izhe nnaona ade egagba wangi Kin yan Soko ma u -- sarauyin Akika zan nanzhi gaejin hakuri nan Soko a gaagba egagba nan de lisafia nan

eng: Say Verily I am commanded to serve Allah with sincere devotion
nupe: Gan gan Akika a jin mi foro kede miinji bawanya Soko gbaugi nan Mi mannla edzuta-nla-ndan jin-jin yan adinio ebouboSurah And I am commanded to be the first of those who bow to Allah in IslamAma jin mi foro gan min lanfe-ndan mini za nanzhi yi kakanca eba kpatsun ta ya Soko nao

eng: Say I would if I disobeyed my Lord indeed have fear of the Penalty of a Mighty Day
nupe: Gan gan Akika mie sundan yan lenba yan Tsoci mi ebo azaba yan efo nan wancin naoSurah Say It is Allah I serve with my sincere and exclusive devotionGan gan Soko gbaugi ga mie jin bauta yao Mimae la adini mi tadzu yau

eng: Serve ye what ye will besides him Say Truly those in loss are those who lose their own souls and their People on the Day of Judgment Ah! that is indeed the real and evident Loss!
nupe: Efe jin bauta yan nan ga bae nan ke Soko lugwa Gan gan Akika za nanzhi yi eza asarazhi nan a ga yi za nanzhi ga ajin asara yan etitacina to yan iyaliazhi efo alkiyamiy nao Akika wuncin ga yi a sara nantso a tula nao

eng: They shall have Layers of Fire above them and Layers of Fire below them with this doth Allah warn off his servants O My Servants! then fear ye Me!
nupe: A yi be rufazhiy dagan mini enao fitiabo yantaci yan enan maakezhe dan takoabo Nannan ga Soko e la li wuzhiuzhi dano Ya ye wuzhi Mizhi efe tswa Mi re

eng: Those who eschew Evil- and fall not into its worship- and turn to Allah in repentance- for them is Good News so announce the Good News to My Servants-
nupe: Zananzhiy ma a kpeya be bauta jin ya kutizhi nan a ci kezhea egwasun bauta Soko nan yangban fa wunajin tabbata yaa dan Aljannao fe ya wuzhi Mizhi labari yan yangban fa

eng: Those who listen to the Word and follow the best meaning in it those are the ones whom Allah has guided and those are the ones endued with understanding
nupe: Za nanzhi e shitukpa ya egan nan acie lamitu bolobolou nan za wuncinzhi ga Soko wu bao a ga mayi eza ankalizhio

eng: Is then one against whom the decree of Punishment is justly due equal to one who eschews Evil Wouldst thou then deliver one who is in the Fire
nupe: Ngba zanan kalma azaba wunajin tabbata ta eti ubo nan Wyo la za wuncin ke eko wo Kashi za nan gaa lo gun enao nan wyo wau tinya wo

eng: But it is for those who fear their Lord That lofty mansions one above another have been built beneath them flow rivers of delight such is the Promise of Allah never doth Allah fail in His promise
nupe: Ammade Za nanzhi gae sundan Sokonan a yi be katazhiy kpe fitia bo ganni be kata ndocizhi nanzhi yi tutuci nan nuwan zhi afe je fi takoshinabo na Nannan alkawali ko uyio Soko mae le alkawali baa

eng: Seest thou not that Allah sends down rain from the sky and leads it through springs in the earth Then He causes to grow therewith produce of various colours then it withers thou wilt see it grow yellow then He makes it dry up and crumble away Truly in this is a Message of remembrance to men of understanding
nupe: Ye leye gan Soko gae dule zhin dagan sanma boa Uciu laagan dan mini eye nuwan zhio nanzhiy fi kinbo naa Gancin U cie la yangici sun-sunzhi tinya iri irizhi Gancin U ci gaa wo uci gazhe dzukan dzukan Gancin uci gaa zun-ya Akika mini wuncino ayazhi danbo ya zanazhiy ga de ankali nan

eng: Is one whose heart Allah has opened to Islam so that he has received Enlightenment from Allah no better than one hard-hearted Woe to those whose hearts are hardened against celebrating the praises of Allah! they are manifestly wandering in error!

eng: Allah has revealed from time to time the most beautiful Message in the form of a Book consistent with itself yet repeating its teaching in various aspects the skins of those who fear their Lord tremble thereat then their skins and their hearts do soften to the celebration of Allah´s praises Such is the guidance of Allah He guides therewith whom He pleases but such as Allah leaves to stray can have none to guide
nupe: Sokoa egan nan gye gan egan kpata nan cin be Litafi Alkuranu nan be dozhi nan u ma yi be fuska gubae gangba be labari yangbanfae Epa nankan kpace yan zanazhie sundan Soko nan wunajin ufe zhe dozhi be gbigbau yin epazhi mae la fu yeko yangbanazhi maashe be pipa Sokoe Wuncin bawu Soko Uyio za nan ma ga bau nan wune lau wuba be Alkuranuy Akika zaeni ndondo nan Soko gau gbin nan aa de zando naawuu ba wo be naa

eng: Is then one who has to fear the brunt of the Penalty on the Day of Judgment and receive it on his face like one guarded therefrom It will be said to the wrong-doers Taste ye the fruits of what ye earned!
nupe: Ngba za nae tswa eti tacinu be azaba dede yan alkiyamiy nan u ga zhe yeni be za nae tswaa nae A cia gan be azwalumi zhiy gan Efe fin azaba yan etun dede nanzhi yetso lo nan

nupe: Za nanzhiy shiadzo nan atsoa egan Soko yi ganmanan azaba ci fe be ya dagan ba nanzhi a kpa ye tua nan

nupe: Soko ci jina azaba yan zunyesun dan mini izheo gancin azaba yan efo alkiyami u gbota gan a ga kpe nan

nupe: Akika Yi la misalizhi dokun be ya zawangizhi fi mini Alkuranu nan nao eti alamari ndondo ebo ade baa laa sanatu

nupe: Alkuranu nan yi azhimi Larubawazhi nan U ma de kinkan ndondoa ebo a fea tswa Soko

eng: Allah puts forth a Parable a man belonging to many partners at variance with each other and a man belonging entirely to one master are those two equal in comparison Praise be to Allah! but most of them have no knowledge
nupe: Soko la misali be nyan eza bagi ndoci wuzhi nan yi be ndakatazhiy dokun nae nanzhiy ma e dinu be dozhiy nan eti etun nan a danu nan be bagi ndoci wuzhi nan Ndakata nini ke te gau deo nan ngba za gubawuzhi nan nanzhiy gaazhe yeni eba misalio Akika yebo kpata ajin tabbata ya Soko Akika ekun dondoazhi ade kpikpea

eng: Truly thou wilt die one day and truly they too will die one day
nupe: Akika wye za nan gaatsu nan wyo yio to atso ma gatsu ma

eng: In the end will ye all on the Day of Judgment settle your disputes in the presence of your Lord
nupe: Gancin be akika efo alkiyamiy yeazhi yegboro Tsoci yebo ye cia fe jin husuma

eng: Who then doth more wrong than one who utters a lie concerning Allah and rejects the Truth when it comes to him is there not in Hell an abode for blasphemers
nupe: Ngba ziy zwalunciu gaagan yan za nan zunwan ta Soko nao u ci kezhe a gaskiya yi ganmanan kaminan ube ebau nao Asa emi leciu danbo ya kafirizhi dan mini enan jahannama boa Akika u danbo

eng: And he who brings the Truth and he who confirms and supports it - such are the men who do right

nupe: Egagba alheri yan yandondo nan agae wa nan wunajin Tbbata yaa dan eba Tsociabo Wuncin ga yi egagba yan za nanzhie jin bolobolo nao

nupe: Ngba Soko kunke ya wuzhiu woa Acie li wyo dan be za ndocizhi nanzhi jin Soko a nan Akika za nan Soko gau gbin nan a de za nan awuu ba naa

nupe: Zaeni ndondo nan Soko gau wuba nan a de za naa gbinu wo be naa Asa u-jin Soko gayi Etsu zankpea Etsu nae wan za cie jinu azaba naa

In Him trust those who put their trust
nupe: Wallahi wyo ga gbina gan gan Zii jin sanma to kin zhio Akika agan gan Soko Gan yaa gan Ngba za nanzhi ye jin bauta ya ke Soko lugwa nan Soko gaa kpa gan wuna mami cin le be egun ndociy ngba ajin cigbe egun wunci wo Kashi U ga bau gan wuna twarya ye gunu ya mi a kanu wo Gan gan Soko kunke ya mi Soko ga Muminizhie ya kpeo

eng: Say O my People! Do whatever ye can I will do my part but soon will ye know-
nupe: Gan gan Ya ye jamaa yan mizhi ya eye dan etunezhi bananzhiy ye ga dan nan Akika Mi tsoe lo tun bele yin man yea be de kpikpe

eng: Who it is to whom comes a Penalty of ignominy and on whom descends a Penalty that abides
nupe: Za nan azaba yan zunyesun gaa be yau nan be za nan azaba yan tutun yin gaacin ta etiu bo nan

eng: Verily We have revealed the Book to thee in Truth for instructing mankind He then that receives guidance benefits his own soul but he that strays injures his own soul Nor art thou set over them to dispose of their affairs
nupe: Akika Yi cin Litafi be ya wye be gaskiyae ya zawangizhi ebo acino za nan gaake eko nan wuncin yi ebo tiu bo za nan ma gaa gbin nan u gbin gbin ya etiu akika a tun wye gan wyo feo tswaaozaa

eng: It is Allah that takes the souls of men at death and those that die not He takes during their sleep those on whom He has passed the decree of death He keeps back from returning to life but the rest He sends to their bodies for a term appointed verily in this are Signs for those who reflect
nupe: Soko gae gwo rayizhi dan eka yan tsutsuabo to nanzhiy ma latsua nan Lokaci nan a gae lele nao U ci ga egwasun nanzhiy u ga tsutsu ka ta etiabo nan Uci ga nanke nanzhiy lugwa da ekandoci nan yibe iyakae nan Akika mini wuncino ayazhi danbo ya zanazhi gae kpaye nan

eng: What! Do they take for intercessors others besides Allah Say Even if they have no power whatever and no intelligence
nupe: Kashi ade zandocizhi de nanzhi a tangwaa nan Gan gan Ngan kutizhi a de mulki yandondoa a ma de to ankalia

nupe: Gan gan Egwa tan kpata Soko wuno Soko ga wun mulki yan sanmazhi to kin yino Gancin ma ebau ga yea kezhe lo

eng: When Allah the One and Only is mentioned the hearts of those who believe not in the Hereafter are filled with disgust and horror but when gods other than He are mentioned behold they are filled with joy!

eng: Say O Allah! Creator of the heavens and the earth! Knower of all that is hidden and open! it is Thou that wilt judge between Thy Servants in those matters about which they have differed
nupe: Gan gan Ya wye Soko nan jin sanmazhi to kin nan Etsu nan wun kpikpe yan naaswo nan to nan tula nan Akika wyo gaa jin hukunci tsakani wuzhi wyozhi bo eti yan nanzhi ela ce dozhi leba nao

eng: For the evils of their Deeds will confront them and they will be completely encircled by that which they used to mock at!
nupe: Etun ndondo nanzhi a lo nan cia tula yaa alamari azaba nan afe la lami nan cia jin tabbata ta etiabo

eng: Now when trouble touches man he cries to Us But when We bestow a favour upon him as from Ourselves he says This has been given to me because of a certain knowledge I have! Nay but this is but a trial but most of them understand not!
nupe: Kaminan egun ndoci gaa tswan zawangi nan wuna fe yi Yi ye gancin Yi ga bea niima laa yau dagan eba Yibo wunajin u gan akika a lau la ya mi ebo ilimi nan mi de nan Aa ngan wuncin gayi fitinao ammade ekun dondoazhi a kpea

nupe: Akika za nanzhiy shiadzo nan gan gan iri na naa ni etun nanzhiy ma afe lo nan u kunke yaeko ndondo boa

eng: Nay the evil results of their Deeds overtook them And the wrong-doers of this generation- the evil results of their Deeds will soon overtake them too and they will never be able to frustrate Our Plan!

eng: Say O my Servants who have transgressed against their souls! Despair not of the Mercy of Allah for Allah forgives all sins for He is Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful
nupe: Gan gan Ya ye wuzhi Mizhiy nazhia eti tacinazhi jin gun be zunubizhiy na ega ba kawna be yegun Sokoe ma Akika Soko Etsu gafara u yio Etsu yegun u yio

nupe: Ye mae kezhe e dae tsun Soko ye mae la kpatsune tae ya u tun shidzo kafi azaba u beu yae nan ebo na kanga ajine taimakoa

nupe: Ye mae lamie tu bawu bolobolo nan acin be ya ye da gan eba tsoci ye bo nan tun shidzo kafi azabau beu dzunu fie nan Kami na yeasan tua nan

And those who feared their Lord will be led to the Garden in crowds until behold they arrive there its gates will be opened and its keepers will say Peace be upon you! well have ye done! enter ye here to dwell therein

eng: O mankind! reverence your Guardian-Lord who created you from a single person created of like nature His mate and from them twain scattered like seeds countless men and women- reverence Allah through whom ye demand your mutual rightsand reverence the wombs That bore you for Allah ever watches over you
nupe: Ya ye zawangizhi! E sundan Tsoci ye najin alitta ye dagan rayi ninio na Uci jin alitta yan yiwou yau dagan miniubo Uci jin alitta yan bagizhi to yinzagizhi dokun sheba dagan mini za gubaababo Yemae sundan Soko na ye la sunnau ba yanzhi tsakaniebo be dozhiy na Yemae tswa zumunci yan ewanzhi Akika Soko Etsu nae tswa yandondo eti yebo na uyio

eng: To orphans restore their property When they reach their age nor substitute your worthless things for their good ones and devour not their substance by mixing it up with your own For this is indeed a great sin
nupe: Ye mae la dukiya ekungizhie lae yaa ye mae ga la dedezhi a sangwa be wangizhi-ma Ye mae ga gi dukiyaazhi alo dan mini dukiya yezhio ma Akika wuncin wunafe zunubi na wancin na

eng: If ye fear that ye shall not be able to deal justly with the orphans Marry women of your choice Two or three or four but if ye fear that ye shall not be able to deal justly with them then only one or a captive that your right hands possess that will be more suitable to prevent you from doing injustice

eng: And give the women on marriage their dower as a free gift but if they of their own good pleasure remit any part of it to you Take it and enjoy it with right good cheer

eng: To those weak of understanding Make not over your property which Allah hath made a means of support for you but feed and clothe them therewith and speak to them words of kindness and justice
nupe: Ye mae ga la dukiya yezhi dangwa wawazhio ma dukiya na Sokoa kagbo yan kukugikini yezhi laadanbo nama yede yaagi ye mae jin tufuwazhie yaa ye mae fe gangan yan alheri beayin

eng: Make trial of orphans until they reach the age of marriage if then ye find sound judgment in them release their property to them but consume it not wastefully nor in haste against their growing up If the guardian is well-off Let him claim no remuneration but if he is poor let him have for himself what is just and reasonable When ye release their property to them take witnesses in their presence But all-sufficient is Allah in taking account

eng: From what is left by parents and those nearest related there is a share for men and a share for women whether the property be small or large-a determinate share
nupe: Bagizhi ayi be raboayin dagan mini yanna yanmanci gubaba to yan dangi tsonbazhi ga lugwa zhi zumao na to yinzagizhi asto yi be roboayin dagan mini yanna yanmanci gubaba to dangi yan tsonbazhi ga lugwa na Mini yanna gba gba dan miniubo koma uci wancin na Robo ma uyio na yi farilla na

eng: Let those disposing of an estate have the same fear in their minds as they would have for their own if they had left a helpless family behind Let them fear Allah and speak words of appropriate comfort
nupe: Zanazhi-ma gaafe gan atso ga ya zuriya gbogun zhi zhi zumao a sundan yaa yan egbazhe dede na za wuncinzhi atso a sundan Soko amaa gan gan natso yi gboro na

eng: Those who unjustly eat up the property of orphans eat up a Fire into their own bodies They will soon be enduring a Blazing Fire!
nupe: Akika za nazhiegi dukiya ekungizhi eti zwaluncio na akika ena tsa zawuncinzhie gi fi gbako bo ama gaa gan dan mini ena SAIRAO nae po sarauyina
