nupe: Gan gan Akika Soko kan mi han min ga jin bauta ya yannazhiy ye jin bauta ya ke Soko lugwa na ma Ebo nan bayanizhi da be ya mi yina ni dagan eba tsoci mi bo Soko ma jin mi foro gan min la kpatsun tanya Etsu nae kpa alittazhi kpaata nan

eng: It is He Who has created you from dust then from a sperm-drop then from a leech-like clot then does he get you out into the light as a child then lets you grow and reach your age of full strength then lets you become old- though of you there are some who die before- and lets you reach a Term appointed in order that ye may learn wisdom
nupe: Soko ga jin alitta ye dagan jikannan bo gancin dagan maniybo gancin ucia zhe egya tsuntsun ci gancin aci ga ye wa tinya dzakangiy gancin ye cia bea jin ba-ligi gancin yecia bea kuku mini yebo a de nanzhiy gaa tsu shidzo nan Ebo ye debae tun iyaka ndoci nan yi bibaci nan Ebo ye lae fe eza ankali zhi

eng: It is He Who gives Life and Death and when He decides upon an affair He says to it Be and it is
nupe: Soko gae dan eyan rayio u ga mae wu rayio umaga alamari ndondo kpa wun de ajinu ganu gan afe uci gaa fe

eng: Seest thou not those that dispute concerning the Signs of Allah How are they turned away from Reality-
nupe: Wyo le za nanzhie gbomi dan mini aya Soko zhio nan yea Kendoe e cea za naa

eng: Those who reject the Book and the revelations with which We sent our messengers but soon shall they know-
nupe: Za nan zhia litafi Alkuranu yi ganmanan nan aci kezhea yan nanzhi yia tun Tucizhi tun nan yi ganmanan nan bele yin a be kpe

eng: When the yokes shall be round their necks and the chains they shall be dragged along-
nupe: Kaminan agaku kuruzhi fia korozhio nan to dzamizhi acia fe gbaa da fi enano nan

eng: When the yokes shall be round their necks and the chains they shall be dragged along-
nupe: Kaminan agaku kuruzhi fia korozhio nan to dzamizhi acia fe gbaa da fi enano nan

eng: In the boiling fetid fluid then in the Fire shall they be burned
nupe: A fi mini nuwan yipao a cia fi mini ena o nan a fe la dina nan

eng: Then shall it be said to them Where are the deities to which ye gave part-worship-
nupe: Gancin acia gana gan Ba yannanzhi ye fe la pa Soko baci nan dano

eng: In derogation of Allah They will reply They have left us in the lurch Nay we invoked not of old anything that had real existence Thus does Allah leave the Unbelievers to stray
nupe: Yecie wuna ke Soko lugwa Acia gan gan A gbin yi yeo Aa yi jin bauta ya yandondo lea niy Acinga ga Sokoe gbin kafirizhio

eng: That was because ye were wont to rejoice on the earth in things other than the Truth and that ye were wont to be insolent
nupe: Wuncin ma a tswan ye tswan ebo fahri banza na ye fe jin kpe eti kinbo nao be etun banza nanzhi ye fe lo nao

eng: Enter ye the gates of Hell to dwell therein and evil is this abode of the arrogant!
nupe: E fe gandan eko yan jahannama zhio ba ga bo yea fi tutun yino akika zoba yan za nanzhie lati dan fino nan wuna biy

eng: So persevere in patience for the Promise of Allah is true and whether We show thee in this life some part of what We promise them- or We take thy soul to Our Mercy before that-in any case it is to Us that they shall all return
nupe: A ankuri jin akika alkawali Soko gaskiya uyio U jin wo Yiga sashi yan alkawali azaba nan Yie jin kafirizhi nan laa wu wye U jin wo ma ajali wye u lau jin akika kpata akezhe dazhin eba Yi

eng: We did aforetime send messengers before thee of them there are some whose story We have related to thee and some whose story We have not related to thee It was not possible for any messenger to bring a sign except by the leave of Allah but when the Command of Allah issued the matter was decided in truth and justice and there perished there and then those who stood on Falsehoods
nupe: Akika Yi tun Tucizhi tun shi wyo dzo miniabo ade nanzhi Yi ya wye labariazhi nan ama de nanzhi yi la labariazhi ya wyo yaa nan Akika U gwo yin ya Tuci ndondo nan wuna la aya ndoci be naa sai be izini Sokoe Kaminan alamari Soko gatula nan a ga hukunci jin tsakaniabo be gaskiyae kanga ma ganmanan Zuncizhi gajin asara

eng: It is Allah Who made cattle for you that ye may use some for riding and some for food
nupe: Soko ga la dabbazhi ya ye yeo ebo ye de etu miniabo miniabo ma ade nanzhi yea fe gi nan

eng: And there are other advantages in them for you besides that ye may through them attain to any need there may be in your hearts and on them and on ships ye are carried
nupe: Yema de eyan anfanizhi miniabo ebo ma ye dea ela-ewo bukata yan yangban yezhi Gancin eti dabba yezhio to eya nuwanzhi yea lo ebazhi wo be kara ye zhiy

eng: And He shows you always His Signs then which of the Signs of Allah will ye deny
nupe: Soko mae la ayauzhi wu ye kici mini aya Soko zhio danbo nan yea gbomi nao

eng: Do they not travel through the earth and see what was the End of those before them They were more numerous than these and superior in strength and in the traces they have left in the land Yet all that they accomplished was of no profit to them
nupe: Kashi e za za kpe eti kin boa kacina ngan a le kendoe zoba zanazhiy shiadzo nan yiyi nan ye Ngan za wuncinzhi dokun gana ama gboka gana ama de bazhi gana kpe kin bo Etun nanzhiy ma a lo kpata na u kunke yaa

eng: For when their messengers came to them with Clear Signs they exulted in such knowledge and skill as they had but that very Wrath at which they were wont to scoff hemmed them in
nupe: Kaminan Tuciazhi be yaa be bayanizhiy nan a fe jin fahri be yannanzhiy fi bea yin mini kpikpeo nan Yannanzhiy afe laa la-mi nan cia jin tabbata ta etiabo

eng: But when they saw Our Punishment they said We believe in Allah- the one Allah - and we reject the partners we used to join with Him
nupe: Kaminan abe le azaba Yi ye nan a gan Yia imani jin be Sokoe gbaugi yi maajin kafirinci be yannanzhi yi fe laa pau baci nan

eng: But their professing the Faith when they actually saw Our Punishment was not going to profit them Such has been Allah´s Way of dealing with His Servants from the most ancient times And even thus did the Rejecters of Allah perish utterly!
nupe: Kanga imania u jina anfania ebo nan azaba Yi gaa a le yeo Nan nan ekpa Soko uyio naa shidzo dan tacin wuzhiuzhio nan Kanga kafirizhi cia jin asaara

eng: Ha-Mim
nupe: HEU MIM

eng: ´Ain Sin
nupe: QafAIN SIN KAF Bayanizhi shidzo eti iri aya nanzhiy boa ni Egwa wu ma ayio yan zankpe yan kpikpe Soko nanude ta eti alittazhio nan

eng: Thus doth He send inspiration to thee as He did to those before thee- Allah Exalted in Power Full of Wisdom
nupe: Acinga ga Soko Etsu zankpe Etsu hikima wune jin wahayi be ya wyo yao to zanazhiy shi wyo dzo nao

eng: To Him belongs all that is in the heavens and on earth and He is Most High Most Great
nupe: Wyun ga wun yannanzhiy fi sanmazhio to nanzhiy fi kin bo nao wun ga ma yi Etsu elatuo Etsu cinwano

eng: The heavens are almost rent asunder from above them by Him Glory and the angels celebrate the Praises of their Lord and pray for forgiveness for all beings on earth Behold! Verily Allah is He the Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful
nupe: Sanmazhi atsotso ke a ga banfi dagan fitio nan ebo edo yan cinwan Soko Malaikazhi mae li Soko be ekundo yan yebo jiny ya Tsocia yin amae kezhe ba gaafara ya za nanzhiy fi kinbo nan Akika Soko ga yi Etsu gaafarao U ga ma yi Etsu yeguno

eng: And those who take as protectors others besides Him- Allah doth watch over them and thou art not the disposer of their affairs
nupe: Za nanzhiy ma a zandocizhi la ndakata ke Soko lugwa nan kpikpe yan Soko ta etiabo wyo ma jin za naa fe tswa etunazhi za naa

eng: Thus have We sent by inspiration to thee an Arabic Qur´an that thou mayest warn the Mother of Cities and all around her- and warn them of the Day of Assembly of which there is no doubt when some will be in the Garden and some in the Blazing Fire
nupe: Acinga ga Yi jin wahayi Alkuranu be ya wye yo u ma yi be ezhimi Larubawae ebo wyo yo jin jamaa yan Makacizhi gangba to za nanzhiy mau kezhe nan izhe kpata Wyo mao jina gangba eti efo gun-gun yekan wanciko kelo kezhin ndondo dan boa jamaa sashizhi a fi Aljannao jamaa sashizhi maa fi enan yan sairuo

eng: If Allah had so willed He could have made them a single people but He admits whom He will to His Mercy and the Wrong-doers will have no protector nor helper
nupe: Wuna ba Soko ba da uga zawangizhi laazhe alumma nini eti adini ninio ammade wune la za nan ga bau nan a gandan mini yegunu bo Azwalumizhi ma a de eyaa a ma de za naajina taimako naa

eng: What! Have they taken for worship protectors besides Him But it is Allah- He is the Protector and it is He Who gives life to the dead It is He Who has power over all things
nupe: Kashi a zandocizhi la la ndakatazhi zunma Soko Ngan Soko ga yi Ndakata yan gaskiyao wun ga maedan eyan tsutsu cizhi rayio U ma de kagbo ta eti yandondo

eng: Whatever it be wherein ye differ the decision thereof is with Allah such is Allah my Lord In Him I trust and to Him I turn
nupe: Yandondo nan ma ye ga cedozhi leba etiubo nan Yea hukunci la aya Soko ebo nan wun ga wun hukunci kpatao Soko wuncin ga yi Tsoci mi yino wun ga mi ya kpeo ebau ga ma mia zheban loo

eng: He is the Creator of the heavens and the earth He has made for you pairs from among yourselves and pairs among cattle by this means does He multiply you there is nothing whatever like unto Him and He is the One that hears and sees all things
nupe: Soko ga yi Etsu nan jin alitta sanmazhi to kin nao Wuna yinzagizhi jin ya ye dagan mini nankan yetso to dabbazhiotso wunajin eba be yiwozhiy Wunejin alitta yezhi dokun fi mini eba be yiwo zhiy Akika ade yandoci dozhin Sokoa Etsu u ma yio nae wo gan nan Etsu nae le bandondo ye nan

eng: To Him belong the keys of the heavens and the earth He enlarges and restricts The Sustenance to whom He will for He knows full well all things
nupe: Giyeko yan edzunba ko yan arziki yan sanmazhi to kin dan baubo wune kpe gwa arziki ya za nan ga baunan U mae la degi ya za nan ga bau nan Akika Soko de kpikpe yan yandondo

eng: The same religion has He established for you as that which He enjoined on Noah - the which We have sent by inspiration to thee - and that which We enjoined on Abraham Moses and Jesus Namely that ye should remain steadfast in religion and make no divisions therein to those who worship other things than Allah hard is the way to which thou callest them Allah chooses to Himself those whom He pleases and guides to Himself those who turn to Him
nupe: Sokoa sharia la cici ya ye yan adini iri nantso u lajin wahayi be ya Annabi Nuhu nan to nantso Yi jin wahayiu be ya wye nan to yan Ibrahima to Musa to Isa kpaataa Yi jina wasiyya gan Yea adini ku gikini Ye mae ga sakpazhi be dozhi dan mini adinio ma Yan nan wyoe la yi kafirizhi gan abea tsun nan wuna lukpin fia Soko ajin u tsa za nan ga bau nan zhin ekou U mae la za nan gazheban zhin ebau-nan ke eko gboro

eng: And they became divided only after Knowledge reached them- through selfish envy as between themselves Had it not been for a Word that went forth before from thy Lord tending to a Term appointed the matter would have been settled between them But truly those who have inherited the Book after them are in suspicious disquieting doubt concerning it
nupe: A ma kpe ka-ka-yin be dozhi yina sai de baci nan kpikpe da be yaa zo nan ebo nanvo nandan tsakaniabo be dozhiy nan Kaujin ebo hukunci Tsoci naa shidzoa ni uci pata yaa da kandoci yegboro naa daaga hukunci ba tsakaniabo be dozhiy Akika za nanzhiy gigun yan Litafi zunmaabo nan ejin kelokezhin dan alamari adinio

eng: Now then for that reason call them to the Faith and stand steadfast as thou art commanded nor follow thou their vain desires but say I believe in the Book which Allah has sent down and I am commanded to judge justly between you Allah is our Lord and your Lord for us is the responsibility for our deeds and for you for your deeds There is no contention between us and you Allah will bring us together and to Him is our Final Goal
nupe: Ebo acino fe yi zazhi zhin eko Soko Wyo mao laokuo gikini kendoe Soko jino foro nan ga lami tu etun yangbanazhi ma Gan gan mia gaskiya ya be Litafi nanzhi Soko cin beyin nan a ma jin mi foro gan min tswa adalci gboro da tsakani ye bo Soko ga yi Tsoci yi yio to yan ye yeo egagba yan etun yizhi yi ga wuno nyan ye tso ma ye ga wuno emigbo ndondo dan tsakani yi bo be ye yina Soko ga yi ku yekan baenio ebau gabo ma ezhekeba dano

eng: But those who dispute concerning Allah after He has been accepted- futile is their dispute in the Sight of their Lord on them will be a Penalty terrible
nupe: Za nanzhiy mae gbomi eti alamari Soko nan baci nan ekundondo zawangizhi a imani jin beu yina ni nan hujja yan zawuncinzhi nyi-nyi ci uyio eba Tsociabo ewunzhe yan Soko maajin tabbata ta etiabo azaba nan tan sarauyin nan wunajin tabbata yaa

eng: It is Allah Who has sent down the Book in Truth and the Balance by which to weigh conduct And what will make thee realise that perhaps the Hour is close at hand
nupe: Soko ga yi Etsu nancin Litafi be be gaskiyae nao ganni be tsunwan yan gboro dae Kiy maala kpikpe ya wyo yo ko Alkiyami a tsoba kpan kpan yina nio

eng: Only those wish to hasten it who believe not in it those who believe hold it in awe and know that it is the Truth Behold verily those that dispute concerning the Hour are far astray
nupe: Za nanzhiy a jin imani beu yina nan edin Alkiyami ye za nanzhiy ma imani jin beu yin nan e sundanu a ma kpe wo ke gaskiya uyio nan Akika za nanzhie jin kelo kezhin eti Alkiyamio nan a fi mini egbin naa kpe ya nan

eng: Gracious is Allah to His servants He gives Sustenance to whom He pleases and He has power and can carry out His Will
nupe: Soko Etsu yegun uyio be wuzhiuzhiy wyune la arziki ya za na ga bau nan Akika Etsu kagbo uyio Etsu zankpe Uyio

eng: To any that desires the tilth of the Hereafter We give increase in his tilth and to any that desires the tilth of this world We grant somewhat thereof but he has no share or lot in the Hereafter
nupe: Zandondo nae lo tun ucie wa egagba yan Alkiyami nan Yia beu bibe dan mini egagbaubo za nan ma gae lo tun ebo egagba izheo nan Yia yau miniubo u maa de rabo ndondo efo alkiyami yina

eng: What! have they partners in godhead who have established for them some religion without the permission of Allah Had it not been for the Decree of Judgment the matter would have been decided between them at once But verily the Wrong-doers will have a grievous Penalty
nupe: Kashi a de Tsoci ndocizhi de baci Soko nan la sharia cici yaa yan adini natso ma Soko yaa izini wuna nan Akika kagan u jin ebo nan hukunci Soko a shidzoani naa da aga hukunci ba tsakaniabo tun dagan izhe babo Akika azaba nan tan nan wunajin tabbata ya azwalumizhi

eng: Thou wilt see the Wrong-doers in fear on account of what they have earned and the burden of that must necessarily fall on them But those who believe and work righteous deeds will be in the luxuriant meads of the Gardens they shall have before their Lord all that they wish for That will indeed be the magnificent Bounty of Allah
nupe: Wyoa le azwalumizhi ye a fe sundan yan egagba ded yan etun nanzhiy a lo nan U ma ga cin taa Zananzhi maa imani jin acie lotun guru nan a fi mini bata Aljannazhio yannanzhi a gae wa kpata nan u dan be Tsocia yin Nan nan ga yi daraja nan wancin nao

eng: That is the Bounty whereof Allah gives Glad Tidings to His Servants who believe and do righteous deeds Say No reward do I ask of you for this except the love of those near of kin And if any one earns any good We shall give him an increase of good in respect thereof for Allah is Oft-Forgiving Most Ready to appreciate service
nupe: Nan nan ga Sokoe la fa wuzhiuzhi yangbano nanzhia imani jin amae lotun wangizhi nan Gan gan Mi gbin ye gan egagba yan etun nan mie lo nan boa sai de cincin yan dangibo  nan dan tsakaniabo nan Zaeni ndondo nan ga lo tun wangi nan Yia beu bolobolo dan miniubo Akika Soko Etsu gafara uyio Etsu nan e jin yebo nan uyio

eng: What! Do they say He has forged a falsehood against Allah But if Allah willed He could seal up thy heart And Allah blots out Vanity and proves the Truth by His Words For He knows well the secrets of all hearts
nupe: Kashiy e gan-agn ganmanan u zun ta Soko Ngan Wunaba Soko ba uga eyan te yangban wye Soko ma ga ganmana finya u ma ga gaskiya jin tabbata be hukunciuyin akika ude kpikpe yan yannazhi fi yangbanzhio nan

eng: He is the One that accepts repentance from His Servants and forgives sins and He knows all that ye do
nupe: U mae gwo gwatan tuba yan wuzhi u zhi U mae fa be etun dedezhiy U ma de kpikpe yan etun nazhiy ye lo na

eng: And He listens to those who believe and do deeds of righteousness and gives them increase of His Bounty but for the Unbelievers their is a terrible Penalty
nupe: U mae gwo aduwa za nazhi ga imani jin acie lo tun wangizhi na U maa bea mini eryatwaubo Kafirizhi ma azaba tsuntsun gaajin tabbata yaa

eng: If Allah were to enlarge the provision for His Servants they would indeed transgress beyond all bounds through the earth but he sends it down in due measure as He pleases For He is with His Servants Well-acquainted Watchful
nupe: Daaci gan Soka ariziki kpegwa kpe ya wuzhiuzhi baenio daaga gbotika kpe eti kinbo agagwo iyaka gan ammade Wyune cinu cin be gwargwado yan kendoe ga bau na Akika Soko de labari yan na wuzhi uzhi fiy ninbo na U mae cina le

eng: He is the One that sends down rain even after men have given up all hope and scatters His Mercy far and wide And He is the Protector Worthy of all Praise
nupe: Wyun ga mae du le be ya ao baci nan a ga kauna ba nao Umaela yegunu twarya yaa Akika Wun ga yi Ndakatao Etsu nan yandondo e jin yebo ya nan

eng: And among His Signs is the creation of the heavens and the earth and the living creatures that He has scattered through them and He has power to gather them together when He wills
nupe: U ma dan mini ayau zhio jinjin yan sanmazhi be kin yin to dabba nazhi ga fi bonan Uma de iko nan Ugakua yekan nan ka mina u ga bau nan

eng: Whatever misfortune happens to you is because on the things your hands have wrought and for many of them He grants forgiveness
nupe: Yandondo nama ga tswan ye mini yan masi-bazhio nan etun dede yan egwa ye tso zhi ga dinu beo U mae fa be etun dede nazhi dokun nan

eng: Nor can ye frustrate aught fleeing through the earth nor have ye besides Allah any one to protect or to help
nupe: Ye maa gangwa kin boa ye ma de Ndakata a gwo Soko gana ye ma de taimako jinci a gan wuna

eng: And among His Signs are the ships smooth-running through the ocean tall as mountains
nupe: U dan mini a ya uzhio eya nuwan nazhie je kpe eti eduzhio nan wyoa le a ye ba kpako a yi ke patizhi nan

eng: If it be His Will He can still the Wind then would they become motionless on the back of the ocean Verily in this are Signs for everyone who patiently perseveres and is grateful
nupe: U ga bau uga efe kan gikini eyazhi kpata ci gakan ta ta eti eduo Akika mini wuncino aya danbo ya zandondo na gae jin hakuri ucie jin yebo ya Soko nan

eng: Or He can cause them to perish because of the evil which the men have earned but much doth He forgive
nupe: Ko ma wuna jin hallaka ebo dede nazhi a lo nan U mae fa be nan dokun nae

eng: But let those know who dispute about Our Signs that there is for them no way of escape
nupe: Za nazhiy mae gbomi dan mini aya Yizhio na atso gakpe foga gan a de bandonbo nan a bici lo naa

eng: Whatever ye are given here is but a convenience of this life but that which is with Allah is better and more lasting it is for those who believe and put their trust in their Lord
nupe: Akika yan dondo nan Soko ga la ya ye nan eman wo u yio teten-gi yan izhe natso dan be Sokoe nan ude alhei gan u ma fedun gan ya za nanzhiy ga imani jin amaa yakpe Tsocia nan

eng: Those who avoid the greater crimes and shameful deeds and when they are angry even then forgive
nupe: To za nanzhi e kpe ya be zunubi wancikozhiy to etun sakpazhiy nan a maga a jin fushi ajin a fa nan

eng: Those who hearken to their Lord and establish regular Prayer who conduct their affairs by mutual Consultation who spend out of what We bestow on them for Sustenance
nupe: To za nazhi e ye yiyi yan Tsocianan a mae kursalla gikini nan alamariazhi ma eti shawara bo ejin wuno nan a maekezhe wu dukiya-zhi fi eko wangio mini arziki nanzhi Yi la yaa nan

eng: And those who when an oppressive wrong is inflicted on them are not cowed but help and defend themselves
nupe: To za nazhiy zwalunci ga tswana a jina wa taimako eti jin jin gao nan

eng: The recompense for an injury is an injury equal thereto in degree but if a person forgives and makes reconciliation his reward is due from Allah for Allah loveth not those who do wrong
nupe: Egagba yan etun dede ma dede iri dozhinu Za nan ma gabea fa nan uci jin bolobolo nan ladau dan eba Soko akika Sokoe wa azwalumizhia

eng: But indeed if any do help and defend themselves after a wrong done to them against such there is no cause of blame
nupe: Zanan ma gaa jin ga baci nan u jin zwalunci nan zawuncinzhi lefi ndondota etia boa

eng: The blame is only against those who oppress men and wrong-doing and insolently transgress beyond bounds through the land defying right and justice for such there will be a penalty grievous
nupe: Akika lefi ta eti za nazhie jin zawangizhi zw-alunci nao a cie gwo iyaaka gan kpe eti kinbo umajin eti gaskiya boa nan Akika za wuncinzhi azaba nan tan wuncinzhi tabbata yaa

eng: But indeed if any show patience and forgive that would truly be an exercise of courageous will and resolution in the conduct of affairs
nupe: Za nan ma ga ankuri jin u ci fa nan akika wuncin dan mini alamari nan zhiy gbota nao

eng: For any whom Allah leaves astray there is no protector thereafter And thou wilt see the Wrong-doers when in sight of the Penalty Say Is there any way to effect a return
nupe: Zaeni ndondo na Soko ga u gbin nan wunade ndakata ndoci zunmau boa wyo maale azwalumizhi ye kami nan aga le azaba ye nan acia fe gan gan Ngba yi ade kafa ndoci be nan yi gazheban da izhe naa

eng: And thou wilt see them brought forward to the Penalty in a humble frame of mind because of their disgrace and looking with a stealthy glance And the Believers will say Those are indeed in loss who have given to perdition their own selves and those belonging to them on the Day of Judgment Behold! Truly the Wrong-doers are in a lasting Penalty!
nupe: Wyo maa lea ye afekua tu yi kpe eti enao aci gaa gba a gasunzunye a fe yi ba yi cinle Za nazhiy a imani jin nan ci ganAkika eza asarazhiy aga yi za nanzhiy ajin asara yan etitacinazhio to yan iyaliazhi efo Alkiyami nao Akika azwalumizhi a fi mini azaba naa kugikini nao

eng: And no protectors have they to help them other than Allah And for any whom Allah leaves to stray there is no way to the Goal
nupe: Amaa de ndakatazhi nazhia jina taimako baci Soko naa Akika zandondo nan Soko ga u gbin nan Wuna ke eko bea

eng: Hearken ye to your Lord before there come a Day which there will be no putting back because of the Ordainment of Allah! that Day there will be for you no place of refuge nor will there be for you any room for denial of your sins!
nupe: Efe ye yiyi yan Tsoci ye shidzo kafi efo nan wuna ye dagwa yaa nan u be dagan eba Soko na Yea de eswoba ndodo fo wuncina a maade zandondo nana gbo mi naa

eng: If then they run away We have not sent thee as a guard over them Thy duty is but to convey the Message And truly when We give man a taste of a Mercy from Ourselves he doth exult thereat but when some ill happens to him on account of the deeds which his hands have sent forth truly then is man ungrateful!
nupe: Gancin a ga zunma zheta Yi tunwyo fia gan wyo yo feo tswaao zaa Yan wyo de u ga yi eyan wuo Kami nan Yi ga yegun yi laa ya zawangi degi na wunafe jin alfahri beu Yin kamina ma eyan dede gaa tswana ebo etun dede azhio nan akika kanga zawangi ga cin mannabo be Sokoe

eng: To Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth He creates what He wills and plans He bestows children male or female according to His Will and Plan
nupe: Mulki yan sanmazhi to kin Soko wuno Wunejin yan na ga bau nan Wune twarya ynzagizhi ya za nan ga bau nan U mea twarya bagizhi ya za nan ga bau nan

eng: Or He bestows both males and females and He leaves barren whom He will for He is full of Knowledge and Power
nupe: Ko ma wuna zhin keba bagizhi to ynzagizhi za nan ma ga bau nan wunu ya raama gbasanyn wuna degi ndondo maa akika Etsu kpikpe u yio Etsu iko

eng: It is not fitting for a man that Allah should speak to him except by inspiration or from behind a veil or by the sending of a messenger to reveal with Allah´s permission what Allah wills for He is Most High Most Wise
nupe: U ma gwo Yin na a gan gan Soko gan gan be alita ndondoe naa eye be eye saide be wahayiy ko ma zunmata yan yekan ndocio ko ma wuna tun Tuci tun ucia jin wahayi yau be iziniu yin yan yannan ga bau na akika Etsu elatu u yio Egba u yio

eng: And thus have We by Our Command sent inspiration to thee thou knewest not before what was Revelation and what was Faith but We have made the Qur´an a Light wherewith We guide such of Our servants as We will and verily thou dost guide men to the Straight Way-
nupe: Acinga ga Yijin wahayi be ya wye yan Alkuranu dagan foro yi bo zunma ba tsozhio wyo de kpikpe Litafia wyo ma kpe Imani yea ammade Yi u laafe haske Yie lajin zanan ga ba yi na shiri mini wuzhi yi zhio Akika ma Wyoe wu zazhi ba lo eko nantso yi gboro nan

eng: The Way of Allah to Whom belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on earth Behold how all affairs tend towards Allah!
nupe: Eko yan Soko Etsu nan wun yan na fi sanmazhio to kin bo na akika ezhe keba yan alamari kpata eba Soko bo u dano

eng: Ha-Mim
nupe: HEU MIM

eng: By the Book that makes things clear-
nupe: Mie zhi kuti be Alkuranuy Litafi nan yi be bayanizhiy naa tula nan

eng: We have made it a Qur´an in Arabic that ye may be able to understand and learn wisdom
nupe: Akika Yiu la afe Alkuranu be zhimi larubawazhiy ebo ye laefe eza ankalizhi

eng: We have made it a Qur´an in Arabic that ye may be able to understand and learn wisdom
nupe: Akika Yiu la afe Alkuranu be zhimi larubawazhiy ebo ye laefe eza ankalizhi

eng: And verily it is in the Mother of the Book in Our Presence high in dignity full of wisdom
nupe: Akika Alkuranu dan mini Nna yan Litafizhio lauhul-Mahfuz eba Yi bo ma Alkuranu litafi na latu nan uyio naa she be hikimae nan

eng: Shall We then take away the Message from you and repel you for that ye are a people transgressing beyond bounds
nupe: Kashiy Yi ga cin cin be yan sinsantu lugwaa baenio ebo nan ye yeafe za nanzhie nyin yan kpe kin bo nan

eng: But how many were the prophets We sent amongst the peoples of old
nupe: Eka nan dokun nan Yi tun Annabi fi jamaa yan mafarizhi

eng: And never came there a prophet to them but they mocked him
nupe: A ma de Annabi ndondo nan be yaa naa sai de afe lau mi

eng: So We destroyed them- stronger in power than these- and thus has passed on the Parable of the peoples of old
nupe: Yimaa za nazhiy gboka gana nan jin hallaka iri azaba nan tswan za mafarizhi na cia da eti atso gwo gan

eng: If thou wert to question them ´Who created the heavens and the earth´ They would be sure to reply ´they were created by Him the Exalted in Power Full of Knowledge´-
nupe: Wallahi wyo ga gbina gan gan Ziy jin alitta sanmazhi to kin yino Akika ayazhe gan Soko Etsu zankpe Etsu kpikpe ga jin alittaao

eng: Yea the same that has made for you the earth like a carpet spread out and has made for you roads and channels therein in order that ye may find guidance on the way
nupe: Etsu naa kin ta cici ya ye parae nan U cia ekozhi sa fi bo ya ye nan Ebo ye debae laede bawu nan

eng: That sends down from time to time rain from the sky in due measure- and We raise to life therewith a land that is dead even so will ye be raised from the dead-
nupe: Etsu nae du ele zhin dagan sanmao be tsunwane nan Yicia ezhi tsutsucizhi dan rayi beu yin A cin ga ga a ku ye tso tinya dagan kabariezhi bo

eng: That has created pairs in all things and has made for you ships and cattle on which ye ride
nupe: Etsu nan jin alitta eba be yiwozhiy kpata nan U ci kezhe jin eya nuwanzhi nan yeade ganfi nan to dabbazhiy nanzhiy yede tu nan

eng: In order that ye may sit firm and square on their backs and when so seated ye may celebrate the kind favour of your Lord and say Glory to Him Who has subjected these to our use for we could never have accomplished this by ourselves
nupe: Ebo ye debae lae fedunekpe zunmaabo yemae fe pa niimayan Tsoci yezhi kami nan ye gaa fe dun ta etiabo nan ye mae gan ganLili kpata ajin tabbata ya Etsu naa e yan tuci nan nan jin foro ya yi nan akika yi de kagbo ndondo ta eti ezan daa boa

eng: And to our Lord surely must we turn back!Akika kpata yi ma eba Tsoci yi ga yia kezhe lo
Yet they attribute to some of His servants a share with Him in his godhead! truly is man a blasphemous ingrate avowed!
nupe: Acia za ndoci tsa yau mini wuzhiu zhio ke wun ga yi egi wuno nan akika zawangi eza uyio nae cin manan bo be Sokoenan manan cinbo naa tula nan

eng: What! has He taken daughters out of what He himself creates and granted to you sons for choice
nupe: Ngba wuna egi ynzagizhi tsa mini alittauzhio U cia ye tsa be egi bagizhiy

eng: When news is brought to one of them of the birth of what he sets up as a likeness to Allah Most Gracious his face darkens and he is filled with inward grief!
nupe: A ma ga ya zaeni miniabo labari yangban fa be egi ynzagiy nane da gan gan Soko Al-Rahmanu tsa gan Na fuska u gashi zhiko yangbanu ci ganyin

eng: Is then one brought up among trinkets and unable to give a clear account in a dispute to be associated with Allah
nupe: Ngba ye ga dangi tsa ya Soko Be za nae sa sa dan mini ninpao nan za nan man ka wunabe ewun sunzhi wuna kpe gan ri woa nan

eng: And they make into females angels who themselves serve Allah Did they witness their creation Their evidence will be recorded and they will be called to account!
nupe: Acia Malaikazhi nazhiy yi wuzhi Soko na la ynzagizhi Beke a jin ri jinka mi nan a jin alittaa nan A kika a ga eri azhi ka a-maa gbina gan efo Alkiyamiy

eng: Ah! they say If it had been the will of Allah Most Gracious we should not have worshipped such deities! Of that they have no knowledge! they do nothing but lie!
nupe: Aci gan Wuna ba Soko Al-Rahmanu ba ngan yi yaajin bauta ya Malaikazhia Ade kpikpe ndoci eti wuncin boa akika a detswa ganmana tswa kawanyin

eng: What! have We given them a Book before this to which they are holding fast
nupe: Kashiy Yi la Litafi ndoci laa yaa shi Alkuranu dzo Wuncin ci la a egwa sunu gbanyin

eng: Nay! they say We found our fathers following a certain religion and we do guide ourselves by their footsteps
nupe: Ade gan Akika yi tsun yanmanci yizhi kpe eti izhe le iri ndocio etaazhi ga ma yi ga emi tuo

eng: Just in the same way whenever We sent a Warner before thee to any people the wealthy ones among them said We found our fathers following a certain religion and we will certainly follow in their footsteps
nupe: Acinga ga u ma yio Yi laa tun gangba jin ci tun dan ezhi ndocio shi wyo dzo lea sai de bagwo deciazhi agan gan Yi de tsun yanmanci yizhi tsun ta eti eko izhe le ndocio Yi ma etaazhi ga ga emi tuo

eng: He said What! Even if I brought you better guidance than that which ye found your fathers following They said For us we deny that ye prophets are sent on a mission at all
nupe: Gan gan Asa bawu nan mi la be nan U gye gan natso ye tsun yanmanci yezhi kpe tiubo naa A gan Yi de ajin kafirinci be yan nan a tun yetun nae

eng: So We exacted retribution from them now see what was the end of those who rejected Truth!
nupe: Yicia wo gbata Cin kendoe zoba yan ganmanan zuncizhiy nan le

eng: Behold! Abraham said to his father and his people I do indeed clear myself of what ye worship
nupe: Kami na Annabi Ibrahima gan be Babau yin to Jamaa yanu zhi nanjin bauta yanan

eng: I worship only Him Who made me and He will certainly guide me
nupe: Sai de za nan jin alitta mi nan akika Wun ga wu mi bao

eng: And he left it as a Word to endure among those who came after him that they may turn back to Allah
nupe: Uciu fe egan wanciko naa danubo fe lo mini zuriyau zhio na ebo zawangizhi a daazhin eko yan gaskiya

eng: Yea I have given the good things of this life to these men and their fathers until the Truth has come to them and a messenger making things clear
nupe: Aa Mi dea za nananzhiy to yanmanciazhi ya fi izheo fe wo ma har be lokaci nan gaskiya Alkuranu be yaa nan ganni be Tuciy naa tula nan

eng: But when the Truth came to them they said This is sorcery and we do reject it
nupe: Kamina gaskiya Alkuranu be yaa nan a gan nan nan eyan ma uyio yimaa kafirinci jin beu yin

eng: Also they say Why is not this Qur´an sent down to some leading man in either of the two chief cities
nupe: A ci gan Kiy la aci cin Alkuranu nan nan be ya bagi ko ndoci mini Alkarya guba nazhiy wancin nan boa yino

eng: Is it they who would portion out the Mercy of thy Lord It is We Who portion out between them their livelihood in the life of this world and We raise some of them above others in ranks so that some may command work from others But the Mercy of thy Lord is better than the wealth which they amass
nupe: Kashi a gae gan eryatwa yan Tsoci wyo yo Ngan Yi gae gan Arzikiazhi ya izhe bo Yi maa daraja yan sashiazhi laata eti yan sashio ebo adeba la dozhi etun yegun yan Tsoci wyo ma ude alheri gan eyan izhe nanzhiy e ku ye kan nan

eng: And were it not that all men might become of one evil way of life We would provide for everyone that blasphemes against Allah Most Gracious silver roofs for their houses and silver stair-ways on which to go up
nupe: KaUjin ebo nan zawangizhi a bea zhea yan ni na boa eba fitina eyande izheo naa da yi ga katanti yan emi kafirizhi laafe azurfa to ekpa nanzhiy a fe da lo kata fiti nan

eng: And silver doors to their houses and thrones of silver on which they could recline
nupe: Yi maa kezhea kpako yan emiazhi to gadoazhi jin be azurfae nan a fe de kpetso ta nan

eng: And also adornments of gold But all this were nothing but conveniences of the present life The Hereafter in the sight of thy Lord is for the Righteous
nupe: To kaya ninpazhi kpata wuncinzhi ma eyan emawo izhe ayio akika ma emi yan zoba wangi wunajin tabbata ya za nanzhie tswa Soko nan

eng: If anyone withdraws himself from remembrance of Allah Most Gracious We appoint for him an evil one to be an intimate companion to him
nupe: Zandondo nan gae le izhe ke pipa Soko lugwa nan Yi ga shaitan laa pa ma beu yin Uci gaazhe eya manciu

eng: Such evil ones really hinder them from the Path but they think that they are being guided aright!Akika ma shaitanzhi gaa kan eko guruzhi yinda acia fe le ye ke eko bawu bo a kpeo nan
At length when such a one comes to Us he says to his evil companion Would that between me and thee were the distance of East and West! Ah! evil is the companion indeed!
nupe: Har da lokaci nan zagubaaba a be be eba Yi nan za wuncin cia gan gan Kasa re da aci gan kpikpe-ya dan tsakanimi bo be wyo yin ke tsakani eyi lazhin be eyilozuny nan wuna ba mi gan akika eya dede wyo yio

eng: At length when such a one comes to Us he says to his evil companion Would that between me and thee were the distance of East and West! Ah! evil is the companion indeed!
nupe: Har da lokaci nan zagubaaba a be be eba Yi nan za wuncin cia gan gan Kasa re da aci gan kpikpe-ya dan tsakanimi bo be wyo yin ke tsakani eyi lazhin be eyilozuny nan wuna ba mi gan akika eya dede wyo yio

eng: When ye have done wrong it will avail you nothing that Day that ye shall be partners in Punishment!
nupe: Uzuri nan nan wuna jin ye anfani yinnaa ebo nan ye yea eti tacin yezhi jin zwalunci dagan izhe boa ni Akika azaba gabo yea fi gannio

eng: Canst thou then make the deaf to hear or give direction to the blind or to such as wander in manifest error
nupe: Ngba wyo la tukpa tenci wo gan wo Kashi wyo la ye bonci leba ye wo To za nan gaafe dan mini egbin nan a tula nan ngba wyo lau ke eko wo

eng: Even if We take thee away We shall be sure to exact retribution from them
nupe: Uma ga bea fe gan Yia rayi wye gwo akika Yigaa wogbata

eng: Even if We take thee away We shall be sure to exact retribution from them
nupe: Uma ga bea fe gan Yia rayi wye gwo akika Yigaa wogbata

eng: Or We shall show thee that accomplished which We have promised them for verily We shall prevail over them
nupe: Ko ma Yi ga azaba nan Yie jina alkawali nan laa wu wye akika yi de kagbo eti yandondo

eng: So hold thou fast to the Revelation sent down to thee verily thou art on a Straight Way
nupe: A gwa sun wahyi nantso Yi la ya wyo nan akika wyo ta eti eko gboro

eng: The Qur´an is indeed the message for thee and for thy people and soon shall ye all be brought to accountAkika ma Alkuranu cinwan uyio ya wye to jamaa yan wyo zhi bele yin ma a gbine gan eti tswitswa yan hakkiuzhio
And question thou our messengers whom We sent before thee did We appoint any deities other than Allah Most Gracious to be worshipped
nupe: Wyo mao gbin Tuci nanzhi Yi tun-tun shi wyodzo nan gan ngba Yila Tsoci ndoci cici nan alittazhi a jin bauta ya baci Soko ALRAHMANUO nan

eng: We did send Moses aforetime with Our Signs to Pharaoh and his Chiefs He said I am a messenger of the Lord of the Worlds
nupe: Akika Yi tun Musa tun be aya Yizhi lo eba Firauna be jamaa yanu zhiy Uci gan Akika mi Tuci mi yio dagan eba Tsoci nae kpa alittazhi kpata nao

eng: We did send Moses aforetime with Our Signs to Pharaoh and his Chiefs He said I am a messenger of the Lord of the Worlds
nupe: Akika Yi tun Musa tun be aya Yizhi lo eba Firauna be jamaa yanu zhiy Uci gan Akika mi Tuci mi yio dagan eba Tsoci nae kpa alittazhi kpata nao

eng: We showed them Sign after Sign each greater than its fellow and We seized them with Punishment in order that they might turn to Us
nupe: Yi mae la aya wuaa sai de nan ga lekpan gan yan payin nan Yi cia wan be azabae ebo a debaa dazhin eko

eng: And they said O thou sorcerer! Invoke thy Lord for us according to His covenant with thee for we shall truly accept guidance
nupe: Aci gan Ya wye eyan manci ba aduwa be Tsoci wyo yin U to bo wahyi nan ujin ya wye naoula azaba ulau keuya bou ya yi akika yi gake eko

eng: But when We removed the Penalty from them behold they broke their word
nupe: Kamina Yi bea azaba la ke yabo yaa nan afelo alkawali ya

eng: And Pharaoh proclaimed among his people saying O my people! Does not the dominion of Egypt belong to me witness these streams flowing underneath my palace What! see ye not then
nupe: Firauna ci ya mi dan tacin jamaa yanuzhio u gan Ya ye jamaa yan mizhi ngba ujni mi ga wun mulki yan Misraa to edu nanzhie je dan tako mi bo naa Kashi ye leba ye lea

eng: Am I not better than this Moses who is a contemptible wretch and can scarcely express himself clearly
nupe: Kashi mi gye gan eza gba gbangi nan naa zanan kaa bayani u jin woa naa

eng: Then why are not gold bracelets bestowed on him or why come not with him angels accompanying him in procession
nupe: Kiiyla aci cin dukiya yan zinariyazhi ya wuna yino Kiy ma la malaikazhi la mi tuu zunma boa yino

eng: Thus did he make fools of his people and they obeyed him truly were they a people rebellious against Allah
nupe: Uci dzo dzo be ankali yan jamaa yanuzhi a tso cia mi tuu akika a fe jamaa nanzhiy a tula be lefi Sokoe nan

eng: When at length they provoked Us We exacted retribution from them and We drowned them all
nupe: Lokaci nan abea yi ku tso nan Yicia wan be azabae Yicia jin hallaka fi nuwano bae nioSurah  And We made them a people of the Past and an Example to later agesYi cia la fe etanzhi nanzhia shidzo nan a mafe misali ya eza zunmazhi

eng: When Jesus the son of Mary is held up as an example behold thy people raise a clamour thereat in ridicule!
nupe: Kami nan ajin misali yabe Isae egi Maryamae nan Kanga jama yan wyozhi cia pan ya ke eko lugwa

eng: And they say Are our gods best or he This they set forth to thee only by way of disputation yea they are a contentious people
nupe: Aci gan Ngba kuti yizhi tsa gano kashi Isa E  la misali la be ebo emigbo akika jamaazhi ayio nanzhiy ye bo ewu-sun nan

eng: He was no more than a servant We granted Our favour to him and We made him an example to the Children of Israel
nupe: Isa de U fea sai de wuzhi nan yi twarya niima ya nan Yiciu laa fe misali ya Banu Israilazhi

eng: And if it were Our Will We could make angels from amongst you succeeding each other on the earth
nupe: U ma ga bayi ba da yi ga Malaikazhi laa san ye gwa aci ga she bandondo mini kin bo

eng: And if it were Our Will We could make angels from amongst you succeeding each other on the earth
nupe: U ma ga bayi ba da yi ga Malaikazhi laa san ye gwa aci ga she bandondo mini kin boSurah And Jesus shall be a Sign for the coming of the Hour of Judgment therefore have no doubt about the Hour but follow ye Me this is a Straight WayAkika ma alama uyio yan tsonba alkiyami ega jin kelo kezhin ma yea emi tu mi nan nan ga yi eko nantso yi gboro nao

eng: Let not the Evil One hinder you for he is to you an enemy avowed
nupe: Ye mae ga lugwa shaitan tso tangi ya ye ma akika makiri ye uyio yan gbangba

eng: When Jesus came with Clear Signs he said Now have I come to you with Wisdom and in order to make clear to you some of the points on which ye dispute therefore fear Allah and obey me
nupe: Kaminan Isa be beya be bayanizhiy nan U gan Akika mi be ya ye be hikimae ebo ma min jin bayanin ya ye eti yan nanzhiy ye ce dozhi leba etiubo nan Ye de sundan Soko ye mae la mie tu mi

eng: For Allah He is my Lord and your Lord so worship ye Him this is a Straight Way
nupe: Akika Soko ga yi Tsoci mi yino to yan yetso ejin bauta yau nan nan ga yi eko nantso yi gboro nao

eng: But sects from among themselves fell into disagreement then woe to the wrong-doers from the Penalty of a Grievous Day!
nupe: Enan enaazhi cia ce leba be dozhi akika azaba robonkpe wunajin tabbat ya azwamizhi yan azaba yan fo wuncin nan yi titanci nan

eng: Do they only wait for the Hour - that it should come on them all of a sudden while they perceive not
nupe: Kashi a zhi bo zhi e tuye nan alkiyamia be dzun fia kamina a kpa yetua nan

eng: Friends on that day will be foes one to another- except the Righteous
nupe: Ekun dondo masoyizhi fo wuncin agaazhe makiri dozhi sai de masoyi nan zhie tswa Soko nan

eng: My devotees! no fear shall be on you that Day nor shall ye grieve-
nupe: Ya ye wuzhi Mizhi dansun ndondo danbo ya ye yinnaa ye maa le yangban yin yea

eng: Being those who have believed in Our Signs and bowed their wills to Ours in IslamA ga yi za nanzhia imani jin be aya Yizhi nao acia fe Musulumi wangi nao
Enter ye the Garden ye and your wives in beauty and rejoicing
nupe: A gan ya foga gan E gandan Aljannao to ye to yinmie zhi akika a ga ye fa yangban yinnan

eng: To them will be passed round dishes and goblets of gold there will be there all that the souls could desire all that their ayes could delight in and ye shall abide therein for eye
nupe: A fe maa kezhe be evozhi naajin be zinariy nan to kopuzhi yandondo na ma rayie wa nan fi bo to yannan eye ga leye wuna wo ma nan Ye maa fi miniubo fi tutun yin

eng: Such will be the Garden of which ye are made heirs for your good deeds in life
nupe: Aljanna wuncin a giu gun gi ya ye ebo iri etun wangizhi nanzhi ye fe lo nao

eng: Such will be the Garden of which ye are made heirs for your good deeds in life
nupe: Aljanna wuncin a giu gun gi ya ye ebo iri etun wangizhi nanzhi ye fe lo nao

eng: Ye shall have therein abundance of fruit from which ye shall have satisfaction
nupe: Yangici mari-marizhi fi bo ya ye dokun nanzhiy yea fe gi nan

eng: The sinners will be in the Punishment of Hell to dwell therein for aye
nupe: Akika le fi jinci zhi a fi mini azaba jahannamao tutun yin

eng: Nowise will the Punishment be lightened for them and in despair will they be there overwhelmed
nupe: Ato gban ya yan azabaa a maa kara dzun tinya boa

eng: Nowise shall We be unjust to them but it is they who have been unjust themselves
nupe: Yi man jina zwaluncia akika atso tsa yi za nanzhiy jin eti tacina zwalunci nao

eng: They will cry O Malik! would that thy Lord put an end to us! He will say Nay but ye shall abide!
nupe: Acia yi kabara gan Gan ya Tsoci wye u la yi yiu wu gancin Ucia gana gan Akika ye ba ga bo yea fi tutun yino

eng: Verily We have brought the Truth to you but most of you have a hatred for Truth
nupe: Akika Yi be ya ye be gaskiyae Kami nan ye fi izheo nan ammade ekun dondo ye zhi ye na gaskiya vo

eng: Kashi a yi be shiri y
nupe: an makirinci ndociy yi Akika ka yitso ma yi be shiriy

eng: Or do they think that We hear not their secrets and their private counsels Indeed We do and Our messengers are by them to record
nupe: Kashi a fe kpaye kpa gan yi wo asiri nanzhiy afe pa naa to egan swiswoci nanzhi afe gan naa Ujin acina ngan Tuci Yizhi Malaikazhi danbo nanzhie ka etun nanzhiy lo kpata nan

eng: Say If Allah Most Gracious had a son I would be the first to worship
nupe: Gan gan Daacigan Soko ALRAHMANU wuna de egi de akika mi ga yi za mafari yan za nanzhie jin bauta yau nao

eng: Glory to the Lord of the heavens and the earth the Lord of the Throne of Authority! He is free from the things they attribute to him!
nupe: Lili kpata ajin tabbata ya Etsu nae kpa sanmazhi to kin nan Etsu yan Alarashi akika wuna li ke yannanzhiy e la jiu ye nan lugwa

eng: So leave them to babble and play with vanities until they meet that Day of theirs which they have been promised
nupe: Alugwaa a fea dzo bazhia za a maa fea dzodzo a za har da lokaci nan a be gun be efo nan Soko ajina alkawali nae

eng: It is He Who is Allah in heaven and Allah on earth and He is full of Wisdom and Knowledge
nupe: Wun ga yi Soko dan mini sanmazhi bo Wunga ma yi Soko dan kin bo Etsu hikima uyio Etsu kpikpe uyio

eng: And blessed is He to Whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and all between them with Him is the Knowledge of the Hour of Judgment and to Him shall ye be brought back
nupe: Elatu wunajin tabbata ya Etsu nan wun mulki yan sanmazhi to kin nan to yannazhi fi tsakaniabo nan Kpikpe yan alkiyami mabeu yin Udano kpatae ma ebau ga yea kezhe lo

eng: And those whom they invoke besides Allah have no power of intercession- only he who bears witness to the Truth and they know him
nupe: Za nan zhiymae jin bauta ya baciu bo nan a de mulki yan egwa tan zandondoa sai de za nanzhi ga jin ri be adini gaskiyae nan a ma yi be kpikpe nan

eng: If thou ask them who created them they will certainly say Allah How then are they deluded away from the Truth
nupe: Wallahi wyo ma ga gbinagan gan Ngba ziy jin alitta ye yeo A gan gan Soko to beibo e kan yangban zhi lo beo

eng: Allah has knowledge of the Prophet´s cry O my Lord! Truly these are people who will not believe!
nupe: Ucia gan gan Ya wye Tsoci akika za nan nan zhiy jamaazhi ayio nanzhi jin imania nan

eng: Allah has knowledge of the Prophet´s cry O my Lord! Truly these are people who will not believe!
nupe: Ucia gan gan Ya wye Tsoci akika za nan nan zhiy jamaazhi ayio nanzhi jin imania nan

eng: But turn away from them and say Peace! But soon shall they know!
nupe: To a dzun ganabo wyo mao gan gan Midea hakkin cin etiebo ani Bele yin man abe de kpikpe

eng: Ha-Mim
nupe: HEU MIM

eng: By the Book that makes things clear-
nupe: Sokoe zhi kuti be Alkuranuy Litafi naa tula nan

eng: We sent it down during a Blessed Night for We ever wish to warn against Evil
nupe: Akika Yi cinu cin be dan mini yeshi yan albarkao Akika Yi yia fe za nanzhie jin gangba nan

eng: In the Night is made distinct every affair of wisdom
nupe: Miniubo gabo e kpe alamariko ndondo yeo

eng: By command from Our Presence For We ever send revelations
nupe: Alamari uyio dagan eba Yibo akika Yi Yia fe za nanzhie tun Tucizhi tun nan

eng: As Mercy from thy Lord for He hears and knows all things
nupe: Yegun ma uyio dagan eba Tsoci wyo bo Etsu uyio nae wo gan nan Etsu nan yi be kpikpe nan

eng: The Lord of the heavens and the earth and all between them if ye but have an assured faith
nupe: Wun ga yi Etsu nae kpa sanmazhi to kin to yan nanzhi fi tsakaniabo nao wuna yi eza gaskiyazhi ye yio nan

eng: There is no god but He It is He Who gives life and gives death- The Lord and Cherisher to you and your earliest ancestors
nupe: Ade yandoci nan ajin bauta ya naa sai wuny wun gae dan yan rayio wun ga mae wu rayio Wun ga yi Tsoci ye yeo to yan yanmanci yezhi nanzhiy shidzo nao

eng: Yet they play about in doubt
nupe: Akika a dea fe dan mini kelo kezhino acie dzodzoSurah Then watch thou for the Day that the sky will bring forth a kind of smoke or mist plainly visibleFe tuye yan efo nan sanmaa fela enanwuzhi tinya nan enanwu naa tula nan

eng: Enveloping the people this will be a Penalty Grievous
nupe: Uci ga rukpe zawangi zhi nan nan ga yi efo azaba nan tan nao

eng: They will say Our Lord! remove the Penalty from us for we do really believe!
nupe: Ya wye Tsoci yi a azaba la ke ya bo ya yi akika yi ga afe Muminizhi

eng: How shall the message be effectual for them seeing that an Messenger explaining things clearly has already come to them-
nupe: Biybo anfani yan sinsantu dan yaao alkiyami bo Alali ma Tucizhi be ya izheo be bayanizhi  a ma ya gaskiyaa

eng: Yet they turn away from him and say Tutored by others a man possessed!Adea zunma zhetau aci gan egi makanta uyio Uma ke yi ilanduci
We shall indeed remove the Penalty for a while but truly ye will revert to your ways
nupe: Akika Yia jin sauki azaba yaa degi akika ye yea kezhe da eko yan etun dedezhi be

eng: We shall indeed remove the Penalty for a while but truly ye will revert to your ways
nupe: Akika Yia jin sauki azaba yaa degi akika ye yea kezhe da eko yan etun dedezhi be

eng: One day We shall seize you with a mighty onslaught We will indeed then exact Retribution!
nupe: Fo nan Yi ga wan zazhi kpantsukuy nan akika fo wuncin Yi ga kafirizhi jin azaba

eng: Saying Restore to me the Servants of Allah I am to you an messenger worthy of all trust
nupe: Uci gan Yea wuzhi Soko zhi ku be ya mi akika Tuci mi yio ya ye na ma yi eza amana nan

eng: And be not arrogant as against Allah for I come to you with authority manifest
nupe: Ye mae ga lati dan fino ya Soko ma akika mia be ya ye be hujjazhiy nanzhia tula nan

eng: For me I have sought safety with my Lord and your Lord against your injuring me
nupe: Mi mae ba etswa be Tsoci mi yin to yan ye ebo eyan na yeabe ce mi nan

eng: But they were aggressive then he cried to his Lord These are indeed a people given to sin
nupe: Uci ba aduwalo eba Tsociu gan Akika za nan nazhiy eza lefizhi ayio

eng: If ye believe me not at least keep yourselves away from me
nupe: Kagan ye maa ya gaskiya be mi yina to yea dzun gan mi bo

eng: But they were aggressive then he cried to his Lord These are indeed a people given to sin
nupe: Uci ba aduwalo eba Tsociu gan Akika za nan nazhiy eza lefizhi ayio

eng: The reply came March forth with My Servants by night for ye are sure to be pursued
nupe: Soko ci ganu gan A ezan la tinya to wye to wuzhi mizhi be yshiy akika za dede nan nan zhiy aga emi tu ye ye mae la edue lugwa eti kendoe uyi nan akika jamaa yan kafirizhi eza hallakazhi ayio

eng: And leave the sea as a furrow divided for they are a host destined to be drowned
nupe: Ye mae la edue lugwa eti kendoe uyi nan akika jamaa yan kafirizhi eza hallakazhi ayio

eng: How many were the gardens and springs they left behind
nupe: Ekun dondoa cia tinya a latiazhi to -- gaa zhi lugwa

eng: And corn-fields and noble buildings
nupe: To yan nanzhi a dzo kpata nan to emi ko nanzhi a tu nan

eng: And wealth and conveniences of life wherein they had taken such delight!
nupe: To eyan emawoazhi nanzhiy afe wo ma fi nan

eng: Thus was their end! And We made other people inherit those things!
nupe: Acinga ga u yio Yi cia laa gi gun ya zandocizhi kayin

eng: And neither heaven nor earth shed a tear over them nor were they given a respite again
nupe: To sanma to kin ma a tigi ya hallakaaa ma fe za nanzhiy a tuye gan ko a jin tuba naa

eng: We did deliver aforetime the Children of Israel from humiliating Punishment
nupe: Akika yi ya Banu Israilazhi wadzun dagan azaba yan zunye suno

eng: Inflicted by Pharaoh for he was arrogant even among inordinate transgressors
nupe: Dagan egun Firaunao akika eza uyio nae la ti dan fino nan u ma yi za nae nyin yan ta eti kin bo nan

eng: And We chose them aforetime above the nations knowingly
nupe: Akika yi ga tsa be kpikpe Yi yin ta eti alittazhi kpatao

eng: And granted them Signs in which there was a manifest trial
nupe: Yima la ayazhi be yaa nanzhi miniabo mima cinlezhi fi bo nan

eng: As to these Quraish they say forsooth
nupe: Akika za nannazhiy ajin afe da egan gan gan

eng: There is nothing beyond our first death and we shall not be raised again
nupe: Yandondo danboa tsutsu de zunni uyio a maa ku yi yekan alkiyami boa

eng: Then bring back our forefathers if what ye say is true!
nupe: Wunayi gaskiya ga yetao eku yamanci yizhi tinya dagan kabariazhio yi le ye

eng: What! Are they better than the people of Tubba and those who were before them We destroyed them because they were guilty of sin
nupe: Ngba a ga yi eza alherio kashi jamaa yan Tubbauzhi To zananzhi shiadzo kpata nan Yia jin hallaka Akika aafe lefi jin ci zhi

eng: We created not the heavens the earth and all between them merely in idle sport
nupe: Yi ma jin sanmazhi to kin to yan nanzhi fi tsakaniabo nan ebo edzo boa

eng: We created them not except for just ends but most of them do not understand
nupe: Yi jina jina sai de ebo Yi tso gaskiya ammade ekun dondo zawangizhi a kpea

eng: Verily the Day of sorting out is the time appointed for all of them-
nupe: Akika efo hukunci ba uga yi lokacia baeni bo

eng: The Day when no protector can avail his client in aught and no help can they receive
nupe: Efo nan eya wuna kunke be yandondoe ya eya wuna nan amaa jin dozhi taimako woa

eng: Except such as receive Allah´s Mercy for He is Exalted in Might Most Merciful
nupe: sai de zana Sokoa gun yeu nan akika Etsu zankpe uyio Etsu yegun uyio

eng: Verily the tree of Zaqqum
nupe: Akika cigban yan zakkumu

eng: Will be the food of the Sinful-
nupe: Yangici lefi jincizhi uyio

eng: Like molten brass it will boil in their insides
nupe: Uyi ke yankpa zunzunci nan wuna fe gbin fe sa fi gbakozhioSurah  Like the boiling of scalding waterKe si sa yan nuwan yipa nan

eng: A voice will cry Seize ye him and drag him into the midst of the Blazing Fire!
nupe: Yea egwa sunu kpantsukuy ye mae gbau yecie la wune ce dan tacin enan yan jahimuo

eng: Then pour over his head the Penalty of Boiling Water
nupe: Gancin ye cie da nuwan yipa yan azaba gwae be kpea etiazhioSurah Taste thou this! Truly wast thou mighty full of honour!Fe fin azaba ngan wyo gan wyo ga yi za wanciko naa zankpe nao

eng: Truly this is what ye used to doubt!
nupe: Nan nan ga yi yan nan ye fe jin kelo kezhin be yin nao

eng: As to the Righteous they will be in a position of Security
nupe: Akika Muminizhi a fi mini emi yan amincio

eng: Among Gardens and Springs
nupe: Mini Aljannazhio nan zhiy nuwanzhie je fi takoabo nan

eng: Dressed in fine silk and in rich brocade they will face each other
nupe: Aci ga ewo yan silikizhi fan acia fe ban nan aciga fe dun a eye zhe wu dozhi

eng: So and We shall join them to fair women with beautiful big and lustrous eyes
nupe: Acinga gao Yici jin yawozhi yaa be ynzagi Aljannazhiy nanzhi eye kosunazhie bannan nan

eng: There can they call for every kind of fruit in peace and security
nupe: Acia fe wa gigi yan yangici mari-marizhi a ma fi bo be aminciy

eng: Nor will they there taste Death except the first death and He will preserve them from the Penalty of the Blazing Fire
nupe: #NAME?

eng: As a Bounty from thy Lord! that will be the supreme achievement!
nupe: Nan nan daraja uyio dagan eba Tsoci wyo bo wuncin ga ma yi rabo nan wancin nao

eng: Verily We have made this Qur´an easy in thy tongue in order that they may give heed
nupe: Akika yi ga Alkuranu fan be gintara wyo yin ebo adeba a la sana tu

eng: So wait thou and watch for they too are waiting
nupe: Fe tu hallakaye akika kafirizhio tso a dan yetu yan hallaka wyo bo

eng: Ha-Mim
nupe: HEU MIM

eng: The revelation of the Book is from Allah the Exalted in Power Full of Wisdom
nupe: Cin cin yan Litafi nan nan dagan eba Soko bo u fe beo Etsu zankpe Etsu hikima

eng: Verily in the heavens and the earth are Signs for those who believe
nupe: Akika mini sanmazhio to kin ayazhi danbo ya Muminizhi

eng: And in the creation of yourselves and the fact that animals are scattered through the earth are Signs for those of assured Faith
nupe: To mini alitta ye zhio to mini dabba nanzhiy ga kpe kinbo nan ayazhi danbo ya jamaa nanzhia gaskiya ya nan

eng: And in the alternation of Night and Day and the fact that Allah sends down Sustenance from the sky and revives therewith the earth after its death and in the change of the winds- are Signs for those that are wise
nupe: To egwasan yan yeshi be batiny to arziki nanzhiy Soko cin beyn dagan sanmao nan Ucia kin tsutsuci dan rayi nan to mini efe nae ti ucie je za nan kpata ayazhi danbo ya jamaa nanzhi ga yi be ankaliy nan

eng: Such are the Signs of Allah which We rehearse to thee in Truth then in what exposition will they believe after rejecting Allah and His Signs
nupe: Wuncinzhi kpata ayazhi ayio yan Soko Yi mae gbaagba ya wye be gaskiyae Ngba zunma yan Soko be ayauzhiy ka gan ye ya gaskiya bea yina egan kici a ya gaskiya be yin beo

eng: Woe to each sinful dealer in Falsehoods
nupe: Azaba yan robonkpe wunajin tabbata ya zaeni ndondo na gae zun ganmanan tsuru nan u ma yi lefi jinci nan

eng: He hears the Signs of Allah rehearsed to him yet is obstinate and lofty as if he had not heard them then announce to him a Penalty Grievous!
nupe: Wune wo nae gba aya Soko zhi yau nan gancin uci ga tu-ta eti etikagbo ufe jin bojin ke zanae wo gana nan e yau labari be azabae nan yi tintanci nan

eng: And when he learns something of Our Signs he takes them in jest for such there will be a humiliating Penalty
nupe: Uma ga kpikpe ndoci de dagan mini aya Yizhio wunu la eyan edzo akika zawuncinzhi azaba yan zunyesun u gajin tabbata yaa

eng: In front of them is Hell and of no profit to them is anything they may have earned nor any protectors they may have taken to themselves besides Allah for them is a tremendous Penalty
nupe: Enan yan jahannama danbo e kaa yan nanzhiy ma a de kuyekan izheo nan wuna kunke yaa eko ndondo boa to zandocizhi nanzhiy a la egwasun ke ndakatazhi nan a kunke ya eko ndondo boa azaba na ma wancin nan wunajin tabbata yaa

eng: This is true Guidance and for those who reject the Signs of their Lord is a grievous Penalty of abomination
nupe: Alkuranu Nan nan bawu uyio za nanzhiy ma ajin kafirinci be aya Tsocia zhiy nan azaba nan de nangban uma tan nan wunajin tabbata yaa

eng: It is Allah Who has subjected the sea to you that ships may sail through it by His command that ye may seek of his Bounty and that ye may be grateful
nupe: Soko ga yi Etsu nan jin eduzhi foro ya yeo nao ebo eya nuwanzhi a fea dazanata etiubo be kagbo yan Sokoe ebo ma ye fe wa arziki yan Sokoe za be wunciny ma ye lae fe za nanzhie jin yebo ya Soko nan

eng: It is Allah Who has subjected the sea to you that ships may sail through it by His command that ye may seek of his Bounty and that ye may be grateful
nupe: Soko ga yi Etsu nan jin eduzhi foro ya yeo nao ebo eya nuwanzhi a fea dazanata etiubo be kagbo yan Sokoe ebo ma ye fe wa arziki yan Sokoe za be wunciny ma ye lae fe za nanzhie jin yebo ya Soko nan

eng: And He has subjected to you as from Him all that is in the heavens and on earth Behold in that are Signs indeed for those who reflect
nupe: U maa yannanzhiy fi sanmazhio nan to nan zhiy fi kinbo nan jin foro ya ye baenio dagan nko u bo akika mini wuncinzhio ayazhi danbo ya za nanzhiy gae kpaye nan

eng: Tell those who believe to forgive those who do not look forward to the Days of Allah It is for Him to recompense for good or ill each People according to what they have earned
nupe: Gan ya za nanzhia imani jin nan gan afa be za nanzhiy e jin kauna yan egagba wangi dan efo yan Soko zhi boa nan Ebo nan Soko ga zawangizhi wo gbata be iri etun nanzhiy a ga lo nan

eng: If any one does a righteous deed it ensures to the benefit of his own soul if he does evil it works against his own soul In the end will ye all be brought back to your Lord
nupe: Za nan ga lo etun wangi nan ebo tiu bo za na ma ga lo tun dede nan wuntso ga wuna wu yan yao gancin eba Tsoci ye ga yea kezhe lo

eng: We did aforetime grant to the Children of Israel the Book the Power of Command and Prophethood We gave them for Sustenance things good and pure and We favoured them above the nations
nupe: Akika Yi ya Litafi to hukunci to Annabci laa ya Banu Israilazhi Yi ma yaa arziki wangizhi Yi maa ya daraja ta eti alittazhio

eng: And We granted them Clear Signs in affairs of Religion it was only after knowledge had been granted to them that they fell into schisms through insolent envy among themselves Verily thy Lord will judge between them on the Day of Judgment as to those matters in which they set up differences
nupe: Yi ma la hujjazhi be yaa nanzhia tula nan eti alamari adinio Ama ce dozhi lebaa sai de baci nan kpikpe da be yaa nan ebo nanvo hassada nan dan tsakaniabo be dozhiy nan Akika Tsoci wye ga hukunci ba tsakaniabo efo alkiyamiy eti yan nanzhie la ce le ba be dozhiy nan

eng: Then We put thee on the right Way of Religion so follow thou that Way and follow not the desires of those who know not
nupe: Gancin Yicia wyo laa ta eti ekp yan sharia yan alamari adinio ebo acino ami tuu wyo mao ga la mi tu etun yangban yan za nanzhi de kpikpea na ma

eng: They will be of no use to thee in the sight of Allah it is only Wrong-doers that stand as protectors one to another but Allah is the Protector of the Righteous
nupe: Akika a kunke ya wye wo be yandondoe naa be dagan eba Soko naa akika ma azwalumizhi masoyizhi ayi be dozhi yino Soko ga ma yi Ndakata yan za nanzhie sundanu nao

eng: These are clear evidences to men and a Guidance and Mercy to those of assured Faith
nupe: Alkuranu nan nan hujjazhi uyi ya zawangizhio ganni be bawuy be yeguny ya jamaa nanzhia gaskiya ya nao

eng: What! Do those who seek after evil ways think that We shall hold them equal with those who believe and do righteous deeds- that equal will be their life and their death Ill is the judgment that they make
nupe: Kashi za nanzhie lo tun dede nan e kpayekpa gan Yi laa ya afe yeni be za nanzhia imani jin amae lo tun guru nan a laazhe yeni to eba edunfe izheo be eba ajaliy Wunayi acinga ga e kpa yeo akika hukunci wuncin wuna biye

eng: Allah created the heavens and the earth for just ends and in order that each soul may find the recompense of what it has earned and none of them be wronged
nupe: Soko ma alitta yan sanmazhi to kin jin be gaskiyae Ebo ma aga zandondo gba be iri etun nan u ga lo nae amaa jina zwaluncia

eng: Then seest thou such a one as takes as his god his own vain desire Allah has knowing him as such left him astray and sealed his hearing and his heart and understanding and put a cover on his sight Who then will guide him after Allah has withdrawn Guidance Will ye not then receive admonition
nupe: Ngba wyo le za naa etun yangbanu la tsociunan yea Soko ciu gbin eti kpikpeo U ciu tukpa to yangbanute Ucia kpere laa kpeu ba ye leu bo Ngba ziya wu za nan nan ba wo baci Soko bo Kashi ye kpa ye kpaa

eng: And they say What is there but our life in this world We shall die and we live and nothing but time can destroy us But of that they have no knowledge they merely conjecture
nupe: Aci gan yandondo danboa izhe le tsau yio yi gaatsu yi ma gaa ye rayi de yandondo maajin-yi hallaka sai de zamam Ade kpikpe yan akika eti wuncin boa ama de yan nan e jin naa sai de zato

eng: And when Our Clear Signs are rehearsed to them their argument is nothing but this They say Bring back our forefathers if what ye say is true!
nupe: Kamina ma a gae gba aya yi zhi yaa be bayaniy nan e de hujja ndondoa sai de a gan gan E la yanmanci yizhi nanzhia tsuani na be yi lea ye wunayi gaskiya ye tao nan

eng: Say It is Allah Who gives you life then gives you death then He will gather you together for the Day of Judgment about which there is no doubt But most men do not understand
nupe: Gan gan Soko gae dan rayi umaa kezhe a ye wu gancin uci gae ku yekan efo alkiyamiy kelo kezhin ndondo danboa ammade ekun dondo zawangizhi akpea

eng: To Allah belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and the Day that the Hour of Judgment is established- that Day will the dealers in Falsehood perish!
nupe: Akika Soko ga wun mulki yan sanmazhi to kin bo efo nan alkiyami gaa nan nan fo wuncin ganmana zuncizhi gaajin asara

eng: And thou wilt see every sect bowing the knee Every sect will be called to its Record This Day shall ye be recompensed for all that ye did!
nupe: Wyo maale alumma ndondo ye ci kurao ta eti vokpaa bo Acia yi alumma ndondo lo eba Litafiu Yinnannnan aaga ye gba yan etun nanzhiy ye fe lo izheo nan

eng: This Our Record speaks about you with truth For We were wont to put on Record all that ye did
nupe: Nan nan Litafi Yi uyio wune gan gan eti yebo be gaskiyae akika Yi yaafe yi fe ka etun nanzhiy ye fe lo nan

eng: Then as to those who believed and did righteous deeds their Lord will admit them to His Mercy that will be the achievement for all to see
nupe: Ammade za nanzhi ga imani jin acie lo tun wangizhi nan Tsocia gaala gandan mini yegunu bo wuncin ga yi rabo nan latu nao

eng: But as to those who rejected Allah to them will be said Were not Our Signs rehearsed to you But ye were arrogant and were a people given to sin!
nupe: Za nanzhiy ma ajin kafirinci nan a gana gan Asa afe gba aya Mizhi ya ye yea Ye cia gbotika ye cia fe za nanzhie jin lefi kpe kinbo nan

eng: And when it was said that the promise of Allah was true and that the Hour- there was no doubt about its coming ye used to say ´We know not what is the hour we only think it is an idea and we have no firm assurance´
nupe: A ma ga gana gan Akika alkawali yan Soko gaskiya uyio alkiyami ma kelo kezhin ndondo danboa Ye gan Yi kpe yan naotso e ye alkiyami naa yi de ejin zatto jin kawanyin yi ya gaskiya beu yina

eng: Then will appear to them the evil fruits of what they did and they will be completely encircled by that which they used to mock at!
nupe: Egagba yan etun dede nanzhiy a lo nan cia tula yaa yannan a fe la a lami nan cia jin tabbata ta etiabo

eng: It will also be said This Day We will forget you as ye forgot the meeting of this Day of yours! and your abode is the Fire and no helpers have ye!
nupe: Aci a gana gan Yinnan nan nan Yi ga ye batan kendoe ye tsoa efo gun-gun yan ye be efo alkiyami nan batan nan ezhe kebae ma u ga yi enao ye maade za nanzhia jine taimako naa

eng: This because ye used to take the Signs of Allah in jest and the life of the world deceived you From that Day therefore they shall not be taken out thence nor shall they be received into Grace
nupe: Wuncin mayi ebo nan ye yaa aya Soko zhi la edzo nan edunfe yan izhe cia ye ta yinnannnan a kua tinya enan boa amma lugwa ade uzuri ndondo taa

eng: Then Praise be to Allah Lord of the heavens and Lord of the earth- Lord and Cherisher of all the Worlds!
nupe: Yebo kpata ajin tabbata ya Soko Etsu nan yi Tsoci yan sanmazhi to kin nan Etsu nae kpa alittazhi kpata nan

eng: To Him be glory throughout the heavens and the earth and He is Exalted in Power Full of Wisdom!
nupe: Elatu be kagbo yan baeni maajin tabbata ya Soko dan sanmanzhio to kin bo Soko ga ma yi etsu zankpeo Etsu nan yi Etsu hikima nan

eng: Ha-Mim
nupe: Heu-Meem Harafi guba nna zhi baki zhi ayio yan zhimi larabci Sisantu ayio ya zaeni ndondo na gae jin kelo-kezhin dan gaskiya bo yan Alkuranuo na Baki iri nna zhi gaala fin dozhi ci jin ALKURANUO alitta sama to kin ma a ga gunyekan a la sura ko aya nini dozhin yan Alkuranu bewoa

eng: The Revelation of the Book is from Allah the Exalted in Power Full of Wisdom
nupe: Litafi nan nan ALKURANU e yan cin-cin ci uyio dagan eba Soko na yi ALLAHU nan Etsu na de zankpe ta eti zandondo nan Etsu nan yi Egba dan jin jin yandondo nan

eng: We created not the heavens and the earth and all between them but for just ends and for a Term Appointed But those who reject Faith turn away from that whereof they are warned
nupe: Yi Soko jin alitta sanmazhi to kin to yannazhi fi tacinazhio nan jina sai dai ebo alittazhi a twso gaskiyayan bauta jin ya Soko gbuu gi Yandondo ma yi be iyakau yin akika za nanzhi a cin manan bo be Sokoe nan ajin a fe bici ewun-nan yan gaskiya

eng: Say Do ye see what it is ye invoke besides Allah Show me what it is they have created on earth or have they a share in the heavens bring me a book revealed before this or any remnant of knowledge ye may have if ye are telling the truth!
nupe: Annabi Gan yaa gan Ye la hankali tu yannazhi Ye jin bauta ya ke Soko lugwa naa Yanna a ga kunke be jin jinu yin dan kinbo na e la wu Minle ye Kashi a pama pa be Sokoe eba jin jin be mulki samazhiy E la Litafi ndoci be na tswo ye le ye gan wuna shi Alkuranu dzo nae ko ma kpikpe yan gaskiya ndoci na ye gae pe tu nan wuna yi eza gaskiya zhi ye yio nan

eng: And who is more astray than one who invokes besides Allah such as will not answer him to the Day of Judgment and who in fact are unconscious of their call to them
nupe: Ziy ga fe eza gbingbinci nan a gan za na e jin bawta ya yan ndoci ko za ndoci ke Soko lugwa nao Za wuncin zhi ma a she guri u Ya u woa har da fo nan a jin kiyama naa Za wuncin zhi ma eye yaci zhi a yio a kpe o tswo gan ejin bawta ya aa

eng: And when mankind are gathered together at the Resurrection they will be hostile to them and reject their worship altogether!
nupe: Fo na Soko ga alittazhi ku ye kan kpata nan za na zhi ye jin bawta ya izhe o nan ga zhe makiri yezhi a ma ga egwazhi wa gan u jin a tunye yin jinaSurah  When Our Clear Signs are rehearsed to them the Unbelievers say of the Truth when it comes to them This is evident sorcery!Ka mi nan a gae gba aya yan Yi zhi AKURANU yaa gan ni be bayani yan gaskiya zhiinan Za nan zhi a cin mana bo Sokoe na a jin a fe gan gan dede eti gaskiya nan be yaa naa A  jin a gan gan  Alkuranu nanan eyanma tsa u yio

eng: Or do they say He has forged it Say Had I forged it then can ye obtain no single blessing for me from Allah He knows best of that whereof ye talk so glibly! Enough is He for a witness between me and you! And he is Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful
nupe: Kashi za nan zhi e cin mana bo be Sokoe na e gan gangan Annabi o tswa ga tswa ALKURANU be ti U yino Gan yaganWuna yi gan mi tswau tswa ebo yan ndoci o KiI ye a kan gwau ya mi wo eba Soko bo Ammade Soko tswa ga yi Eri naa kunke ya mi tsakani mi bo be ye yin nao U ga ma yi Etsu gaafarao U ga ma yi Etsu yegun-o

eng: Say I am no bringer of new-fangled doctrine among the messengers nor do I know what will be done with me or with you I follow but that which is revealed to me by inspiration I am but a Warner open and clear
nupe: Gan yaa ganMi jin eza woro mini Tuci zhi boa Tuci Soko zhi be shi mi dzo be iri nan naeMi ma kpe iri hukunci swiswoci ndoci nan Soko a be eti Mi tswa to ye tswo naa Mi mae la mi tu yan ndondoa sai na Soko ga jin wahayin be ya Mi nan Mi ma yi yandoa sai dai Tuci Soko na e jinye gangba eti azaba Soko be bayani nan zhi tu la nan

eng: Say See ye If this teaching be from Allah and ye reject it and a witness from among the Children of Israel testifies to its similarity with earlier scripture and has believed while ye are arrogant how unjust ye are! truly Allah guides not a people unjust
nupe: Annabi Gan ganNgba U ga bea tu la gan ALKURANU nan nan eba Soko bo u fe beo ye ma fe ma fe za nan zhi a jin kafirinci beu yin na kiabe yi e gagba ye efo Alkiyami yin o Alhali ma eza wanciko mini ye tswo wuna eri jina ni ke gaskiyau yio nan Za wuncin maa imani jin be bawu Sokoe Ye cia fe za nan zhi e la ti dan fino nan Akika Soko e la jamaa yan azwalumizhi ke ekwo wangia

eng: The Unbelievers say of those who believe If this Message were a good thing such men would not have gone to it first before us! And seeing that they guide not themselves thereby they will say this is an old falsehood!

eng: And before this was the Book of Moses as a guide and a mercy And this Book confirms it in the Arabic tongue to admonish the unjust and as Glad Tidings to those who do right

eng: O ye who believe!
