nupe: Wyo a le za nazhi batan fi yangbanazhio na ye edinye da lo dan miniabo acie gan gan Yi esundan ebo masiba ndoci be tswan yi ma To kengi uyio na Sokoa la eko kpe ndoci beyn koma foro ndoci dagan nko Ubo gancin acia bea fe za nazhi eti ro-- nkpe na eti eyan dede nazhi afe swofi yangbanazhio na

eng: And those who believe will say Are these the men who swore their strongest oaths by Allah that they were with you All that they do will be in vain and they will fall into nothing but ruin
nupe: Za nazhi maaimani jin na cie gan gan Ngba zanazhi ga zhikuti be Sokoe har da iyaka kutizhiazhi kede akika be ye yin adano nao Etunazhi a gbin ya acia fe eza hasarazhi

eng: O ye who believe! if any from among you turn back from his Faith soon will Allah produce a people whom He will love as they will love Him- lowly with the believers mighty against the rejecters fighting in the way of Allah and never afraid of the reproaches of such as find fault That is the grace of Allah which He will bestow on whom He pleaseth And Allah encompasseth all and He knoweth all things
nupe: Ya ye nazhia imani jin na! Zaeni ndondo na ga ridda jin cia adiniu nyin ya miniebo na to Soko otso a la zandocizhi be tinya Soko a yeboaatso maafe yebo Soko a fe dakpya ya muminizhi amaafe wu zankpe ta eti kafirizhio Afe jin jihadi ta eti eko Soko amaa sun dan egan gan yan za nazhie gana yin naa Wuncin ma eryatwa uyio yan Soko na wyune laya za na ga bau na Sokoma Etsu bagwo uyio Etsu kpi kpe uyio

eng: Your real friends are no less than Allah His Messenger and the fellowship of believers- those who establish regular prayers and regular charity and they bow down humbly in worship
nupe: Akika Ndakatako ye nayi eyamanciko ye na Ugayi Soko to Tuciu to zanazhia imani jin nao za nazhie ku swallah gikini na amae wa zakka na amae dokun be lulo yan ruku-na

eng: As to those who turn for friendship to Allah His Messenger and the fellowship of believers- it is the fellowship of Allah that must certainly triumph
nupe: Zandondo na ga Soko la Ndakatako nayi eyamanciko na to Tuciu to zanazhia imani jin na to akika jamaa yan Soko zhi aga wun zankpeo

eng: O ye who believe! take not for friends and protectors those who take your religion for a mockery or sport- whether among those who received the Scripture before you or among those who reject Faith but fear ye Allah if ye have faith indeed
nupe: Ya ye nazhia imani jin na! Ega la za nazhie la adini yemi acie lau dzodzo dagan mini zaba litafizhi nazhi shiye dzo na to kafirizhi masoyizhi ma Ye mae sundan Soko wunayi muminizhi ga ye yio na

eng: When ye proclaim your call to prayer they take it but as mockery and sport that is because they are a people without understanding
nupe: Kamina Ye gae yi zazhi lo jin jin swalla na u la eyan emila be edzoe Wuncin ma yi ebo na afe zanazhi de ankalia na

eng: Say O people of the Book! Do ye disapprove of us for no other reason than that we believe in Allah and the revelation that hath come to us and that which came before us and perhaps that most of you are rebellious and disobedient
nupe: Gan gan ya ye za ba litafizhi! Kashi ye le lefi yi le ye Wuncin dea yi ebo gaskita na yi ya be Sokoe na to yanna acin be zhiudzo na uma yi ebo na ekun dondo yezhi fasikizhi ye yio na

eng: Say Shall I point out to you something much worse than this as judged by the treatment it received from Allah those who incurred the curse of Allah and His wrath those of whom some He transformed into apes and swine those who worshipped evil- these are many times worse in rank and far more astray from the even path!
nupe: Gan gan Ngba min ya ye labari yan yandoci na tso biye gan wuncin ega gbao eba Soko na Uga yi za na Soko u bomi ucia zhe wun beu yin nao ucia ndocizhi miniabo laazhe ebegizhi tokpuutsun zhi to nazhi wun tagutu eyandedezhi na Zawunci zhi ga yi eza kinigi ba bi bi cizhio aga ma fu ya gano ke eko wangi lugwao

eng: When they come to thee they say We believe but in fact they enter with a mind against Faith and they go out with the same but Allah knoweth fully all that they hide
nupe: Agan-gan-dan be kafirinciy atso ma de kpi kpi gan eti yan nazhi afe-swo na

eng: Many of them dost thou see racing each other in sin and rancour and their eating of things forbidden Evil indeed are the things that they do
nupe: Wyo maale kun-dondo miniabo ye afe san nin dan mini etun lefio be gbin gbintu iyaka Sokoe to gigi azhi yan yangici haramuzhio Akika bibi be gwosuny ajin tabbata ya etun nazhie lo na

eng: Why do not the rabbis and the doctors of Law forbid them from their habit of uttering sinful words and eating things forbidden Evil indeed are their works
nupe: Kil la man yan Soko ye kpezhi to man wancikozhi ci kana egan le fizhi to gi gi yan haramua yino Akika bibi be gwosuny wuna jin tabbata ya etun nazhi a fe lo na

eng: The Jews say Allah´s hand is tied up Be their hands tied up and be they accursed for the blasphemy they utter Nay both His hands are widely outstretched He giveth and spendeth of His bounty as He pleaseth But the revelation that cometh to thee from Allah increaseth in most of them their obstinate rebellion and blasphemy Amongst them we have placed enmity and hatred till the Day of Judgment Every time they kindle the fire of war Allah doth extinguish it but they ever strive to do mischief on earth And Allah loveth not those who do mischief
nupe: Yahuduzhi ma gan Egwa Soko a wan gwo u twarya wo bea  A egwaatso wanpa gwo kuruo amaa bomi ebo egan dede na agan na Aa ujin acina egau guba ba kpikpeci ayio titacimaayio gubaba wyune laaaya alittazhi kendoe ga bau na Akika ma yan na acin be ya wyoe dagan eba Tsoci wyobo na wuna be ekun dondo miniabo eti kagbo be kafirinciy-be Yi ma ewun sun be nanvoe laace dan tsakaniabo har da Efo Alkiyami Kandondo na aga ena dan yan ekun gun Sokoe lau nu Acie jin dalo dazhin fi kinbo eti eyan nyino alali ma Sokoe wa za za nazhie nyin yan naa

eng: If only the People of the Book had believed and been righteous We should indeed have blotted out their iniquities and admitted them to gardens of bliss
nupe: Da aci gan akika zaba litafizhi a imani jinjin aci sundan Soko da yi ga etun dedeazhi pa ya ya da yi ma gaa lagandan Aljannazhio nazhi yi emi ni ima na

eng: If only they had stood fast by the Law the Gospel and all the revelation that was sent to them from their Lord they would have enjoyed happiness from every side There is from among them a party on the right course but many of them follow a course that is evil
nupe: Da aci gan a litafi Attaura to Injeela ku ku gikini to litafi ndoci naacin be yaa dagan eba Tsoci abo na daa Soko maa fe yaa yangici dagan fititiabo to dagan tako bicitaabo Miniabo jamaazhi danbo nazhi yi za tatacin na ekun dondo miniabo ma etun nazhie lo na wuna biye

eng: O Messenger! proclaim the message which hath been sent to thee from thy Lord If thou didst not thou wouldst not have fulfilled and proclaimed His mission And Allah will defend thee from men who mean mischief For Allah guideth not those who reject Faith
nupe: Ya wyoe Tuci! A wyan wu yan yanna acin be ya wyoe dagan eba Tsoci wyo bo na kagan wyo ma jin acina to wyo wuyan etun naatun wyo naa dano na Akika Sokoe la jamaa yan kafirizhi ke eko gunua

eng: Say O People of the Book! ye have no ground to stand upon unless ye stand fast by the Law the Gospel and all the revelation that has come to you from your Lord It is the revelation that cometh to thee from thy Lord that increaseth in most of them their obstinate rebellion and blasphemy But sorrow thou not over these people without Faith
nupe: Gan gan Ya ye zaba litafizhi! Ye yea fe ta eti yandondo yan cinwan boa sai ye ga litafi Attaura to Injeela laa ku gikini to ndoci naaga cin be ya ye dagan eba Tsoci ye bo na Yan na maaacin be ya wyoe dagan eba Tsoci wyo bo na akika wuna bea etikagbo be kafirinciybe Ebo acino ga nyin yangban ya jama yan kafirincizhi ma

eng: Those who believe in the Qur´an those who follow the Jewish scriptures and the Sabians and the Christians- any who believe in Allah and the Last Day and work righteousness- on them shall be no fear nor shall they grieve
nupe: Akika za nazhi imani jin nato za nazhi ga tuba jin mini yahuduzhio na to swabiuzhiza nazhia pan ke eko lugwa na to Nasarazhi ndondo na ga imani jin be Sokoe na to be Efo Alkiyami na uci kezhe lo tun wangi na to dansun danbo yaa to yangban yin ndondo ma danbo yaa

eng: We took the covenant of the Children of Israel and sent them messengers every time there came to them a messenger with what they themselves desired not - some of these they called impostors and some they go so far as to slay
nupe: Akika yi la alkawali br Bani Israilazhiyi ma tun Tucizhi fia kandondo na Tuci ga be yaa be yan nazhi ba yangbanazhia na sashizhi u yi ganmana sashi ndoci ma a fe wu Tucizhi

eng: They thought there would be no trial or punishment so they became blind and deaf yet Allah in mercy turned to them yet again many of them became blind and deaf But Allah sees well all that they do
nupe: Aci fe kpaye gan fitina ndondoa naa gancin acia na ye a maa te tukpa gancin Soko ci fa bea yin gancin ekundondoazhi ci kezhea na ye acia te tukpa Soko mae cina le be iri etu nazhi elo na

eng: They do blaspheme who say Allah is Christ the son of Mary But said Christ O Children of Israel! worship Allah my Lord and your Lord Whoever joins other gods with Allah- Allah will forbid him the garden and the Fire will be his abode There will for the wrong-doers be no one to help
nupe: Akika za nazhiga gan gan Akika Masihu egi Maryama gayi Soko na a jin kafirinci Masihu ma gan Ya ye Bani Israilazhie jin bauta ya Soko na yi Tsoci mi to Tsoci ye na Akika zandondo nagae la yan pa Soko baci na akika Sokoa Aljanna laazhe haramu yau ecin bauma yi ena azwalumizhi maade zanazhia jina taimako naa

eng: They do blaspheme who say Allah is Christ the son of Mary But said Christ O Children of Israel! worship Allah my Lord and your Lord Whoever joins other gods with Allah- Allah will forbid him the garden and the Fire will be his abode There will for the wrong-doers be no one to helpAkika za nazhiga gan gan
nupe: Akika Masihu egi Maryama gayi Soko na a jin kafirinci Masihu ma gan Ya ye Bani Israilazhie jin bauta ya Soko na yi Tsoci mi to Tsoci ye na Akika zandondo nagae la yan pa Soko baci na akika Sokoa Aljanna laazhe haramu yau ecin bauma yi ena azwalumizhi maade zanazhia jina taimako naa

eng: They do blaspheme who say Allah is one of three in a Trinity for there is no god except One Allah If they desist not from their word of blasphemy verily a grievous penalty will befall the blasphemers among them
nupe: Akika za nazhi gan gan Akika Soko za taci yan guta u yio na a jin kafirinci ama de Tsoci ndocia sai de Tsoci nini ketekagan ma akegan be yannaegan na yana akika azaba na tan na gaa two za nazhia jin kafirinci miniabo

eng: Why turn they not to Allah and seek His forgiveness For Allah is Oft-forgiving Most Merciful
nupe: Kashi a ga tuba jin lo eba Sokoa amaa ba gafara be U yina alali ma Soko Etsu gafara uyio Etsu yegun uma yio

eng: Why turn they not to Allah and seek His forgiveness For Allah is Oft-forgiving Most MercifulKashi a ga tuba jin lo eba Sokoa amaa ba gafara be U yina alali ma Soko Etsu gafara uyio Etsu yegun uma yio

Christ the son of Mary was no more than a messenger many were the messengers that passed away before him His mother was a woman of truth They had both to eat their daily food See how Allah doth make His signs clear to them yet see in what ways they are deluded away from the truth!
nupe: Masihu egi Maryama ufea sai de Tuci kawanyi Akika Tucizhima a be shiu dzoani nnau ma eza gaskiya uyio Amaa fe za nazhie gi yan gici naNgba cinle kendoe yie jin bayani ayazhi yaa na gancin wyo mao cino le kendoe ekua ke eko gaskiya lugwa na

eng: Say Will ye worship besides Allah something which hath no power either to harm or benefit you But Allah- He it is that heareth and knoweth all things
nupe: Gan gan Kashi ye ajin bauta yandoci yan Soko na de mulki ndoci ta eti eyan guno ko eyan anfani yaye yea na Soko ma Uga yi Etsu nae wo yandondo nao Etsu na yi be kpikpe yandondoe nao

eng: Say O people of the Book! exceed not in your religion the bounds of what is proper trespassing beyond the truth nor follow the vain desires of people who went wrong in times gone by- who misled many and strayed themselves from the even way
nupe: Gan gan Ya ye zaba litafizhi! Ega gwo iyaka gan dan adiniebo eti yan na jin gaskiyaa na ma ye mae ga lami tu etun yangbanzhi yan za nazhia gbin zhidzoani a ma ekun dondo zazhi gbin na ma Atso maa gbin ke eko gborolugwa

eng: Curses were pronounced on those among the Children of Israel who rejected Faith by the tongue of David and of Jesus the son of Mary because they disobeyed and persisted in excesses
nupe: A emibo kpe za nazhia jin kafirinci mini bani Israilazhio na be gintara Dawuda to Isa egi Maryamae Wuncin ma ma yi ebo lefia boamaafe za na zhie gbin iyaka tu na

eng: Nor did they usually forbid one another the iniquities which they committed evil indeed were the deeds which they did
nupe: Afe e kan etun dede nazhie lo naa Akika etun nazhi afe lo na wuna bi ye

eng: Nor did they usually forbid one another the iniquities which they committed evil indeed were the deeds which they did
nupe: Afe e kan etun dede nazhie lo naa Akika etun nazhi afe lo na wuna bi ye

eng: Thou seest many of them turning in friendship to the Unbelievers Evil indeed are the works which their souls have sent forward before them with the result that Allah´s wrath is on them and in torment will they abide
nupe: Wyoa le ekundondo miniabo ye akafirizhi la masoyizhi Akika yanna ala shidzo ya eti tacina na wuna bi ye ebo na Sokoa zhe wun bea yin amaafi mini azabao tutun yin

eng: If only they had believed in Allah in the Prophet and in what hath been revealed to him never would they have taken them for friends and protectors but most of them are rebellious wrong-doers
nupe: Da aci gan afe za nazhia imani jin be Sokoe to be Annabiy to yan na acin be yau na da ala kafirizhi masoyizhia Ammaade ekundondo miniabo fasikizhi ayio

eng: Strongest among men in enmity to the believers wilt thou find the Jews and Pagans and nearest among them in love to the believers wilt thou find those who say We are Christians because amongst these are men devoted to learning and men who have renounced the world and they are not arrogant
nupe: Akika wyoa tsun za nazhi gboka gan eba nanvo yaza nazhia imani jin na a ga yi Yahuduzhio to za nazhie la yan pa Soko baci na Wyo maatsun nazhi tso baa gan eba cincino ya za nazhia imani jin na aga yi za nazhi gan gan Akika yi Nasarazhi yi yio nao Wuncin ma yi ebo na ade Manzhi dan miniabo nazhia cin-dan kpikpe wao na to Man nazhi acin dan ibadao na hakikama ajin zanazhie lati dan fino naa

eng: And when they listen to the revelation received by the Messenger thou wilt see their eyes overflowing with tears for they recognise the truth they pray Our Lord! we believe write us down among the witnesses
nupe: Kamina aga wo yannaacin be ya Tuci na wyo a le eyeazhi ye wune je egiye ebo kpikpe nazhi ade yan gaskiya na acie gan gan Tuci yi! yi yia gaskiya ya ebo acino a yi kadan mini eri jincizhio

eng: What cause can we have not to believe in Allah and the truth which has come to us seeing that we long for our Lord to admit us to the company of the righteous
nupe: Kima dan be yi yino har na yi yia jin imani be Soko yina na yino to yanna be yayi yan gaskiyae naa yino Yi mae bavun gan Tsoci yi u la yiu ganudan Aljannao gan ni be za guruzhiy

eng: And for this their prayer hath Allah rewarded them with gardens with rivers flowing underneath- their eternal home Such is the recompense of those who do good
nupe: Ebo acino Soko ci gaa gba ebo egan naaagan na be Aljannazhi nazhi nuwanzhie je fi takoabo na amafi bo fi tutun yin Wuncin ga mayi egagba yan za nazhie jin bolobolo nao

eng: But those who reject Faith and belie our Signs- they shall be companions of Hell-fire
nupe: Zanazhi maajin kafirinci na acia aya Yi zhi yi ganmana na za wuncinzhi ga yi eyamancizhi yan ena jahimao

eng: O ye who believe! make not unlawful the good things which Allah hath made lawful for you but commit no excess for Allah loveth not those given to excess
nupe: Ya ye nazhia imani jin na! Ega la eyan managizhi na Soko lajin halali ya ye na haramu ma ye mae ga gwo iyaka ganma Akika Sokoe wa za nazhie gwo iyaka gan naa

eng: Eat of the things which Allah hath provided for you lawful and good but fear Allah in Whom ye believe
nupe: Ye mae gi dagan arziki na Soko laayaye na natso gayi halali uma yi lilici na ye mae sundan Soko na ye gan ye jin imani be yin na

eng: Allah will not call you to account for what is futile in your oaths but He will call you to account for your deliberate oaths for expiation feed ten indigent persons on a scale of the average for the food of your families or clothe them or give a slave his freedom If that is beyond your means fast for three days That is the expiation for the oaths ye have sworn But keep to your oaths Thus doth Allah make clear to you His signs that ye may be grateful
nupe: Sokoa wan ye yea be kuti nazhi ye dazhi yan ti kpere naa ammaade wyuna wan ye be yanazhi ye ga ta kpankoro yeci zhi kuti na Ebo acino kafara kutizhi ganmana uyi yangici la ya ezagwagbagizhi guwo dagan mini yangici tatacin na yegi be iyali yezhi na ko ma ye la tufuwazhie yaae fan koma ye la wuzhie sa ulau zhe egi Gancin zana be de nanazhia na to ufe azum yan fo guta Wuncin ga yi kafara kutizhi yezhio ye ga kutizhi na Yemae tswa kutizhi yezhi acin ga ga Sokoe jin bayani ayauzhi ya ye yio ujinwo be wunciny ye yea jin yebo ya Soko

eng: O ye who believe! Intoxicants and gambling dedication of stones and divination by arrows are an abomination- of Satan´s handwork eschew such abomination that ye may prosper
nupe: Ya ye nazhia imani jin na! Akika de egye to caca to eyan wozhi to cice yan ekwazhi ebo wiwa yan saa bo shikan uyio dagan mini etun shetan bo ebo acino yea kpeya beu yin ujinwo be wunciny yega tso guri yezhi

eng: Satan´s plan is but to excite enmity and hatred between you with intoxicants and gambling and hinder you from the remembrance of Allah and from prayer will ye not then abstain
nupe: Akika shetan de kpa gan wyunula ewunsun bedozhi to nanvo dozhi ulau laudan tsakani yebo be dozhi dan mini egyeo be cacae umau la ye yeu kan uke pipa Soko to swalla jinu lugwa To ye lugwa gancina

eng: Obey Allah and obey the Messenger and beware of evil if ye do turn back know ye that it is Our Messenger´s duty to proclaim the message in the clearest manner
nupe: Ye mae la mietu Soko ye mae la mietu Tuci Soko ye mae tswa minie Ye ma ga bea zunmazheta to ye kpewo kede yan na ta eti Tuci yibo na uga yi eyanwu naatula nao

eng: On those who believe and do deeds of righteousness there is no blame for what they ate in the past when they guard themselves from evil and believe and do deeds of righteousness- or again guard themselves from evil and believe- or again guard themselves from evil and do good For Allah loveth those who do good
nupe: Le fi danbo ta eti za nazhiga imani jin aci lo tun wangizhi dan mini yan nazhi aga gi na boa abeke agafe za nazhi tswa Soko naa acia imani jin aci lo tun wangizhi na gancin aci kezhe tswa Soko aci jin bolobolozhi na Soko mae wa za nazhi gae jin bolobolo na

eng: O ye who believe! Allah doth but make a trial of you in a little matter of game well within reach of game well within reach of your hands and your lances that He may test who feareth him unseen any who transgress thereafter will have a grievous penalty
nupe: Ya ye nazhia imani jin na! Akika Soko amaye cinle be yandoci dagan mini egbe gbeo Hajio na egwa yezhi to ekpa yezhia wan ya ye na ebo Soko u lau wu yan za na gae sundan Soko swiswoci na zandondona ma ga bea gbintu baci wuncino na to azaba na tan na gajin tabbata yau

eng: O ye who believe! Kill not game while in the sacred precincts or in pilgrim garb If any of you doth so intentionally the compensation is an offering brought to the Ka´ba of a domestic animal equivalent to the one he killed as adjudged by two just men among you or by way of atonement the feeding of the indigent or its equivalent in fasts that he may taste of the penalty of his deed Allah forgives what is past for repetition Allah will exact from him the penalty For Allah is Exalted and Lord of Retribution
nupe: Ya ye nazhia imani jin na! Ega wu yankungi egbe alalima ya yi dan mini haramio ma zandondo na ga wuu miniebo digangaena to ega gbau yi hadaya yan yanna uwu na be iriu yin dagan mini dabba emmizhio za guba nazhi yi eza adalincizhi na a la hukunci jina eti ubo Wuncinu lau fe hadaya naa la lo kaaba da jin na koma kafara be yangici la ya ezagwagbagizhi koma kini giba wuncino wyunu fe azum Ebo wyun tso u la egwau da dedebo yan alamari wyunu da mi Soko mafa be lefi natso ga gwogan na zana ma ga kezhe da lotun dede na Soko ajinu azaba ga Soko ma Etsu zankpe uyio Etsu jin jin ga uyio

eng: Lawful to you is the pursuit of water-game and its use for food- for the benefit of yourselves and those who travel but forbidden is the pursuit of land-game- as long as ye are in the sacred precincts or in pilgrim garb And fear Allah to Whom ye shall be gathered backA egbe yan yankungi edu to yagiciu lajin halali ya ye ulaufe eyan emawou ya ye to ezan daci yezhi Ama egbe yankungi yan kin laajin haramu ta eti yebo abeke yega yidan haramio na Ye mae tswa Soko be dansunuyin ebo na wyun ga yi Etsu naa ku ye yekan zhi yegboro u bo nao

Allah made the Ka´ba the Sacred House an asylum of security for men as also the Sacred Months the animals for offerings and the garlands that mark them That ye may know that Allah hath knowledge of what is in the heavens and on earth and that Allah is well acquainted with all things
nupe: Sokoa kaaba laafe kata Alfurma tsunwan yan kukuta yan adini ya zawangizhi to Etswa Alfurma to hadayazhi to hadaya nazhi a la yan -- koro na wuncinzhi ma ebo ye debae kpewo kede akika Soko yi be kpikpe yannazhifi sanmazhio na to yan nazhi fi kinbo na akika ma Soko yi be kpikpe yandondoeSurah  Know ye that Allah is strict in punishment and that Allah is Oft-forgiving Most MercifulYe mae kpe wo kede akika Soko Etsu na gbota azaba na bo uyioakika ma Soko Etsu gafara uyio etsu yegun uyioSurah  The Messenger´s duty is but to proclaim the message But Allah knoweth all that ye reveal and ye concealYan dondo ta eti Tuci boa saide eyan wu Soko ma kpe yan nazhi ye jin tula na to yan nazhie ye jin swiswoci na

eng: Say Not equal are things that are bad and things that are good even though the abundance of the bad may dazzle thee so fear Allah O ye that understand that so ye may prosper
nupe: Gan gan Eyan dede be eyan wangi aga fe ninia ka da ekundo yan eyan dede gae ya wyo shaawa na ebo acino e tswa Soko be dansunuyin ya ye nazhi yi eza ankalizhi na ujin wo be wunciny ye gade rabo

eng: O ye who believe! Ask not questions about things which if made plain to you may cause you trouble But if ye ask about things when the Qur´an is being revealed they will be made plain to you Allah will forgive those for Allah is Oft-forgiving Most Forbearing
nupe: Ya ye nazhia imani jin na! Egagan egan gbin eti eyanzhio ma nama a ga beu jin bayani yaye yangban yezhi gaa nyin Ye ma gae gbin gan eti abo lokaci na agae cin kurranu beyn na aga hukuncizhi jin bayani ya ye Soko ma fa be lefi wuncinzhi Soko ma Etsu gafara uyio Etsu hakuri uyio

eng: Some people before you did ask such questions and on that account lost their faithAkika za nazhi shi yedzo na gbingan wuncinzhi leani ganci aci tinba baci na ajin bayaniyaa na a jin kafirinci be hukunci wuncinzhi

It was not Allah who instituted superstitions like those of a slit-ear she-camel or a she-camel let loose for free pasture or idol sacrifices for twin-births in animals or stallion-camels freed from work It is blasphemers who invent a lie against Allah but most of them lack wisdom

nupe: Gan gan Ye le ye lea ngba azaba Soko gabe yaye ko ma ekin na Alkiyami ci be ya ye zandoci najin Sokoa na ga ye yea fe yiyeo Wuna yi eza gaskiya zhi ye yio na

eng: Nay- On Him would ye call and if it be His will He would remove the distress which occasioned your call upon Him and ye would forget the false gods which ye join with Him!
nupe: Ngan Soko gbaugi ga ye yeafe yi yeo U ci ga yanna ye laa yiu yena laake yabo yaye uga bau na yeci ga yannazhi ye laa pau baci na ba tan

eng: Before thee We sent messengers to many nations and We afflicted the nations with suffering and adversity that they might learn humility
nupe: Akika ma Yi tun Tucizhi fi alummazhi nazhi be shiwyodzo na agwo gana ebo acino yicia wan be ebayibazhi be eyan gunzhi watakila be wunciny a dakpya ya Soko

eng: When the suffering reached them from us why then did they not learn humility On the contrary their hearts became hardened and Satan made their sinful acts seem alluring to them
nupe: To ebokiibo kamina azaba bayiba Yi zhi be etiana aci dakpyaa yano Ammade yangbanazhi cia gboka shetan cia etun dede nazhie lo na laapanin fia

eng: But when they forgot the warning they had received We opened to them the gates of all good things until in the midst of their enjoyment of Our gifts on a sudden We called them to account when lo! they were plunged in despair!
nupe: Gancin kamina abea tanba laa lo dan yannazhi ala sanatu na Yicia ekozhi kpe yaa yan yandondo har da kamina afe fayangban eti alfario be yannazhi ala yana yi cia wan winwan yan giriku kanga ma acindan hali dede yan gigizhi boa ni

eng: Say Think ye if Allah took away your hearing and your sight and sealed up your hearts who - a god other than Allah - could restore them to you See how We explain the signs by various symbols yet they turn aside
nupe: Gan gan Kashi ye le yea Soko ga gwo ganwo ye to bacinle yezhi be ye yin Ucia eyan laata yangban yezhi Tsoci kici danbo baci Soko naalauzhin be ya ye nao Cin kendoe yie la ayazhi be yaa kakayin na le gancin ma elaa panke eko guru lugwa

eng: Say Think ye if the punishment of Allah comes to you whether suddenly or openly will any be destroyed except those who do wrong
nupe: Gan gan Ye lr ye lea azaba yan Soko gadabe yaye kpa keteyin be girikui koma gbangbae ngan Sokoa jin zandondo hallakaa sai de jamaa nazhi gayi azwalumzhi na

eng: We send the messengers only to give good news and to warn so those who believe and mend their lives- upon them shall be no fear nor shall they grieve
nupe: Yimae tun Tucizhi tuntuna sai de ebo abea ya za guruzhi buhsara amaajin za dedezhi gangba Ebo acinozana gabea imani jin na ucia bolobolo laadan etunuzhio na to dansun ndondo danbo yaa amaale yangban nyin ye a

eng: But those who reject our signs- them shall punishment touch for that they ceased not from transgressing
nupe: Zanazhi ma aya Yizhi zankpe Soko yi ganmana na azaba Soko gatoa ebo etun nazhi afe lo yan fasikancizhi na

eng: Say I tell you not that with me are the treasures of Allah nor do I know what is hidden nor do I tell you I am an angel I but follow what is revealed to me Say can the blind be held equal to the seeing Will ye then consider not
nupe: Gan gan Mia gan ya ye gan edzunba yan arziki Soko zhi dan be mi yina Mi ma de kpikpe yan naa swo na mi maagan yaye gan malaika mi yia Mide lamitu yandondoa sai de yanna aga jin wahayiu be yami na Gan gan Ngba yebonci be za nae leba ye na gazhe yeni Kashi ye kpaye kpaa

eng: Give this warning to those in whose hearts is the fear that they will be brought to judgment before their Lord except for Him they will have no protector nor intercessor that they may guard against evil
nupe: Wyo mao la wunojin gangbao ya zanazhi gae sundan yan kuku naakua yekan lo eba Tsocia na ade Ndakata ndoci zunmau boa zando madanbo naa tangwaa naa watakila a tswa Soko ama sundan U

eng: Send not away those who call on their Lord morning and evening seeking His face In naught art thou accountable for them and in naught are they accountable for thee that thou shouldst turn them away and thus be one of the unjust
nupe: Wyo mao ga nyan za nazhie yi Tsocia ye to lazhin to lozuny acie wa yarda Soko za na ma aala egagba yan etuna ndondo gbin wyo yaa amaala egagba yan etun wyoe ndondo gbina Ebo acino wyo ga nyana to wyo gafe dan mini azwalumizhio

eng: Thus did We try some of them by comparison with others that they should say Is it these then that Allah hath favoured from amongst us Doth not Allah know best those who are grateful
nupe: Acinga gamao Yi jin sashiazhi fitina be sashiazhi ebo adebaagangan Ngba za nanazhi ga Soko la falala ya mini yibo Asa ujin Soko tsa kpe gan mini wuzhiuzhio za nazhi gae jin yebo yau naa

eng: When those come to thee who believe in Our signs Say Peace be on you Your Lord hath inscribed for Himself the rule of mercy verily if any of you did evil in ignorance and thereafter repented and amend his conduct lo! He is Oft-forgiving Most Merciful
nupe: Kamina ma za nazhia imani jin be aya Yizhi na gabe eba wyo na to gangan Aminci yan Soko ulaujin tabbatauta etiyebo Tsociye wyuna yegun laajin tiile ta etiubo ke de zandondo naga lotun dede miniebo eti rakpebo na gancin uci bea tuba jin zunma wuncino tadzu na to akika Soko Etsu gafara Uyio Etsu yegun Uyio

eng: Thus do We explain the signs in detail that the way of the sinners may be shown up
nupe: Acinga ga ma Yi ye kpe ayazhi ri kaka yino to ebo ma eko yan lefi jincizhi ulau tuula

eng: Say I am forbidden to worship those - others than Allah - whom ye call upon Say I will not follow your wain desires If I did I would stray from the path and be not of the company of those who receive guidance
nupe: Gan gan Akika mi a kan mi gan minga jin bauta ya za nazhi yejin bauta ya zuma Soko na ma Gan gan Mia lami tu etun yangban yezhia ebo na miga jin acin akika miga gbin Kanga ma mia fe dan mini eza bawuzhi boa

eng: Say For me I work on a clear sign from my Lord but ye reject Him What ye would see hastened is not in my power The command rests with none but Allah He declares the truth and He is the best of judges
nupe: Gan gan Mi ta eti hujjakozhi na febe dagan eba Tsoci mibo na ye mau yi ganmana Yanna ma ye dinye gan ala be nahukunciu dangwa mi boa hukunci de undana sai be Sokoe wyune ya labari gaskiya wyun ga ma yi Etsu na gan za nazhi man yan kperi kpata nao

eng: Say If what ye would see hastened were in my power the matter would be settled at once between you and me But Allah knoweth best those who do wrong
nupe: Gan gan Akika daaci gan yan na ye din yeuna be mi yin udano akika da aga hukunci ba tsakani mi bo be ye yinani Soko tsa ma kpe gano yan yanna azwalumizhi dany ninbo nao

eng: With Him are the keys of the unseen the treasures that none knoweth but He He knoweth whatever there is on the earth and in the sea Not a leaf doth fall but with His knowledge there is not a grain in the darkness or depths of the earth nor anything fresh or dry green or withered but is inscribed in a record clear to those who can read
nupe: Ebau bo gabo giyekozhi yan eyan swiswoci kpata fio zandondo ma kpea yea sai wyun tso Uma yi be kpikpe yan yannazhi kpe eti kinbo kpata na to nazhi fi mini eduo na fini ndondo maacin cici kinboa sai de kpikpea wuna dan be u yin amaade eyan sunsungi dan mini bazhiko kin zhi boa ko eyan funfuru ko wiwocia sai de a fi mini litafi ndocio nae jin bayania na

eng: It is He who doth take your souls by night and hath knowledge of all that ye have done by day by day doth He raise you up again that a term appointed be fulfilled In the end unto Him will be your return then will He show you the truth of all that ye did
nupe: Wyunga mae gwo rayi yezhi be yeshi yino u ma yi be kpikpe yan yannazhi ye dajin be igidiina gancin ma uga ye laanakin mini ubo ebo hukunci ndoci yan lokaci nayi kikaci na gancin ma ebau gabo ezhekeba yedano gancin ucia yaye labari etun nazhi ye fe lo na

eng: He is the irresistible watching from above over His worshippers and He sets guardians over you At length when death approaches one of you Our angels take his soul and they never fail in their duty
nupe: Wyun ga mayi Etsu na zankpeu wuna rukpe eti wuzhiuzhio nao U mae tun malaika etswazhi fia harda lokaci na ajali gabe ya zaeni miniebona Tuci Yizhi cia -- rayi beayin amae ya ye dan alamari wuncin boa

eng: Then are men returned unto Allah their protector the only reality Is not His the command and He is the swiftest in taking account
nupe: Gancin aci gaa ku zheban da tsun Soko Ndakataa yan gaskiya tso E shi tukpa! Wyun ga wun hukuncio wyun ga ma yi Etsu na fan gan eba egagbao nao

eng: Say Who is it that delivereth you from the dark recesses of land and sea when ye call upon Him in humility and silent terror ´If He only delivers us from these dangers we vow we shall truly show our gratitude´
nupe: Gan gan Zie gwo ye tswa dagan mini bazhiko kin zhio to edu zhibo Yecia jin ye fe yiu be ekpyadae to swiswoci kede ugayi wadzun dagan mini mimacinle nanao akika yigafe dan mini zanazhie jin yebo Soko na

eng: Say It is Allah that delivereth you from these and all other distresses and yet ye worship false gods!
nupe: Gan gan Soko ga wa yedzun dagan miniabo to dagan yangbanyin ndondo gancin yecie la yan pa Soko baci

eng: Say He hath power to send calamities on you from above and below or to cover you with confusion in party strife giving you a taste of mutual vengeance - each from the other See how We explain the signs by various symbols that they may understand
nupe: Gan gan Wyin Soko ga de Iko na wyuna tun azaba fi ye dagan etitayebo nao koma dagan tako bici yezhio koma wyune zhekeba kpere-kpere Uci fe ya sashiezhi masiba yan sashi zhi fin Ngba cin le kendoe yie jin bayani ayazhi kakayin na watakila ajin fahimta egan nazhie gan bea yin na

eng: But thy people reject this though it is the truth Say Not mine is the responsibility for arranging your affairs
nupe: Jamaa yan wyozhi ma a egan wyoe yi ganmana wuncin ga mayi gaskiyao Gangan Mi de jin wakili ta eti yeboa

eng: Labari ndondo de ekpegiba bele yin ma yea be de kpikpe

When thou seest men engaged in vain discourse about Our signs turn away from them unless they turn to a different theme If Satan ever makes thee forget then after recollection sit not thou in the company of those who do wrong
nupe: Wyo ma ga be le za nazhie dzomi fi aya Yizhi na ye to a kpe ya ebaabo har sai aga lo dan egan ndocio najin wuncina na Uma gabea jin faruwa gan shetan yan tanba laace tu wyoe to ga kara fedun baci sinsantuo be jamaa nazhi yi azwalumizhi na ma

eng: On their account no responsibility falls on the righteous but their duty is to remind them that they may learn to fear Allah
nupe: Egagba yan lefi ndondo yan za na nazhie dzomi fi aya Soko na uta eti zanazhi gae tswa Soko acie sundanu naboa ammaade sinsantu danbo ya atso ujinwo atso wuncinzhi gaafe za nazhia tswa Soko cia sundanu na

eng: Leave alone those who take their religion to be mere play and amusement and are deceived by the life of this world But proclaim to them this truth that every soul delivers itself to ruin by its own acts it will find for itself no protector or intercessor except Allah if it offered every ransom or reparation none will be accepted such is the end of those who deliver themselves to ruin by their own acts they will have for drink only boiling water and for punishment one most grievous for they persisted in rejecting Allah
nupe: Zanazhi ma a adinia la eyan edzo be shahawa izhe na harma izhe cia ta na a ya yana wyo deo la Alkuranuo sanatu Ebo abea rayi ladan hallakao be etun gwaatso zhima Ndakata ndondoa danbo ya baci Soko boa zando ma danbo a tangwa yaa A ma ga ga yandondo de cia sa tia a gwo keu gwa Za wuncinzhi ga kauna ba be yegun Sokoe ebo etun dede nazhia lo na ade nuan yipa ndoci fin be azaba na tan sarauyin na ebo etun kafirinci nazhi afe lo na

eng: Say Shall we indeed call on others besides Allah- things that can do us neither good nor harm- and turn on our heels after receiving guidance from Allah - like one whom the evil ones have made into a fool wandering bewildered through the earth his friends calling come to us´ vainly guiding him to the path Say Allah´s guidance is the only guidance and we have been directed to submit ourselves to the Lord of the worlds
nupe: Gan gan Ngba yia yi yandociye eba bauta jino zunmaci Soko yan najin yi anfania umaajin yigun woa na acia la yi yia laadazhin eti ekpa dede nayi kpetiabo le na baci na Soko a yi lake ekoani na ke zana shetanzhiupa ci kinbo ucia gizhi na uma yi be eyazhi nazhie yiu zhin eko gboro na dabe eba yi yi Gangan Akika bawu yan Soko uga yi bawuo Ama jin yi foro gan yi la kpatsuny taiya Etsu naepke alittazhi kpata na

eng: Say Shall we indeed call on others besides Allah- things that can do us neither good nor harm- and turn on our heels after receiving guidance from Allah - like one whom the evil ones have made into a fool wandering bewildered through the earth his friends calling come to us´ vainly guiding him to the path Say Allah´s guidance is the only guidance and we have been directed to submit ourselves to the Lord of the worlds
nupe: Gan gan Ngba yia yi yandociye eba bauta jino zunmaci Soko yan najin yi anfania umaajin yigun woa na acia la yi yia laadazhin eti ekpa dede nayi kpetiabo le na baci na Soko a yi lake ekoani na ke zana shetanzhiupa ci kinbo ucia gizhi na uma yi be eyazhi nazhie yiu zhin eko gboro na dabe eba yi yi Gangan Akika bawu yan Soko uga yi bawuo Ama jin yi foro gan yi la kpatsuny taiya Etsu naepke alittazhi kpata na

eng: To establish regular prayers and to fear Allah for it is to Him that we shall be gathered together
nupe: Ye mae la swallae kue gi kini ye mae tswa Soko be emi latu forouyin wyunga maa kuye yekan loba wyuno

eng: It is He who created the heavens and the earth in true proportions the day He saith Be behold! it is His word is the truth His will be the dominion the day the trumpet will be blown He knoweth the unseen as well as that which is open For He is the Wise well acquainted with all things
nupe: Wyun ga majin alitta yan sanmazhio to kin be gaskiya yino to efona wyunabe gan gan A fe yandondo cia fe fe na Eganu gayi gaskiyao mulki kpata wyun wuno efo na agae be efe fi mini kafo na Etsu na wun kpikpe yannaaswo na to naatula gbangbae na wyun ga mayi Etsu hikimao Etsu kpikpe

eng: Lo! Abraham said to his father Azar Takest thou idols for gods For I see thee and thy people in manifest error
nupe: To kamina Ibrahima gan be babau Azarae na Ngba wyo ga kutizhi la Tsoci na wyoa fe jin bauta ya na Akika mide le wyo ye to jamaa yan wyozhi dan mini egbino naatula na

eng: So also did We show Abraham the power and the laws of the heavens and the earth that he might with understanding have certitude
nupe: Acinga ga Yi fe la mulkikozhi yan sanmazhi to kin wu Ibrahimao ebo ma ulau feuda mini za nazhia gaskiya ya nao

eng: When the night covered him over He saw a star He said This is my Lord But when it set He said I love not those that set
nupe: Kamina yeshi be ala kpeuna utaye le tswangi ndoci ye uci gan Nana gayi Tsoci mi yino kamina ubea kya na ugan Mie wa yan nazhie kya naa

eng: When he saw the moon rising in splendour he said This is my Lord But when the moon set He said unless my Lord guide me I shall surely be among those who go astray
nupe: Gancin naube le etswa yea la tinya na ugan Nana gayi Tsoci mi yino kamina ubea kya be na ugan Akika ka Tsoci mi wu mi baa akika mi gafe dan mini za gbingbinci zhio

eng: When he saw the sun rising in splendour he said This is my Lord this is the greatest of all But when the sun set he said O my people! I am indeed free from your guilt of giving partners to Allah
nupe: Kamina ube le igidi ye a la tinya na ugan Nana gayi Tsoci mi yino nana ga wancin gano Gancin na ubea kya na ugan ya ye jamaa yan mizhi! Akika mi egwa mi yinawa be yannazhi ye laapa Soko baci nae

eng: For me I have set my face firmly and truly towards Him Who created the heavens and the earth and never shall I give partners to Allah
nupe: Akika mi yina fuska mi zhe wu Etsu na ca jinjin sanmazhi to kin na mi ma kansan ya da eba bauta yan gaskiya mima dan mini za nazhie la yan pa Soko baci na boa

eng: His people disputed with him He said Come ye to dispute with me about Allah when He Himself hath guided me I fear not the beings ye associate with Allah Unless my Lord willeth nothing can happen My Lord comprehendeth in His knowledge all things Will ye not yourselves be admonished
nupe: Jamaa yanuzhi ci gbomi beu yin Ugan ye ye gbomigbo be mi yin eti alamari Soko alali ma Sokoa ma wubani Mi mae sundan yan nazhi ye laapa Soko baci naa yando maajina sai de yan na ga ba Tsoci mi na Kpikpe yan Tsocimi ma wuna ma yandondo kezhe Kashi ye ye kpaye kpaa

eng: How should I fear the beings ye associate with Allah when ye fear not to give partners to Allah without any warrant having been given to you Which of us two parties hath more right to security tell me if ye know
nupe: Ke wuna yi yi na mia fe sundan yan na ye laapa Soko baci nao ye mae sundan gan ye la eyan pa Soko baci be yan na acin hujja ndondo be yaye etiubo na yino mini jamaa gubaba bo gwoyin gan naade aminci Soko gannao ye ga fe gan yede kpikpe nao

eng: It is those who believe and confuse not their beliefs with wrong - that are truly in security for they are on right guidance
nupe: Za nazhia imani jin na imaniazhi ma bo keba be zwalunci yina na zawunci zhi aminci Soko gaajin tabbata yaa a ga mayi eza bawuzhio

eng: That was the reasoning about Us which We gave to Abraham to use against his people We raise whom We will degree after degree for thy Lord is full of wisdom and knowledge
nupe: Wuncin ma ugayi daliliko yizhio yimau laaya Ibrahima ta eti jamaauzhio Yi mae la zana gaba yi natu be darajazhi Akika Tsoci wyoe Etsu hikima uyio Etsu ilimi uyio

eng: We gave him Isaac and Jacob all three guided and before him We guided Noah and among his progeny David Solomon Job Joseph Moses and Aaron thus do We reward those who do good
nupe: Yima twarya yau be egi Ishaqae to Yaa kubu kpata ma yia wuba to Nuhu yiu wuba shidzo batsozhiodagan mini zuriauzhio ma Dawuda danbo to Ayuba to Yusufu to Musa to Haruna acinga gama yie la egagba ya zanazhi gae lotun wangizhi nao

eng: And Zakariya and John and Jesus and Elias all in the ranks of the righteous
nupe: To Zakariyau to Yahaya to Isah to Ilyasu kpata dan mini za guruzhio

eng: And Isma´il and Elisha and Jonas and Lot and to all We gave favour above the nations
nupe: To Ismaila to Alyasau to Yunusa to Lutu to atso kpata yia ya daraja ta eti alittazhio

eng: To them and to their fathers and progeny and brethren We chose them and we guided them to a straight way
nupe: To dagan mini Babaazhio to Zuriyaazhio to yegiazhio Yimaala fe eza tsitsaci zhi yi cia wuba lo eko natso yi gboro na

eng: This is the guidance of Allah He giveth that guidance to whom He pleaseth of His worshippers If they were to join other gods with Him all that they did would be vain for them
nupe: Wuncin ma bawu yan Soko uyio wyune lau wu zana gabau na ba mini wuzhiu zhio Daaci gan ala yandoci pa Soko baci da yannazhi afe jin kpata na ga nyin ya

eng: These were the men to whom We gave the Book and authority and prophethood if these their descendants reject them Behold! We shall entrust their charge to a new people who reject them not
nupe: Za wuncinzhi ga yi za nazhi yi la Litafi ya nao to hukunci annabci Za nanazhi gaajin kafirinci beuyin to akika yiu laaya jamaa ndocizhi nazhiajin kafirinci beuyina na

eng: Those were the prophets who received Allah´s guidance Copy the guidance they received Say No reward for this do I ask of you This is no less than a message for the nations
nupe: Zawuncin zhi ga Soko wubao ebo acino fe sana ye be bawua yin Gangan Mi ma gbin yegan yan laada ndoci etiuboa wyin Alkuran de fea sai de sinsantu ya alittazhi kpata

eng: No just estimate of Allah do they make when they say Nothing doth Allah send down to man by way of revelation Say Who then sent down the Book which Moses brought- a light and guidance to man But ye make it into separate sheets for show while ye conceal much of its contents therein were ye taught that which ye knew not- neither ye nor your fathers Say Allah sent it down Then leave them to plunge in vain discourse and trifling
nupe: A ma la tsunwan ya Soko eti hakki yan tsunwan nagwou yin naa kamina a gan gan Soko cin yan dondo be ya zawangi ndondoa Gangan Zii cin litafi na Musa be beyin ucia fe haske be bawuI ya zawangizhi ye cie lau fe takadazhi ye lau tu ye mae swo na dokun nao Ama wu ye yanna yede kpikpeana to ye to Babaezhiio Gangan Soko Gancin wyocio laao yaodan dzolo-dzolozhinabo a fea dzo-dzo

eng: And this is a Book which We have sent down bringing blessings and confirming the revelations which came before it that thou mayest warn the mother of cities and all around her Those who believe in the Hereafter believe in this Book and they are constant in guarding their prayers
nupe: Nana ma Litafi uyio yi cinucin be be albarkae umae ya litafi nazhi be shiudzo na gaskiya eboma wyo la wuno fe sinsantuo ya nna yan alkaryazhi kpata Makka to nazhi mau -- ba na Zanazhi ma imani jin be Efo Alkiyami na e jin imani be Alkuranui za wuncin zhima e la tswitswa dan salla zhi

eng: Who can be more wicked than one who inventeth a lie against Allah or saith I have received inspiration when he hath received none or again who saith I can reveal the like of what Allah hath revealed If thou couldst but see how the wicked do fare in the flood of confusion at death! - the angels stretch forth their hands sayingYield up your souls this day shall ye receive your reward- a penalty of shame for that ye used to tell lies against Allah and scornfully to reject of His signs!
nupe: Zii ma ga wuye naagan yan za na tswa ganmana ta Soko nao ko ma uci gan A jin wahayi be ya mi alali ma ajin wahayi yandondo ya wyua nao to za na gan Mitsoa cin Litafi be yn iri natso Soko cin be nao Daaci gan wyoa leye kamina azwalumizhi gaalo dan mini hali nagban yan ajalio na kanga malaikazhi ci gaa egwazhi ta acia fe ganagan E wa tiedzun tinya hali nanao nyinna de a gae gba ga be azaba egbae ebo egan nazhi ye fe da gan eti Soko namajin gaskiyana ye maa fe za nazhie gbotika be aya Soko zhi na

eng: And behold! ye come to us bare and alone as We created you for the first time ye have left behind you all the favours which We bestowed on you We see not with you your intercessors whom ye thought to be partners in your affairs so now all relations between you have been cut off and your pet fancies have left you in the lurch!
nupe: Akika ma ye kezhe dabe eba Yi yiani zaeninni kendoe yi jin alittaye tun dagan kakancae na Ye ma kara nazhi yi laayaye bagwa na yazhi zunma zunma yezhi boani Yi ma le egwatanci yezhi ye be ye yina nazhi ye lawu ke agae pa Soko baci yaye yeonaa Akika yandondo adzaya tsakaniyebo be dozhi yina ni yannazhi ma ye lawu cie petu na kpata agbin ye ye boa ni

eng: It is Allah Who causeth the seed-grain and the date-stone to split and sprout He causeth the living to issue from the dead and He is the one to cause the dead to issue from the living That is Allah then how are ye deluded away from the truth
nupe: Akika Soko gayi Etsu nae kpe eyi-sunsun misun cie tinya nao to kwosun wyune la eyan be rayi tinya dagan mini eyan tsutsucio umae la eyan tsutsuci tinya dagan mini eyan nayibe rayi na Zawuncin gayi Soko babo e pan ye lo beo

eng: He it is that cleaveth the day-break from the dark He makes the night for rest and tranquillity and the sun and moon for the reckoning of time Such is the judgment and ordering of Him the Exalted in Power the Omniscient
nupe: Etsu nae la batin tinya na ucie la yeshi lashi tsuuyin na to yigidi to etswa ma acia fe yannazhie jin lisafi na Wuncin tsunwan dan uyio yan iko Etsu zankpe Etsu kpikpe

eng: It is He Who maketh the stars as beacons for you that ye may guide yourselves with their help through the dark spaces of land and sea We detail Our signs for people who know
nupe: Wyun ga ma la tswangizhi shishio ebo ye lae de bawu bea yin dan mini bazhikozhio to yan kin to eduo Akika Yi yia ayazhi kpeye ka ka yin be bayani ya zanazhi gayi eza kpikpezhi na

eng: Say Come I will rehearse what Allah hath really prohibited you from Join not anything as equal with Him be good to your parents kill not your children on a plea of want- We provide sustenance for you and for them- come not nigh to shameful deeds Whether open or secret take not life which Allah hath made sacred except by way of justice and law thus doth He command you that ye may learn wisdom

eng: And come not nigh to the orphan´s property except to improve it until he attain the age of full strength give measure and weight with full justice- no burden do We place on any soul but that which it can bear- whenever ye speak speak justly even if a near relative is concerned and fulfil the covenant of Allah thus doth He command you that ye may remember

nupe: To mini Musao Kami nan Yi tunu tun fi Firauna be hujja naa tula nan

eng: But Pharaoh turned back with his Chiefs and said A sorcerer or one possessed!
nupe: U cia zuma ce ta ganni be jamaa yan uzhiy ucigan Eyan maci uyio ilanduci yio

eng: So We took him and his forces and threw them into the sea and his was the blame
nupe: Ebo acino Yi ciu wan to jamaa yanuzhi Yi cia ceya fi mini eduo wunsto cia fe za naa jin tacinu zargi nan

eng: And in the ´Ad people was another Sign Behold We sent against them the devastating Wind
nupe: To mini labari Aduzhio aya danbo kami nan Yi tun efe tsuntsun-nu fia nan efe nan albarka dana nan

eng: It left nothing whatever that it came up against but reduced it to ruin and rottenness
nupe: Wyne lu yandondo nanuga keba be yin nan gwaa sal u gau laafe ke tsukun gwi gwoci nan

eng: And in the Thamud was another Sign Behold they were told Enjoy your brief day for a little while!
nupe: To mini labari Samuduzhio kami nan a gan ya gan Efe woma da eka degi nan

eng: But they insolently defied the Command of their Lord So the stunning noise of an earthquake seized them even while they were looking on
nupe: Acia gbo tika be alamari Tsocia yin kabara dede cia wan atso ma fe cin ba le

eng: Then they could not even stand on their feet nor could they help themselvesAde kagbo kanga nan a ga a nankin naa ama de za nazhia jina Taimako naa
To jamaa yan Nuhu zhio tso shidzo batso zhio aafe jamaa nan zhiy yi fasikizhi nan
With power and skill did We construct the Firmament for it is We Who create the vastness of pace
nupe: Sanma ma Yi tuutu be kagboe akika ma Etsu iko Yi yio

eng: And We have spread out the spacious earth How excellently We do spread out!
nupe: To kin yinotso ma Yi ga tau cicio Madalla be Etsu nan ta kincici parae nan

eng: And of every thing We have created pairs That ye may receive instruction
nupe: Yi ma eba be yiwoe jin dan mini yan dondo ebo ye lae Sane tu

eng: Hasten ye then at once to Allah I am from Him a Warner to you clear and open!
nupe: Ebo acino efe bici da ba Soko akika gangba jinci mi yio naa tulanan nan ma fe be dagan ebau bo nan

eng: And make not another an object of worship with Allah I am from Him a Warner to you clear and open!
nupe: Ega la tsoci ndoci a pa Soko baci ma akika gangba jinci naa tula nan u ga mi yi dagan ebau bo

eng: Similarly no messenger came to the Peoples before them but they said of him in like manner A sorcerer or one possessed!
nupe: Acinga ga alamarizhi yio kandondo nan Tuci ga lo eba za nanzhi shia dzo nan sai a ga gan gan Eyan maci u yio ilanduci u yio

eng: Is this the legacy they have transmitted one to another Nay they are themselves a people transgressing beyond bounds!
nupe: Kashiy ajin dozhi wasiyanci jin Aa ade yi jamaa nanzhie gwo iyaka Soko gan nan

eng: So turn away from them not thine is the blame
nupe: Dzunganabo akika wyo jin za nan a jin zargi naa

eng: But teach thy Message for teaching benefits the Believers
nupe: Wyo mao feo jin waazi akika wazi ejin muminizhi anfani

eng: I have only created Jinns and men that they may serve Me
nupe: Mi ma jin alitta yan jannuzhi to zawangizhi ebo yandondo boa sai da ebo aajin bautaa ya mi

eng: No Sustenance do I require of them nor do I require that they should feed Me
nupe: Mi wa arziki ndondo gwataa boa Mi ma wa gan a ya Mi yangicia gia

eng: For Allah is He Who gives all Sustenance- Lord of Power- Steadfast for ever
nupe: Akika Soko gayi Etsu arzikio Etsu nan gboka sarauyin nan

eng: For the Wrong-doers their portion is like unto the portion of their fellows of earlier generations then let them not ask Me to hasten that portion!
nupe: Akika Zananzhi jin zwalunci nan zunubizhi ta etia bo iri zunubi nanzhi ta eti dozhina zhio nan ebo acino a ga din ye be azabae ma

eng: Woe then to the Unbelievers on account of that Day of theirs which they have been promised!
nupe: Egiti yan robokpewunajin tabbata ya kafirizhi dan mini efoa nan Sokoajina alkawali nao

eng: By a Decree inscribedT
nupe: o Litafi naa ka yan fi nan

eng: In a Scroll unfolded
nupe: Fi mini epao nan yi kpi kpe ci nan

eng: By the much-frequented Fane
nupe: To Baitu Ma amuri

eng: By the Canopy Raised High
nupe: To katanti nan latu nan

eng: And by the Ocean filled with Swell-
nupe: To edu naashe be nuwane nan

eng: Verily the Doom of thy Lord will indeed come to pass-
nupe: Akika azaba yan Tsoci wyoe u gaajin tabbata

eng: There is none can avert it-
nupe: Ade za nan kanu gwa wo naa

eng: On the Day when the firmament will be in dreadful commotion
nupe: Fo nan Sanma gaa kun kun kun yan iyaka nan

eng: And the mountains will fly hither and thither
nupe: Patizhi ci ga ala ke ya bo baenio

eng: Then woe that Day to those that treat Truth as Falsehood-
nupe: Azaba yan robonkpe u ga ajin tabbata ya ganmanan zun ci zhi

eng: That play and paddle in shallow trifles
nupe: Za nanzhi a cia dan edzo dzo baenio nan

eng: That Day shall they be thrust down to the Fire of Hell irresistibly
nupe: Fo nan a daagwa lo da fi ena ya jahannamao baenio nan

eng: This it will be said Is the Fire- which ye were wont to deny!
nupe: Acia gana gan Ngan nana ga yi ena na ye fe yi ganmanan nao

eng: Is this then a fake or is it ye that do not see
nupe: Ngba eyanma ga dan nao kashi ye leba ye lea

eng: Burn ye therein the same is it to you whether ye bear it with patience or not Ye but receive the recompense of your own deeds
nupe: E gan fi bo yejin ankuri ko ma ye ga jin ankuri ma nini u yio ya yeo Akika a agaegba ga be iri etun nanzhi ye fe lo nan

eng: As to the Righteous they will be in Gardens and in Happiness-
nupe: Akika za nanzhie sundan Soko nan a fi mini aljannazhio be niimae

eng: Enjoying the Bliss which their Lord hath bestowed on them and their Lord shall deliver them from the Penalty of the Fire
nupe: Acia fe woma be yan nan Tsocia la yaa nan Tsocia ma ga wadzun be azaba yan ena jahimuy

eng: To them will be said Eat and drink ye with profit and health because of your good deeds
nupe: Acia gana gan Efe gi ye mae fe fin be ninmae egagba wuncin yi ebo etun nanzhiy ye ce lo izhe o nan

eng: They will recline with ease on Thrones of dignity arranged in ranks and We shall join them to Companions with beautiful big and lustrous eyes
nupe: Aci ga kpetso gadozhio nanzhi yi titacizhi nan Yi vi ga yawo jin yaa be ynzagi aljannazhiy

eng: And those who believe and whose families follow them in Faith- to them shall We join their families Nor shall We deprive them of the fruit of aught of their works Yet is each individual in pledge for his deeds
nupe: Za nan zhi a imani jin nan zuriyazhi cia mi tua eti imani jino nanyi ga ku keba be zuriyazhiy Yi maa ke etunazhi tukun a Zandondoa ga etun nanu ga lo nan laa kpe tsou

eng: And We shall bestow on them of fruit and meat anything they shall desire
nupe: Yi maa kezhe twarya yaabe yangici mari marizhiy to nankan mini yannanzhi a gae de shaawau nan

eng: They shall there exchange one with another a loving cup free of frivolity free of all taint of ill
nupe: A fe fin eyan managizhi atso be dozhiy fi miniu boa le fi jinma danboa

eng: Round about them will serve devoted to them young male servants handsome as Pearls well-guarded
nupe: Egi wawagi aljannazhi cia fe mae ke zhe wyo ga lea ye wyoa ye gan ko aluluI naa swo nan a yio

eng: They will advance to each other engaging in mutual enquiry
nupe: Saashiazhi ma a ga ye zhe wu sashi acia fe gbin dozhi gan

eng: They will say Aforetime we were not without fear for the sake of our people
nupe: A ci gan Akika Yi ya fe zhidzo ba tso zhio yi fe sundan Soko dan mini iyali yi zhio

eng: But Allah has been good to us and has delivered us from the Penalty of the Scorching Wind
nupe: Soko cia eryatwau la aya yi yinnan U cia yi gangwa be azaba nan yi tsun tsun nunae

eng: Surah  But Allah has been good to us and has delivered us from the Penalty of the Scorching Wind
nupe: Soko cia eryatwau la aya yi yinnan U cia yi gangwa be azaba nan yi tsun tsun nunae

eng: Truly we did call unto Him from of old truly it is He the Beneficent the Merciful!
nupe: Akika Yi ya tun izhe bastozhio yi fe ba gwagan be Sokoe Akika Etsu eryatwa uyio Etsu yegun uyio

eng: Therefore proclaim thou the praises of thy Lord for by the Grace of thy Lord thou art no vulgar soothsayer nor art thou one possessed
nupe: Wyo mao feo jin waazi akika wyo jin eyan mancia wyo ma jin ilanduci be niima yan Tsoci wyo yina

eng: Therefore proclaim thou the praises of thy Lord for by the Grace of thy Lord thou art no vulgar soothsayer nor art thou one possessed
nupe: Wyo mao feo jin waazi akika wyo jin eyan mancia wyo ma jin ilanduci be niima yan Tsoci wyo yina

eng: Or do they say- A Poet! we await for him some calamity hatched by Time!
nupe: Kashiy e gangan gan enikoci u yi ebo acino yi fiituu ye be yan nan egbazhe dede yan zaman gi gun nan

eng: Say thou Await ye!- I too will wait along with you!
nupe: Gan gan Efe tuye akika mi tso dan gan-ni be ye yin eba eyetuo

eng: Is it that their faculties of understanding urge them to this or are they but a people transgressing beyond boundsKashiy ena nanazhi gae jina foro be nan nazhi yino Kashiy adea fe jamaa nanzhie -- iyaka Soko gan nan
Or do they say He fabricated the Message Nay they have no faith!
nupe: Kashiy egan-gan gan u tswau tswa Aa ade jin imani jina

eng: Let them then produce a recital like unto it- If it be they speak the truth!
nupe: Wunayi acino aabe be egan ndoci na ga ade Alkuranu nan wunayi gaskiya tacizhi a yio nan

eng: Were they created of nothing or were they themselves the creators
nupe: Kashiy ujin eyan a jin alittaa yaa Kahiy atso tsae jin alitta dozhio

eng: Or did they create the heavens and the earth Nay they have no firm belief
nupe: Kashiy a ga jin alitta yan Sanmazhi to kin yino Aa a de ya gaskiyaa

eng: Or are the Treasures of thy Lord with them or are they the managers of affairs
nupe: Kashiy edzunba yan arziki bea yin u dano kashi aga wun Iko ta eti zazhibo

eng: Or have they a ladder by which they can climb up to heaven and listen to its secrets Then let such a listener of theirs produce a manifest proof
nupe: Kashiy a yi be ekpae yi nan a tsoe a tsoe la wogan dagan sanmao nan gancin za nae wo gan be yaa na cie be yaa be hujja nanzhia latu nae

eng: Or has He only daughters and ye have sons
nupe: Kashiy Wuny Soko ga wun egi ynagizhio ye ci wun bagizhio

eng: Or is it that thou dost ask for a reward so that they are burdened with a load of debt-
nupe: Kashiy Wyoe gbinagan lada gbin edu nan wyo la taa nan cia lukpin fia

eng: Or that the Unseen in it their hands and they write it down
nupe: Kashiy ebaabo ga kpikpe swiswocizhi dano Ebo cano acie ka yan nanzhi ga baa nan

eng: Or do they intend a plot against thee But those who defy Allah are themselves involved in a Plot!
nupe: Kashiy e pa makirinci ndoci pa Akika za nazhi ajin kafirinci nan atso ga egun yan makirinci a gio

eng: Or have they a god other than Allah Exalted is Allah far above the things they associate with Him!
nupe: Kashiy a yi Tsoci ndoci yi baci Soko Lili kpata ajin tabbata ya Soko ke yan nazhi e la pau baci nan lugwa

eng: Were they to see a piece of the sky falling on them they would only say Clouds gathered in heaps!
nupe: Ama ga le kansan ndoci ye sanmao naa sa ya zhi kin nan a gan gan girgjezhio nan tu tati dozhio nao

eng: So leave them alone until they encounter that Day of theirs wherein they shall perforce swoon with terror-
nupe: Dzun gana bo har da fo nan a be gun be efoa yin naajina azaba danbo nan

eng: The Day when their plotting will avail them nothing and no help shall be given them
nupe: Fo nan tanadizhi wuna kunke yaa be yandondo yina nan a maade za naajina taimako naa

eng: And verily for those who do wrong there is another punishment besides this But most of them understand not
nupe: Akika azaba danbo ya azwalumi zhi kayin ammade ekun dondoazhi akpea

eng: Now await in patience the command of thy Lord for verily thou art in Our eyes and celebrate the praises of thy Lord the while thou standest forth
nupe: A ankuri be hukunci yan Tsoci wyo yin akika etswa Yi dan be wyo yin wyo mao fe o li Soko ganni be yebo jin ya Tsoci wyo yin Kandondo nan wyo ga nankin nan

eng: And for part of the night also praise thou Him- and at the retreat of the stars
nupe: !To mini yeshio wyo liu tsa tsa yin to ka mi nan tswangizhi ga zunma zheta nan

eng: The Hour of Judgment is nigh and the moon is cleft asunder
nupe: Alkiyamia tso ba kpankpan yin to etswa maa la fi guba

eng: But if they see a Sign they turn away and say This is but transient magic
nupe: A ma ga aya le ye a zunma zhetau a cia gan gan eyanmau yio naa gwogan nan

eng: They reject the warning and follow their own lusts but every matter has its appointed time
nupe: Aciu yi ganmanan acia emi tu etun yangbanazhi akika alamari ndondo nan Sokoe gan nan U ga ajin tabbata

eng: There have already come to them Recitals wherein there is enough to check them
nupe: Akika ma mini labari nanzhiy be yanan ade dan minia bo nanzhi yi yan waniko nan

eng: Mature wisdom- but the preaching of Warners profits them not
nupe: Hikima u yio naa kunke nan ammade gangba jina anfania

eng: Therefore O Prophet turn away from them The Day that the Caller will call them to a terrible affair
nupe: A dzun gan abo har da efo nan za nae yi zazhi nan U gaa yia lo yan doci nan yi eyan dede nan azaba

eng: They will come forth- their eyes humbled - from their graves torpid like locusts scattered abroad
nupe: Eyeazhi gagba gba Wyoa ye gan ko borogizhio nan zhi a ga nan

eng: Hastening with eyes transfixed towards the Caller!- Hard is this Day! the Unbelievers will say
nupe: Acia fe din ye loeba za nae yia nan kafirizhi a fe gan fo ga gan Yinna nan nan efo nan lukpin nan uyio

eng: Before them the People of Noah rejected their messenger they rejected Our servant and said Here is one possessed! and he was driven out
nupe: Jamaa yan Nuhu zhiotso a tucizhi yi ganmanan aci fe sha fi u

eng: Then he called on his Lord I am one overcome do Thou then help me!
nupe: Uci ba Tsociu aduwa gan akika a mi zankpe eboacino Soko jin mi taimako

eng: So We opened the gates of heaven with water pouring forth
nupe: Yicia eko yan Sanma zhi kpe be nuwan nan fe cinzhin be kagboe nan

eng: And We caused the earth to gush forth with springs so the waters met and rose to the extent decreed
nupe: Yici kezhea eya nuwanzhi kpe kinbo nuwanzhi cia keba eti alamari nan Soko a kpa a ni nan

eng: But We bore him on an Ark made of broad planks and caulked with palm-fibre
nupe: Yicia wuntso la dan mini eyao naakan be katankozhiy be kwontoe nan

eng: She floats under our eyes and care a recompense to one who had been rejected with scorn!
nupe: Uci fe bici be etswa Yi yin wuncin ma egagba u yio yazandondo nan aga jin kafirinci beu yin nae

eng: And We have left this as a Sign for all time then is there any that will receive admonition
nupe: Yiciu laafe aya ko a de za nan a santu nan

eng: But how terrible was My Penalty and My Warning
nupe: Ngba ke nangban azaba Mi yi yi be gangba nae jinanan yi nao

eng: And We have indeed made the Qur´an easy to understand and remember then is there any that will receive admonition
nupe: Akika yi ya Aluranu laafe eyan finfanci ebo sinsantuo Ngba a de za naa gwo sin san tu nan

eng: The ´Ad people too rejected Truth then how terrible was My Penalty and My Warning
nupe: Jamaa yan Aduzhi a Tuci yi gan manan Ngba ke nangban azaba Mi be gangba nanzhie jina nan yi yi nao

eng: For We sent against them a furious wind on a Day of violent Disaster
nupe: Akika Yi tun efe nan wo nan Sarauyin nan fia dan mini efo nan wonan nao na mae lo ye be ena-woe nan

eng: Plucking out men as if they were roots of palm-trees torn up from the ground
nupe: Wune gbin zawangi ya wyoa ye gan ko cigban dobinazhi a yio nanzhi gbin cici nan

eng: Yea how terrible was My Penalty and My Warning!
nupe: Ngba ke nangban yan azaba Mi yi yi be gangba nae jina nan yi nao

eng: But We have indeed made the Qur´an easy to understand and remember then is there any that will receive admonition
nupe: Akika Yi Alkuranu laafe fanci ebo sin santu o Ngba ade za naa santu nan

eng: The Thamud also rejected their Warners
nupe: Jama yan Samuduzhi a gangba nanzhijina nan yi ganma nan

nupe: Aci gan Gbani zae ni mini yi bo tsa yi yia be gbao Yi ma gaa jin acin yi yia fe dan mini egbino be wawaboe

nupe: Kashiy wuntsa a be tsa mini yi bo acia la wahayia ya wuno Aa u jin acina ganmanan zunci tsau yio U mayi eza dede

eng: Ah! they will know on the morrow which is the liar the insolent one!
nupe: Bele yin aakpe esun Za nan ga yi ganmanan zunci Uma yi za dede nan

eng: For We will send the she-camel by way of trial for them So watch them O Salih and possess thyself in patience!
nupe: Akika Yia tun yiwo fia ebo ulaufe yaa ebo acino ofe tuaye wyo mao la yangbano wu

eng: And tell them that the water is to be divided between them Each one´s right to drink being brought forward by suitable turns
nupe: Wyo mao yaa labari ke nuwan ginganci u yio tsakaniabo be efo yan fin finu yin nan wunalo da fin nan

eng: But they called to their companion and he took a sword in hand and hamstrung her
nupe: Aci yi zabaa Uci da la ebiko cia rakum tunyan ciu wu

eng: Ah! how terrible was My Penalty and My Warning!
nupe: Ngba ke nangban yan azaba mMi yi yi be gangba nanzhi e jina na yi nao

eng: For We sent against them a single Mighty Blast and they became like the dry stubble used by one who pens cattle
nupe: Akika Yi tun kabara nini fia acia fe ke egwo wiwoci nane la ya dabbazhi gi nan

eng: And We have indeed made the Qur´an easy to understand and remember then is there any that will receive admonition
nupe: Akika Yia Alkuranu laa fe fin fanci ebo sin santuo Ngba a de za naa santu nan

eng: The people of Lut rejected his warning
nupe: Jamaa yan Lutu zhia gangba nan zhi a jina nan yi ganmanan

eng: We sent against them a violent Tornado with showers of stones which destroyed them except Lut´s household them We delivered by early Dawn-
nupe: Akika Yi tun takunzhi fia acia jin hallaka sai de iyali yan Annabi Lutuzhi Yi yia gangwa lokaci yan sahuruy

eng: As a Grace from Us thus do We reward those who give thanks
nupe: Nan nan niimauyio dagan eba Yi bo acinga ga egagba yio ya zandondo nan gae jin yebo nao

eng: And Lut did warn them of Our Punishment but they disputed about the Warning
nupe: Akika Ujina gangba be winwan yi Yin acia gangbau gbomi

eng: And they even sought to snatch away his guests from him but We blinded their eyes They heard Now taste ye My Wrath and My Warning
nupe: Akika a wa gan ajin lalata be eganzhiy Yi eyezhi fin ya gancin e fe fin azaba Mi to gangba nanzhi a fe jine nan

eng: Early on the morrow an abiding Punishment seized them
nupe: Akika azaba naajin tabbata nan da deade saka be asuba yinSurah So taste ye My Wrath and My WarningEbo acio efe fin azaba Mi be gangba nanzhiy a jine nan

eng: And We have indeed made the Qur´an easy to understand and remember then is there any that will receive admonition
nupe: Akika Yia Alkuranu laafe fin-fanci ebo sinsan tuo Ngba ade za naa santu nan

eng: To the People of Pharaoh too aforetime came Warners from Allah
nupe: Akika gangbazhi be eba iyali yan Firauna zhi

eng: The people rejected all Our Signs but We seized them with such Penalty as comes from One Exalted in Power able to carry out His Will
nupe: Acia aya Yizhi kpata yi ganmanan Yi cia wan win wan yan zana de zankpe Uma de II ko nan

eng: Are your Unbelievers O Quraish better than they Or have ye an immunity in the Sacred Books
nupe: Gbani kafiri yezhi ade alheri gan nanzhiy shidzonan Kashi yede wandzun ndoci de dan mini Litafio

eng: r do they say We acting together can defend ourselves
nupe: Kashiy e gan gan gag Yi jamaazhi yi yio nanzhi ga de nasara nan

eng: Soon will their multitude be put to flight and they will show their backs
nupe: Bele yina ga gungun yekanazhi ga ya aciga zunma ya cia fe bici

eng: Nay the Hour of Judgment is the time promised them for their full recompense And that Hour will be most grievous and most bitter
nupe: Aa alkiyami tsa yi lokaci alkawalio masi-ba yan alkiyami ma u tsun u ma luku

eng: Truly those in sin are the ones straying in mind and mad
nupe: Akika lefi jincizhi afi mini egbao be azba yan enae

eng: The Day they will be dragged through the Fire on their faces they will hear Taste ye the touch of Hell!
nupe: Fo nan a gbaagba eti fuskaazhio da fi enao nan a cia gana gan Efe fin nangban yan ena sakaru

eng: Verily all things have We created in proportion and measure
nupe: Akika Yi jin yandondo jin be tsunwane

eng: And Our Command is but a single Act- like the twinkling of an eye
nupe: Alamari Yi ma fea sai de yanni ke eya ba nan

eng: And oft in the past have We destroyed gangs like unto you then is there any that will receive admonition
nupe: Akika ma Yi jin jamaa iri yezhi hallaka shidzo Ko ade za naa san tu minie bo nan

eng: All that they do is noted in their Books of Deeds
nupe: Akika etun ndondo nan a lo nan u yi kikaci fi Litafizhio

eng: Every matter small and great is on record
nupe: Etun tetengi kpata to wanciko kikaci a yio

eng: As to the Righteous they will be in the midst of Gardens and Rivers
nupe: Akika za nanzhie sundan Soko nan a fi aljannazhio ba nan nuwanzhie je fi nan

eng: In an Assembly of Truth in the Presence of a Sovereign Omnipotent
nupe: A fi edunfe ba yan gaskiyao eba Etsu mulkiko nan ma de kagbo nan

eng: Allah Most Gracious!
nupe: Soko Etsu yegun

eng: It is He Who has taught the Qur´an
nupe: Wuna kpikpe Alkuranu laawu alttazhi

eng: He has created man
nupe: Wuna alitta yan zawangi jin

eng: He has taught him speech and intelligence
nupe: U ciu wu egan ye kpe

eng: The sun and the moon follow courses exactly computed
nupe: Igidi to etswa e dazan da ganni be Lisafiy

eng: And the Firmament has He raised high and He has set up the Balance of Justice
nupe: Umasanma la tu U cia tsunwan laa cici

eng: In order that ye may not transgress due balance
nupe: Ebo ye ga gwo iyaka gan eba tsunwan dano ma

eng: So establish weight with justice and fall not short in the balance
nupe: Ye mae la tsunwane kue gikini be adalinci ye mae ga ke tsunwan tukun ma

eng: It is He Who has spread out the earth for His creatures
nupe: To kin ma Wun u laacici ebo alittazhio

eng: Therein is fruit and date-palms producing spathes enclosing dates
nupe: Miniubo yangici sunsunzhi fi bo to dobinazhi nanzhiyi be kperezhiy nan

eng: Also corn with its leaves and stalk for fodder and sweet-smelling plants
nupe: To eyan dzozhi nanzhiy yi be finizhiy nan to nanzhiy man a mae ya kan kan

eng: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny
nupe: Kici mini aya yan Tsoci ye zhio danbo nan yea yi ganmanan-nao

eng: He created man from sounding clay like unto pottery
nupe: U jin alitta yan zawangi dagan lamkpa wiwacio nan yi ke ezun pi poci nan

eng: And He created Jinns from fire free of smoke
nupe: U ma jin alitta yan januzhi jin dagan enan cikarao

eng: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny
nupe: Kici mini a ya Tso ci yezhio danbo nan yea yi ganmanan nao

eng: He is Lord of the two Easts and Lord of the two Wests
nupe: Tsoci yan eyilazhin guba yan zunzunka be yan ikere to Tsoci yan eyi lozun guba

eng: Then which of the favours of your Lord will ye deny
nupe: Kici mini aya yan Tsoci yezhio danbo nan yea yi ganmanan nao

eng: He has let free the two bodies of flowing water meeting together

eng: And what cause have ye why ye should not spend in the cause of Allah- For to Allah belongs the heritage of the heavens and the earth Not equal among you are those who spent freely and fought before the Victory with those who did so later Those are higher in rank than those who spent freely and fought afterwards But to all has Allah promised a goodly reward And Allah is well acquainted with all that ye do
nupe: Ki maajin ye ye cia wu dukiya fi eko Soko boa yino ngan Soko ga wun egun yan sanmazhio to kin yino Za nanzhi wu dukiya a ma gunkun kafi kpikpe yan Maka nan a jin ye ni be za nanzhi wu dukiya baci yan kpikpe naa Za wuncinzhi a wancin darajao gan za zunmazhi Kpata ma Soko jina alkawali yan egagba wangi Akika Soko de labari yan etun nanzhi ye lo nan

eng: Who is he that will Loan to Allah a beautiful loan for Allah will increase it manifold to his credit and he will have besides a liberal Reward

eng: One Day shalt thou see the believing men and the believing women- how their Light runs forward before them and by their right hands their greeting will be Good News for you this Day! Gardens beneath which flow rivers! to dwell therein for aye! This is indeed the highest Achievement!
nupe: Fo nan wo ga le Mumini bagizhi to mumini ynzagizhi ye nan askeazhi a fe dazan dan yegboro abo to gwa loa bo acia fe gana gan yangbanfai ajin tabbata yaye yin nan ganni be Aljannazhi nanzhi nuwanzhie je fi tutun yinna akika wuncin ga yi rabo nan wancin nao

eng: One Day will the Hypocrites- men and women - say to the Believers Wait for us! Let us borrow a Light from your Light! It will be said Turn ye back to your rear! then seek a Light where ye can! So a wall will be put up betwixt them with a gate therein Within it will be Mercy throughout and without it all alongside will be Wrath and Punishment!

eng: This Day shall no ransom be accepted of you nor of those who rejected Allah Your abode is the Fire that is the proper place to claim you and an evil refuge it is!

eng: Has not the Time arrived for the Believers that their hearts in all humility should engage in the remembrance of Allah and of the Truth which has been revealed to them and that they should not become like those to whom was given Revelation aforetime but long ages passed over them and their hearts grew hard For many among them are rebellious transgressors
nupe: To gbani eka laakuna ya za nan zhia imani jin naa nan yangbanazhi gaa dakpya ya pipa yan Soko naa be yannanzhiy ucin be yan gaskiya naa maa gafe ke za nanzhia la Litafi ya shidzo batsozhio ucia jin fo fia yangban azhi cia wo kpakparae na maa Akika ekun dondo za wuncinzhi fasikizhi yio

eng: Know ye all that Allah giveth life to the earth after its death! already have We shown the Signs plainly to you that ye may learn wisdom

eng: Know ye all that the life of this world is but play and amusement pomp and mutual boasting and multiplying in rivalry among yourselves riches and children Here is a similitude How rain and the growth which it brings forth delight the hearts of the tillers soon it withers thou wilt see it grow yellow then it becomes dry and crumbles away But in the Hereafter is a Penalty severe for the devotees of wrong And Forgiveness from Allah and His Good Pleasure for the devotees of Allah And what is the life of this world but goods and chattels of deception

eng: Be ye foremost in seeking Forgiveness from your Lord and a Garden of Bliss the width whereof is as the width of heaven and earth prepared for those who believe in Allah and His messengers that is the Grace of Allah which He bestows on whom he pleases and Allah is the Lord of Grace abounding

eng: No misfortune can happen on earth or in your souls but is recorded in a decree before We bring it into existence That is truly easy for Allah

eng: In order that ye may not despair over matters that pass you by nor exult over favours bestowed upon you For Allah loveth not any vainglorious boaster-

eng: Such persons as are covetous and commend covetousness to men And if any turn back from Allah´s Way verily Allah is Free of all Needs Worthy of all Praise

eng: We sent aforetime our messengers with Clear Signs and sent down with them the Book and the Balance of Right and Wrong that men may stand forth in justice and We sent down Iron in which is material for mighty war as well as many benefits for mankind that Allah may test who it is that will help Unseen Him and His messengers For Allah is Full of Strength Exalted in Might and able to enforce His Will

eng: We sent aforetime our messengers with Clear Signs and sent down with them the Book and the Balance of Right and Wrong that men may stand forth in justice and We sent down Iron in which is material for mighty war as well as many benefits for mankind that Allah may test who it is that will help Unseen Him and His messengers For Allah is Full of Strength Exalted in Might and able to enforce His Will

eng: And We sent Noah and Abraham and established in their line Prophethood and Revelation and some of them were on right guidance But many of them became rebellious transgressors

eng: Then in their wake We followed them up with others of Our messengers We sent after them Jesus the son of Mary and bestowed on him the Gospel and We ordained in the hearts of those who followed him Compassion and Mercy But the Monasticism which they invented for themselves We did not prescribe for them We commanded only the seeking for the Good Pleasure of Allah but that they did not foster as they should have done Yet We bestowed on those among them who believed their due reward but many of them are rebellious transgressors
nupe: Yici kezhea Tuci Yizhi gbaa zunmao Yicia Annabi Isa egi Maryamu gbaa zunmao be Yicia Litafi yan Linjeela laa yau Yicia tosayi be yeguny laadan yangban yan za nanzhia emi tuu nan Gwigwo gan iyaka dan mini ibadao ma e kpe ya be wunciny Yi ka wuncin ta etia boa sai de a fea wa yeda yan Soko A ma tswau kendo u gwoyin a tswau naa Yicia egagba wangi laa ya za nanzhia imani jin nan ekun dondo miniabo ma fasikizhi ayio

eng: O ye that believe! Fear Allah and believe in His Messenger and He will bestow on you a double portion of His Mercy He will provide for you a Light by which ye shall walk straight in your path and He will forgive you your past for Allah is Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful

eng: That the People of the Book may know that they have no power whatever over the Grace of Allah that His Grace is entirely in His Hand to bestow it on whomsoever He wills For Allah is the Lord of Grace abounding
