eng: Allah has indeed heard and accepted the statement of the woman who pleads with thee concerning her husband and carries her complaint in prayer to Allah and Allah always hears the arguments between both sides among you for Allah hears and sees all things
nupe: Akika Soko wo gan yan eza ynzagi nae gan lo gan-zhin be wyo yin eti egan ebau bo nan Ucie jin kara lo eba Soko Soko mae wo eza yezhi Akika Soko Etsu nae wo gan nan uyio Etsu nae le ba ye nan uyio

eng: If any men among you divorce their wives by Zihar calling them mothers they cannot be their mothers None can be their mothers except those who gave them birth And in fact they use words both iniquitous and false but truly Allah is one that blots out sins and forgives again and again
nupe: Za nanzhie jin zihari mini yebo be yinmiazhiy nan aajin afela yinminazhi san tatu be nnaazhi nnazhi yan akika a ga yi nanzhiy maa nao Akika a de gan gan dedezhi tinya misuno a mae zun ganmanan zun Akika Soko Etsu sauki uyio Etsu gafara uyio

eng: But those who divorce their wives by Zihar then wish to go back on the words they uttered- It is ordained that such a one should free a slave before they touch each other Thus are ye admonished to perform and Allah is well-acquainted with all that ye do
nupe: Za nanzhiy ma ga zihari jin be yinmiazhiy nan acia jin ake dazhin eti egan nagan nan ke uyi acina na hukunci nan ta etiabo nan u ga yi gan a la wuzhi a ya gi shidzo kafi a la egwaatu yinmiazhi nan Wuncin ga yi yan nan e la jin ye waazi nao Soko ma yi be Labari yan etun nanzhi ye lo kpata nan

eng: And if any has not the wherewithal he should fast for two months consecutively before they touch each other But if any is unable to do so he should feed sixty indigent ones this that ye may show your faith in Allah and His Messenger Those are limits set by Allah For those who reject Him there is a grievous Penalty
nupe: Gancin za nan be dewuzhia nan u la azum yan etswa guba nanzhiy lamitu dozhi nanu fe kafiu la egwau tu yinmiu nan Gancin zanan be jin wuncin woa nan u la eza gwagbagizhi za shitau ya yanu gi Wuncin ma yi ebo ye la imanie jin be Soko be Tuciu yin iyaka to hukunci yan Soko zhi ga dano nao azaba na ma tan nan wunajin tabbata ya kafirizhi

eng: Those who resist Allah and His Messenger will be humbled to dust as were those before them for We have already sent down Clear Signs And the Unbelievers will have a humiliating Penalty-
nupe: Akika za nanzhie le Soko be Tuciu yin ba nan a gaa gba kendoe za nanazhiy shiadzo nan gba nan akika Yia aya nanzhi tula nan cin bea ya wye akika ma azaba yan zun yesun a jin tabbata ya kafirizhi

eng: On the Day that Allah will raise them all up again and show them the Truth and meaning of their conduct Allah has reckoned its value though they may have forgotten it for Allah is Witness to all things
nupe: Fo nan Soko gaa naakin baenio nan wuna ya labari yan etun nanzhiy a lo nan Sokou gwo tswa a maa batan akika Sokoe jin eri eti yandondo

eng: Seest thou not that Allah doth know all that is in the heavens and on earth There is not a secret consultation between three but He makes the fourth among them - Nor between five but He makes the sixth- nor between fewer nor more but He is in their midst wheresoever they be In the end will He tell them the truth of their conduct on the Day of Judgment For Allah has full knowledge of all things
nupe: Kashi wyo le ye gan Soko kpikpe yan yannanzhi fi sanmazhio to kinbo naa A de eza swiswoci tsakani za guta boa sai de Soko gaa fe nicia a maa yi za gutsun Soko gaafe tswanayin cia ka aga gbagba ganacin ko aci ganacin sai Wuna dan gancin Uciayaa labari yan etun nanzhi a lo nan efo alkiyamiy Akika Soko de kpikpe yan yandondo

eng: Turnest thou not thy sight towards those who were forbidden secret counsels yet revert to that which they were forbidden to do And they hold secret counsels among themselves for iniquity and hostility and disobedience to the Messenger And when they come to thee they salute thee not as Allah salutes thee but in crooked ways And they say to themselves Why does not Allah punish us for our words Enough for them is Hell In it will they burn and evil is that destination!
nupe: Ngba Wyo le za nanzhi a kana gan a aga baza swiswoci na ma yea Gancin aci kezhe eti yannan akana gan a ga jin na ma a cie baza swiswoci eti le fio be gbin gbin tuy be lemba yan Tuciy A ma ga be ebawye a fe sa wyo mi be yan nan Soko la sa wyo yea nan acia fe gan dan yangbanazhio gan ki la Soko ci jin yi azaba ebo yannanzhiy yi ye gan nan boa yino jahannama danbo nan a gandan nan akika zobabiye

eng: O ye who believe! When ye hold secret counsel do it not for iniquity and hostility and disobedience to the Prophet but do it for righteousness and self-restraint and fear Allah to Whom ye shall be brought back
nupe: Ya ye nanzhia imani jin nan kami nan ye gaa baza swiswoci nan e ga baza eti le fio be gbingintuy be lemba Tuciy ma e baza eti emi latu Soko be dansun Sokoe yemae fe tswa Soko Etsu nan ebau ga yea kezhe lo nan

eng: Secret counsels are only inspired by the Evil One in order that he may cause grief to the Believers but he cannot harm them in the least except as Allah permits and on Allah let the Believers put their trust

eng: O ye who believe! When ye are told to make room in the assemblies spread out and make room ample room will Allah provide for you And when ye are told to rise up rise up Allah will rise up to suitable ranks and degrees those of you who believe and who have been granted mystic Knowledge And Allah is well-acquainted with all ye do

eng: O ye who believe! When ye consult the Messenger in private spend something in charity before your private consultation That will be best for you and most conducive to purity of conduct But if ye find not the wherewithal Allah is Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful
nupe: Ya ye nanzhia imani jin nan kami nan ye gabaza be Tuciy nan yea sadaka laa shidzo be-dzo Wuncin ga yi alheri ya ye yeo u ma tadzu gan Kagan ye be dea akika Soko Etsu gafara u yio Etsu yegun u yio

eng: Is it that ye are afraid of spending sums in charity before your private consultation with him If then ye do not so and Allah forgives you then at least establish regular prayer practise regular charity and obey Allah and His Messenger And Allah is well-acquainted with all that ye do
nupe: Kashiy ye sundan sun yan yaji ye ga sadaka laa Shidzo kafi ye baza nan Kagan ye be jina Soko cia fa be ye yin yea swallah ku gikini ye mae la zakkae wa ye mae la mietu Soko be Tuci uyio akika Soko de labari etun nanzhiy ye lo nan

eng: Turnest thou not thy attention to those who turn in friendship to such as have the Wrath of Allah upon them They are neither of you nor of them and they swear to falsehood knowingly
nupe: Ngba Wyo le za nanzhia jamaa nan zhi Soko a zhe wun be yin nan la ndakatazhi nan yea Za wuncinzhi a dan mini ye boa a ma dan minia boa A maajin a fe zhi kuti eti gan manao a tso ma kpe

eng: Allah has prepared for them a severe Penalty evil indeed are their deeds
nupe: Sokoa shiri yan azaba nan tan nan jin kaa akika etun nanzhiy e lo nan wuna bi ye

eng: Thou wilt not find any people who believe in Allah and the Last Day loving those who resist Allah and His Messenger even though they were their fathers or their sons or their brothers or their kindred For such He has written Faith in their hearts and strengthened them with a spirit from Himself And He will admit them to Gardens beneath which Rivers flow to dwell therein for ever Allah will be well pleased with them and they with Him They are the Party of Allah Truly it is the Party of Allah that will achieve Felicity
nupe: Wyoa tsun jamaa nanzhia imani jin be Sokoe be efo zobae nan a fe de cincin ya za nae le Soko be Tuciu yin ba naa ka agafe mimaazhi ko egiazhi ko yegiazhi ko dangiazhi Za wuncin zhi ga Sokoa imani jin tabbata dan yangbanazhi bo U ci kezhea ya kagbo dagan nkou bo uma gaa la gandan aljannazhio nanzhiy nuwanzhie je fi takoshinu bo nan baga boa fi tutun yino Sokoe yeda jin bea yin atso maa jin be Sokoe Za wuncinzhi ga yi za ba Soko akika ma za ba Soko zhi gaade nasarao

eng: Whatever is in the heavens and on earth let it declare the Praises and Glory of Allah for He is the Exalted in Might the Wise
nupe: Yan nazhi fi sanmazhio nan to nanzhi fi kin bo nan kpata e li Soko tsatsa yin Akika Soko Etsu zankpe u yio Etsu hikima Uyio

eng: It is He Who got out the Unbelievers among the People of the Book from their homes at the first gathering of the forces Little did ye think that they would get out And they thought that their fortresses would defend them from Allah! But the Wrath of Allah came to them from quarters from which they little expected it and cast terror into their hearts so that they destroyed their dwellings by their own hands and the hands of the Believers take warning then O ye with eyes to see!
nupe: Wun ga nyan kafirizhi mini zaba Litafizhi tin ya dagan emiazhi bo ebo gungun yekan yan mafari bo Ye yan ebankoazhi gaa a kangwa wo be Sokoe Soko ci dzunfia banan akpaye tua nan Ucia edo laace dan yangbanazhio atso ci fe ban emiazhi ya egwaazhi ganni be egwa Muminizhiy e fe kpa ye re ya nanzhi yi eza hankali zhi nan

eng: And had it not been that Allah had decreed banishment for them He would certainly have punished them in this world And in the Hereafter they shall certainly have the Punishment of the Fire
nupe: Kagan ujin ebo nan Sokoa nyin-nyan ka ta etiabo naa da U gaa jin azaba dede izheo azaba yan ena maga jin tabbata yaa ekuo

eng: That is because they resisted Allah and His Messenger and if any one resists Allah verily Allah is severe in Punishment
nupe: Wuncin ma yi ebo nan a le Soko be Tuciu yin ba nan zandondo na ma gaa le Soko ba nan Soko Etsu tsun tsunnu u yio

eng: Whether ye cut down O ye Muslim! The tender palm-trees or ye left them standing on their roots it was by leave of Allah and in order that He might cover with shame the rebellious transgresses
nupe: Cigan ndondo nan ye ga nan ko ma ye ciu ya gikini gbaro eti gbereu bo nan sai de be izini yan Sokoe wuncin yi ebo ula faskizhiu sun zunye

eng: What Allah has bestowed on His Messenger and taken away from them - for this ye made no expedition with either cavalry or camelry but Allah gives power to His messengers over any He pleases and Allah has power over all things
nupe: Yan nan ma Soko ga nasarau laucia ya Tuciu mini dukiyakafirizhio nanye gun kun gunbe dokozhi ko ma yan-tuci ndoci boa akika Skoe la kagbou Tuciu zhi ta eti iza nan ga bau nan Akika Soko de kangbo ta eti yandondo

eng: What Allah has bestowed on His Messenger and taken away from the people of the townships- belongs to Allah- to His Messenger and to kindred and orphans the needy and the wayfarer In order that it may not merely make a circuit between the wealthy among you So take what the Messenger assigns to you and deny yourselves that which he withholds from you And fear Allah for Allah is strict in Punishment
nupe: Yan nan zhiy Soko ga nasarau laa ya Tuciu mini alkaryazhio nan Soko wun dan miniu bo to Tuciu to za nanzhiy tsoba nan to ekungizhi to eza gwa gbagizhi to ezan daci ebo dukiya beazhe yan nae dan yi dangwa ewodecizhio nama Yandondo nan Tuci ga la cia ya ye nan yea emi tuu yan nan ma u ga kane yin jin nan yea kpe ya beu yin ye mae fe sundan Soko akika Soko Etsu azaba nan gbota nan u yio

eng: Some part is due to the indigent Muhajirs those who were expelled from their homes and their property while seeking Grace from Allah and His Good Pleasure and aiding Allah and His Messenger such are indeed the sincere ones-
nupe: A ma kezhea la ya talakazhiy nanzhia kpela nan nanzhiy a nyan tinya ezhia zhio nan acia gan be dukiyazhiy nan Aa jin afe wa eryatwa Soko be yedan yin zaA maajin a fe jin Eko Soko be Tuciu yin taimako nan Akika za wuncinzhi ga yi za gaskiyazhio

eng: But those who before them had homes in Medina and had adopted the Faith- show their affection to such as came to them for refuge and entertain no desire in their hearts for things given to the latter but give them preference over themselves even though poverty was their own lot And those saved from the covetousness of their own souls- they are the ones that achieve prosperity
nupe: Zananzhiy ma fedun zhi nbo nan Madinao aci shiadzo naa ajin a fe wa za nanzhi gaa kpela be tsuna nan a mae de dukata ke dan yangbanazhio yan yan nanzhi a ga la yaa amaajin afe tsa yegiazhi ta eti atsozhio kaaga yi be bukata yan yan wunciny zandomdo nan ga tswiswa laadan yanbotan yan yangbanu bo nanakika zawuncinzhi ga yi za nanzhia de rabo nao

eng: And those who came after them say Our Lord! Forgive us and our brethren who came before us into the Faith and leave not in our hearts rancour or sense of injury against those who have believed Our Lord! Thou art indeed Full of Kindness Most Merciful
nupe: Za nan zhiy ma be zunmaabo nan e gan gan Tsoci yi jin yi gafara to yegi yizhinan zhia shi yidzo be imaniy nan Wyo mao ga la nanvo ndondo dan yangban yi bo loeba za nanzhia imani jin nan ma Tsoci yi akika Wyo ga yi Etsu tosayio Wyo ga yi Etsu yeguno

eng: Hast thou not observed the Hypocrites say to their misbelieving brethren among the People of the Book - If ye are expelled we too will go out with you and we will never hearken to any one in your affair and if ye are attacked in fight we will help you But Allah is witness that they are indeed liars
nupe: Wyo le za nanzhiy jin manafunci nan yea E gan be yegiazhi nanzhia jin kafirinci mini za ba Litafi zhio nan gan Wallahi a ga ye nyan tin ya yi tso ga tin ya ganni be ye yin yi maa la mi tu foro yan zandondo eti ye bo san san yina A ma ga gun ye kun ye kun yia jine taimako Akika Soko jinri ke ganmanan zuncizhi a yio nan

eng: If they are expelled never will they go out with them and if they are attacked in fight they will never help them and if they do help them they will turn their backs so they will receive no help
nupe: Ka a ga nya tin ya a dzun tinya bea yina ka ama ga guna kun a jina taimakoa ka ama ga jina taimako a ga zunma zheta fe bici gancin a maa jina taimakoa

eng: Of a truth ye are stronger than they because of the terror in their hearts sent by Allah This is because they are men devoid of understanding
nupe: Akika dansun ye u gbota gan dansun Soko fi yangbanazhio wuncin mayi ebo nan a de kpikpe wangia nan

eng: They will not fight you even together except in fortified townships or from behind walls Strong is their fighting spirit amongst themselves thou wouldst think they were united but their hearts are divided that is because they are a people devoid of wisdom
nupe: A gun ye kun wo baeni boa sai de ezhi nanzhiy a ga dan gba nao ko ma zunmashin yan karazhio Nanvo atso be dozhiy u gbota Sarauyin Wyo ga lea ye Wyoa ye gan ko kpaataa nini a yio yangbanazhi ma kaka yin u yio wuncin ma yi ebo nan ade ankalia nan

eng: Like those who lately preceded them they have tasted the evil result of their conduct and in the Hereafter there is for them a grievous Penalty-
nupe: A yi ke Misali yan za nanzhiy Shidzo tsoba nan aazaba yan etun dedeazhi fin azaba nan ma tan nan wuna jin tabbata yaa

eng: Their allies deceived them like the Evil One when he says to man Deny Allah but when man denies Allah the Evil One says I am free of thee I do fear Allah the Lord of the Worlds!
nupe: Ke misali yan Sheitan nan kaminan uga gan zawangi gan A jin kafirinci nankamina uga kafirincin jin zo nan u gan Egwa mi de dan beo yina akika mie sundan Soko nae kpa alittazhi kpata nan

eng: O ye who believe! Fear Allah and let every soul look to what provision He has sent forth for the morrow Yea fear Allah for Allah is well-acquainted with all that ye do
nupe: Ya ye nanzhia imani jin nan e sundan Soko zandondo mau cinuleu lo yan nan uga lashidzo ya etiu ya esun alkiyamio nan ye mae sundan Soko akika Soko yi be labariy yan etun nanzhi ye lo nan

eng: And be ye not like those who forgot Allah and He made them forget their own souls! Such are the rebellious transgressors!
nupe: Ye mae gaa fe ke dozhin za nanzhia Soko batan na ma ebo nan Soko jinatso a eti tacinatso batan Akika za wuncinzhi ga yi fasikizhio

eng: Not equal are the Companions of the Fire and the Companions of the Garden it is the Companions of the Garden that will achieve Felicity
nupe: Egi mi na zhi a jin ye ni be egi mi aljanna yina egi mi aljannazhi aga yi za nanzhia de robo nao

eng: Had We sent down this Qur´an on a mountain verily thou wouldst have seen it humble itself and cleave asunder for fear of Allah Such are the similitudes which We propound to men that they may reflect
nupe: Da aci gan eti pati bo Yi cin Alkuranu nan nan tao da wyo a le pati wuncin nan nan tao da wyo a le pati wuncin ye ugaa daku uci gaa lafi ebo dansun Soko misali wuncin ma Yie lau la wu zawangizhi ebo ko a kpa ye

eng: Allah is He than Whom there is no other god- Who knows all things both secret and open He Most Gracious Most Merciful
nupe: Soko ga yi Etsu nan a de tsoci ndocia sai Wun nao Etsu nan de kpikpe yan naa swo nan to naa tula nan u yio Etsu rahma Etsu yegun

eng: Allah is He than Whom there is no other god- the Sovereign the Holy One the Source of Peace and Perfection the Guardian of Faith the Preserver of Safety the Exalted in Might the Irresistible the Supreme Glory to Allah! High is He above the partners they attribute to Him
nupe: Soko ga yi Etsu nan a de tsoci ndocia sai Wun nao Etsu mulki Etsu lili Etsu aminci Etsu nae yedan yandondo nan Etsu zankpe Etsu Tiile Etsu cinwan Lili kpataajin tabbata ya Soko ke ya nanzhie la pau baci nan lugwa

eng: He is Allah the Creator the Evolver the Bestower of Forms or Colours To Him belong the Most Beautiful Names whatever is in the heavens and on earth doth declare His Praises and Glory and He is the Exalted in Might the Wise
nupe: Wun ga yi Soko nae jin alitta nao Etsu nae tswa yan zhi nan Etsu nae la nankankpace ya alittazhi nan Etsu nan yi be sunna wangizhi nan Yan nanzhi fi sanmazhio to kinbo nan e liu tsatsayin Wun ga yi Etsu zan kpe o Etsu hikima

eng: O ye who believe! Take not my enemies and yours as friends or protectors- offering them your love even though they have rejected the Truth that has come to you and have on the contrary driven out the Prophet and yourselves from your homes simply because ye believe in Allah your Lord! If ye have come out to strive in My Way and to seek My Good Pleasure take them not as friends holding secret converse of love and friendship with them for I know full well all that ye conceal and all that ye reveal And any of you that does this has strayed from the Straight Path
nupe: Ya ye nanzhia imani jin nan e ga la makiri Mi to makiri yezhi eya manchizhi ma ye la cin cin wua a maa jin kafirinci be gaskiya nan be ya ye nae har e la Tuci nya dzun Mi mae jine gangba gan ye la imanie jin be Soko nan yi Tsoci ye nan wunayi gan ye tintinya ebo ekungun ta eti ekpa Mi bo nan ye mae wa yeda Mi wa ga nan Ye la cin cin wua swiswoci Mi ma de kpikpe yannanzhi ye swo nan to nan ye tula nan zaeni ndondo na ga jin acin miniebo nan akika wuna ya ke eko gboro lugwa

eng: If they were to get the better of you they would behave to you as enemies and stretch forth their hands and their tongues against you for evil and they desire that ye should reject the Truth
nupe: Ya wye Annabi Mumina ynzagizhi ga be eba wye acia mubayaa jin a alkawali yan imani jin gan ala yandondo pa Soko bacia a maayi yana a maa da yancina a ma wu egizhia a maa la egi yanci be ya ebaazhia a ma le foro wangi yan wyozhi baa wyo la mubayao jin bea yina yeda jin bea yin wyo mao ba gafara yan Soko yaa akika Soko Etsu gafara uyio Etsu yegun uyio

eng: Of no profit to you will be your relatives and your children on the Day of Judgment He will judge between you for Allah sees well all that ye do
nupe: Dangiezhi to egiezhi aajine anfani efo alkiyamia Soko ga gin-gan laadan tsakaniebo be dozhiy akika Sokoe le ye ye be iri etun nanzhi ye lo nan

eng: There is for you an excellent example to follow in Abraham and those with him when they said to their people We are clear of you and of whatever ye worship besides Allah we have rejected you and there has arisen between us and you enmity and hatred for ever- unless ye believe in Allah and Him alone But not when Abraham said to his father I will pray for forgiveness for thee though I have no power to get aught on thy behalf from Allah They prayed Our Lord! in Thee do we trust and to Thee do we turn in repentance to Thee is our Final Goal
nupe: Akika ye de yesan wangi dan mini Annabi Ibrahimao to jamaa nanzhi dan beuyin nan nyan kaminan a gan be jamaa yan kinmiazhi gan Akika Yi yia egwa yizhi wa be ye yin to yannan ye jin bauta ya ke Soko lugwa nan Yi maa ga jin kafirinci be ye yin ewunsun be nanvoe maa tula tsakani yi bo be ye yin har abada sai de ye ga imani jin be Sokoe gbaugi sai de egan nan Ibrahima gan be Babau yin nan akika mia ba gafara ya wye mi ma de mulki yandondo ya wye wo wba Soko boa Tsoci yan yi wyo ga yi yakpeo eba wyo ga ma yia zheban zhino ezhe keba yi ma be wyo yinu dano

eng: Our Lord! Make us not a test and trial for the Unbelievers but forgive us our Lord! for Thou art the Exalted in Might the Wise
nupe: Soko ga lugwayi yaafe fitina ya kafirizhi ma wyo mao fa be yi yin akika wyo ga yi Etsu Zankpeo Etsu hikimao

eng: There was indeed in them an excellent example for you to follow- for those whose hope is in Allah and in the Last Day But if any turn away truly Allah is Free of all Wants Worthy of all Praise
nupe: Akika ye de yesan wangi dan miniabo ammaa ya za nan gae jin kauna Soko be efo zobae nan Zaeni ndondo nan ga zunma zheta gaskiya nan akika Soko Etsu kunke uyio Etsu nan zandondoe jinyeba ya nan uyio

eng: It may be that Allah will grant love and friendship between you and those whom ye now hold as enemies For Allah has power over all things And Allah is Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful
nupe: Kengi uyio nan Soko ga cincin laadan tsakani yebo be za nanzhi ye nanvo miniabo nan Soko de kagbo eti wuncino Akika Soko Etsu gafara uyio Etsu yegun uyio

eng: Allah forbids you not with regard to those who fight you not for your Faith nor drive you out of your homes from dealing kindly and justly with them for Allah loveth those who are just
nupe: Soko kan ye adalinciyn jin be zananzhiy a gun ye kun mini adini boa naa yina ama ke nya yedzun emi yezhi boa e da gboro ye mae jin adalinci beayin akika Sokoe wa za nanzhi gae jin adalinci nan

eng: Allah only forbids you with regard to those who fight you for your Faith and drive you out of your homes and support others in driving you out from turning to them for friendship and protection It is such as turn to them in these circumstances that do wrong
nupe: Ammade Soko kanye eti za nanzhie gun ye kun dan mini adinio nan to nanzhiy nyan ye tinya emi yezhio nan to za nanzhie jin taimako eti nyin nyan ye bo nan ega kara laa eya mancizhi ma zandondo nan gaa la eya manci nan akika zawuncizhi ga yi azwalumi zhio

eng: O ye who believe! When there come to you believing women refugees examine and test them Allah knows best as to their Faith if ye ascertain that they are Believers then send them not back to the Unbelievers They are not lawful wives for the Unbelievers nor are the Unbelievers lawful husbands for them But pay the Unbelievers what they have spent on their dower and there will be no blame on you if ye marry them on payment of their dower to them But hold not to the guardianship of unbelieving women ask for what ye have spent on their dowers and let the Unbelievers ask for what they have spent on the dowers of women who come over to you Such is the command of Allah He judges with justice between you And Allah is Full of Knowledge and Wisdom
nupe: Ya ye nanzhia imani jin nan kamina ynzagi Mumini nazhi gaa kpe la be eba ye nan e maa cin le Soko ma de kpikpe yan imania gan U ga tula ya ye gan Muminazhi ayio e ga nyana kezhe da tsun kafirizhi be ma A jin halali ya kafirizhia atso kafirizhi ma jin halali yaa yan nan kafirizhi ga wu etiabo nan ya yana la yaa Leifi ma danboa yetso ga yawo jin bea yin naa a beke ye ga sadaki laa yaa ni naa Ye mae ga lagwa suna be egban yan kafirizhiy ma e gbingan yan yannanzhi ye ga wu nan atso maa gbingan yan yannanzhi a ga wu nan Wuncin ga yi hukunci Soko nan ujin tsakani yebo nao Akika Soko Etsu kpikpe uyio Etsu hikima uyio

eng: And if any of your wives deserts you to the Unbelievers and ye have an accession by the coming over of a woman from the other side then pay to those whose wives have deserted the equivalent of what they had spent on their dower And fear Allah in Whom ye believe
nupe: Yandoci ga bea fanye gwa mini yinmi yezhio lwo eba kafirizhi yeci guna kun har nyanatsozhi ci dazhin eba ye za nanzhiy nyinmiazhi ga daa nan yea kwatonci yan yannanzhi a ga wu nan la yaa ye mae sundan Soko nan ye jin imani be yin nan

eng: O Prophet! When believing women come to thee to take the oath of fealty to thee that they will not associate in worship any other thing whatever with Allah that they will not steal that they will not commit adultery or fornication that they will not kill their children that they will not utter slander intentionally forging falsehood and that they will not disobey thee in any just matter- then do thou receive their fealty and pray to Allah for the forgiveness of their sins for Allah is Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful
nupe: Yaw ye Annabi Mumina ynzagizhi ga be eba wye acia mubayaa jin a alkwaali yan imani jin gan ala yandondo pa Soko bacia a maayi yana a maa da yancina a ma wu egizhia a maa la egi yanci be ya ebaazhia a ma le foro wangi yan wyozhi baa wyo la mubayao jin bea yin a yeda jin bea yin wyo mao ba gafara yan Soko yaa akika Soko Etsu gafara u yio Etsu yegun u yio

eng: O ye who believe! Turn not for friendship to people on whom is the Wrath of Allah of the Hereafter they are already in despair just as the Unbelievers are in despair about those buried in graves
nupe: Ya ye nanzhia imani jin nan e ga la za nanzhi Sokoa zhewun beayin nan eya mancizhi ma akika zawuncinzhia kauna ba be egagba wangi yan efo zobae kendoe kafirizhi ba kauna be ekun nanzhi fi kabarizhio na

eng: Whatever is in the heavens and on earth let it declare the Praises and Glory of Allah for He is the Exalted in Might the Wise
nupe: Yan nanzhi fi sanmazhio to kin bo nan a Soko li tsatsa yin Soko ga ma yi Etsu hikimao

eng: O ye who believe! Why say ye that which ye do not
nupe: Ya ye nanzhia imani jin nan ki la ye cie gan gan nanzhi ye la lo tuna naa yino

eng: Grievously odious is it in the sight of Allah that ye say that which ye do not
nupe: Wuna gbota sarauyin eba Soko nan yea fe gan gan ye mae la lo tuna nan

eng: Truly Allah loves those who fight in His Cause in battle array as if they were a solid cemented structure
nupe: Akika Soko e wa za nanzhie gunkun dan ekoubo aci yi safu nini nan ke wyoa ye gan batu ayio nanzhiy la gwa fin dozhin nan

eng: And remember Moses said to his people O my people! why do ye vex and insult me though ye know that I am the messenger of Allah sent to you Then when they went wrong Allah let their hearts go wrong For Allah guides not those who are rebellious transgressors
nupe: Kaminan Annabi Musa gan be jamaa yanuzhi gan Ya ye jamaa yan mizhi ki la yecie jin mi guno Akika yetso ma kpe gan Tuci Soko mi yi be eba ye yeo Kaminan a bea pan ya nan Soko cia yangbanazhi pan ya ke eko lugwa akika Sokoe la jamaa yan fasikizhi ke ekoa

eng: And remember Jesus the son of Mary said O Children of Israel! I am the messenger of Allah sent to you confirming the Law which came before me and giving Glad Tidings of a Messenger to come after me whose name shall be Ahmad But when he came to them with Clear Signs they said this is evident sorcery!
nupe: To kaminan Annabi Isa egi Maryama gan gan Ya ye Bani Israilazhi akika Tuci mi yi be eba ye yeo naa gaskiya ya be Litafi nanzhiy shidzo minI Attaurao nan Mi mae ya ye labari yan yangban fa be bibe yan Tuci ndoci zunma mibo nan sunau yi Ahamadu nan Kaminan u be yaa be hujjazhiy nan a cigan Nan nan de eyan ma uyio naa tula nan

eng: Who doth greater wrong than one who invents falsehood against Allah even as he is being invited to Islam And Allah guides not those who do wrong
nupe: Ziy ti binankun gan za nan tswa ganmanan ta Soko alhali ma e yiu gan u dauzhin Musulunci nao Soko mae la jamaa yan azwalumizhi ke ekoa

eng: Their intention is to extinguish Allah´s Light by blowing with their mouths But Allah will complete the revelation of His Light even though the Unbelievers may detest it
nupe: E wa gan a la aske Sokoa nu be misunazhiy Soko ma ga askeu she ka kafirizhi ga nanvo nan

eng: It is He Who has sent His Messenger with Guidance and the Religion of Truth that he may proclaim it over all religion even though the Pagans may detest it
nupe: Soko ga yi Etsu nan tun Tuciutun be bawuy ganni be adini yan gaskiya yino nan ebo u la wunu lautu ta eti adinizhio kpata ka da Mushrikizhi ga nanvo

eng: O ye who believe! Shall I lead you to a bargain that will save you from a grievous Penalty-
nupe: Ya ye nanzhia imani jin nan ngba min wu ye ba lo woce nan yega egwa sunu u ga ye gangwa be azaba tintan-ciy nan

eng: That ye believe in Allah and His Messenger and that ye strive your utmost in the Cause of Allah with your property and your persons That will be best for you if ye but knew!
nupe: Ya imani jin be Soko be Tuciu yin ye mae fe jin jihadi kokari wanciko eti eko Soko be dukiya yezhi to nankan kpace zhiy wuncin ga yi alheri ya ye yeo ye ga kpe nan

eng: He will forgive you your sins and admit you to Gardens beneath which Rivers flow and to beautiful mansions in Gardens of Eternity that is indeed the Supreme Achievement
nupe: Wuna fa be zunubi yezhiy Uma gae laagan dan aljannazhio nanzhi nuwanzie je fi takoabo nan ganni be emi wangizhiy dan mini aljannazhio nan zhi yi emi emanwo nan Wuncin ga yi robo nan wancin nao

eng: And another favour will He bestow which ye do love- help from Allah and a speedy victory So give the Glad Tidings to the Believers
nupe: Ndoci ma danbo nan ye wa nan u ga yi nasara dagan eba Sokobo be eko kpe nan tsoba nan Wyo mao ya Muminizhi labari yangban fa

eng: O ye who believe! Be ye helpers of Allah As said Jesus the son of Mary to the Disciples Who will be my helpers to the work of Allah Said the disciples We are Allah´s helpers! then a portion of the Children of Israel believed and a portion disbelieved But We gave power to those who believed against their enemies and they became the ones that prevailed
nupe: Ya ye nanzhia imani jin nan yea fe taimako jincizhi ya adini Soko iri kendoe Annabi Isa egi Maryama gan be Hawariyuzhiynan za nan zhi tuu zunma nan Zia jin mi taimako eti etun Soko bo Hawariyuzhi cigan Yi ga yi za nanzhia jin adini Soko taimako nao Sashi yan Banu Israilazhi cia imani jin sashi ma ajin kafirinci Yi cia za nanzhia imani jin nan ya zankpe be kagboe ta eti makiriazhio acia fe za nanzhia de nasara nan

eng: Whatever is in the heavens and on earth doth declare the Praises and Glory of Allah- the Sovereign the Holy One the Exalted in Might the Wise
nupe: Kpata yan nanzhi fi mini sanmazhio nan to nazhi fi kinbo nan eli Soko tsa tsa yin Etsu mulki Etsu lili Etsu zankpe Etsu nan yi egba dan jin jin yandondo-o nan

eng: It is He Who has sent amongst the Unlettered a messenger from among themselves to rehearse to them His Signs to sanctify them and to instruct them in Scripture and Wisdom- although they had been before in manifest error-
nupe: Wyun ga yi za na tun Tuci fi Larabawazhi dagan mini atso nao Ucie gba aya Soko yaa U cielaa li ke shikan lugwa Ucie wua kpikpe yan litafi Soko ganni be hikimazhi Akika shidzo kafi Annabiu be nan za wuncinzhi afe fi mini egbin naa tula nan

eng: As well as to confer all these benefits upon others of them who have not already joined them And He is exalted in Might Wise
nupe: To za ndocizhi miniabo a laa be dan lokaci Annabio ganni be za lokaciu zhi yina nan kpata Annabi Muhammadu SAW ga Soko tun fi a o Akika Soko Etsu zankpe uyio Egba ma uyio

eng: Such is the Bounty of Allah which He bestows on whom He will and Allah is the Lord of the highest bounty
nupe: Wuncin ma falala uyio yan Soko nan wuna jin u la ya za nan ga bau nan Akika Soko Etsu falala uyio nan wancin nan

eng: The similitude of those who were charged with the obligations of the Mosaic Law but who subsequently failed in those obligations is that of a donkey which carries huge tomes but understands them not Evil is the similitude of people who falsify the Signs of Allah and Allah guides not people who do wrong
nupe: Kotonci yan za nanzhi yi be kpikpe yan Attaura litafi nan a cin be ya Annabi Musa nan a ma lotun be yan nanzhi litafi gan naa nan a yi ke kotonci yan tyatyagi naa karazhi la nan u de amfani ndondo boa sai wahala banza bibi be -- sunI wunajin tabbata ya za nanzhia aya Soko zhi yi ganmanan nan akika Sokoe la jamaa yan azwalumizhi ke eko gurua

eng: Say O ye that stand on Judaism! If ye think that ye are friends to Allah to the exclusion of other men then express your desire for Death if ye are truthful!
nupe: Annabi gan gan Ye Yahudizhi ye gae leye le gan ye tsayi masoyi Soko gbuwgio za na ke nazhi a jina ejin guri ye mae jin aduwa gan Soko u la yeu wu Wunayi za gaskiyazhi ye yio nan

eng: But never will they express their desire for Death because of the deeds their hands have sent on before them! and Allah knows well those that do wrong!Amaa jin guri wuncina har abada ebo etun dede nanzhi a la shidzo nan Akika Soko yi be kpikpe azwalumizhi ganni be etun nanzhi e lo nan
Say The Death from which ye flee will truly overtake you then will ye be sent back to the Knower of things secret and open and He will tell you the truth of the things that ye did!
nupe: Gan yaa gan ajali wuncin nan ye biciu daa nan akika wuna da gune bandondo A ma ga ye la da zhin eba Soko nan de kpikpe yan nan so nan to nan tula nan Soko ci a ya ye labari yan etun nanzhi ye fe lo izheo nan

eng: O ye who believe! When the call is proclaimed to prayer on Friday the Day of Assembly hasten earnestly to the Remembrance of Allah and leave off business and traffic That is best for you if ye but knew!
nupe: Ye nanzhi gan yea imani jin nan! Kaminan a ga sallah yi yan efo jummua nan Yea shiri jin da dannan pipa Soko ye mae la woce elugwa Wuncin nan yeajin nan u ga yi alhairi ya ye yeo Ye ga de kpikpe de nan

eng: And when the Prayer is finished then may ye disperse through the land and seek of the Bounty of Allah and celebrate the Praises of Allah often and without stint that ye may prosper
nupe: Kaminan a ga sallah jin zo nan yea ga ya kpe eti kinbo ye mae fe wa falala yan Soko Ye mae tun Soko e ye yetun nan dokun nan Be wuncin ga yea tso gurio

eng: But when they see some bargain or some amusement they disperse headlong to it and leave thee standing Say The blessing from the Presence of Allah is better than any amusement or bargain! and Allah is the Best to provide for all needs
nupe: Abeke a ga le kaaya wocezhi ye nan ko a ci wo san san edzo nan ke eyan nan a dzun tinya da eba eyan edzozhi A ci ga wyo ya gi gbaro Annabi gan gan egagba nan dan be Sokoe nan u de alhairi gan edzo ganni be woce Akika Soko ga yi Etsu nane ya za arziki nano

eng: When the Hypocrites come to thee they say We bear witness that thou art indeed the Messenger of Allah Yea Allah knoweth that thou art indeed His Messenger and Allah beareth witness that the Hypocrites are indeed liars
nupe: Kaminan Munafikizhi ga be eba wyo nan ajina gan gan Yia eri jin ke akika Tuci Soko wo yio nan Soko o tso kpe ke akika Tuciu wo yio nan Soko o tso jin ri ke akika Munafikizhi ganmanan zunci zhi ayio nan

eng: They have made their oaths a screen for their misdeeds thus they obstruct men from the Path of Allah truly evil are their deeds
nupe: Munafikizhi a kuti nae zhi be sunna Sokoe na la ke garkuwa nan a cie la zawangizhi pan ya ke eko Soko lugwa akika etun nan munafikizhie lo nan wuna biye

eng: That is because they believed then they rejected Faith So a seal was set on their hearts therefore they understand not
nupe: Wuncin ma yi ebo nan Munafikizhi a imani jin be misunI acie lo tun yan kafirinci nan Soko cia basira yangbana te aci de fahimta yandondoa sai yan etun dedezhi

eng: When thou lookest at them their exteriors please thee and when they speak thou listenest to their words They are as worthless as hollow pieces of timber propped up unable to stand on their own They think that every cry is against them They are the enemies so beware of them The curse of Allah be on them! How are they deluded away from the Truth!
nupe: Munafikizhi Wo ga lea ye nankan kpaceazhi a fe yao shahawa a man gae gan-gan wyoashi tukpa wo gana  Wo ga lea ye kendoe a fedun fe zhi yegboro Annabio nan Wyoa ye gan ko cigbantun ayio nan a la kpetso nan Munafikizhi ajin a fe kpaye gan kabara ndondo nan a ga yi nan etiabo a yi wuno wato ajin afe sundan gaskiya za wuncinzhi ga yi akika yan makiyi Soko be Tuciu yino ebo acino e tswaa Laana Soko ta etiabo Kii la acie laa pan ya ke gaskiya lugwao

eng: And when it is said to them Come the Messenger of Allah will pray for your forgiveness they turn aside their heads and thou wouldst see them turning away their faces in arrogance

eng: It is equal to them whether thou pray for their forgiveness or not Allah will not forgive them Truly Allah guides not rebellious transgressors
nupe: Daidai u yi etiabo ka wyo ga wa gafara ya ko ma wooga wa yaa ma Sokoa jin gafaraa Akika Soko wune la fasikizhi ke ekoa

eng: They are the ones who say Spend nothing on those who are with Allah´s Messenger to the end that they may disperse and quit Medina But to Allah belong the treasures of the heavens and the earth but the Hypocrites understand not

eng: They say If we return to Medina surely the more honourable element will expel therefrom the meaner But honour belongs to Allah and His Messenger and to the Believers but the Hypocrites know not
nupe: Aci fe gan gan Yi ga kezhe daa zhinin yan Madina za nanzhi ga yi za cinwan cizhi nan a ga za gbagbangizhi yan tinya Akika ma zankpe be cinwane wuna jin tabbata ya Soko be Tuciu yin be Muminizhi ammaa de munafikizhi a de kpikpe akika nan naa

eng: O ye who believe! Let not your riches or your children divert you from the remembrance of Allah If any act thus the loss is their own
nupe: Ye nanzhi a imani jin nan ega lugwa dukiya yezhi to egiezhi a ye jin shagala ke pipa yan Soko lugwa ma Zaeni ndondo nan ga jin a cin nan za wuncin zhi ga yi eza asara zhio

eng: and spend something in charity out of the substance which We have bestowed on you before Death should come to any of you and he should say O my Lord! why didst Thou not give me respite for a little while I should then have given largely in charity and I should have been one of the doers of good
nupe: Ye mae wu dukiya yezhi nan Mi la ya ye nan fi eko wangizhio kafi ajaliu beu la zaeni ndondo e nan Ega lugwa sai efo ajali ga da be man Ye cie fe gan gan Tsoci woa pata ya mi daa eka degia ebo min deba nla dukiya mizhi nku njin sadaka mi ma gaafe dan mini za guru zhio

eng: But to no soul will Allah grant respite when the time appointed for it has come and Allah is well acquainted with all that ye do
nupe: Akika ma Soko wuna pata ya rayi ndondoa kaminan efo ajali u gaa tun naa Akika Soko de labari etun nanzhi ye lo kpata nan

nupe: Yannanzhi fi sanmazhio kpata nan to nazhi fi kinbo nan e li Soko kandondo Soko ga wun akika yan mulkio Wun ga man wun akika yan yeboo Akika Soko de iko ta eti yandondo

eng: It is He Who has created you and of you are some that are Unbelievers and some that are Believers and Allah sees well all that ye do
nupe: Soko ga yi Etsu nan jin alitta yan ye nao Miniebo a de nanzhia jin kafirinci be Tsocia yin nan Miniebo a de nan zhia gaskiya ya a ma imani jin nan Akika Soko Etsu nane cin ye le dan jin jin yandondo bo nan uyio

eng: He has created the heavens and the earth in just proportions and has given you shape and made your shapes beautiful and to Him is the final Goal
nupe: Sokoa alitta yan sanmazhi jin to kin ganni be gaskiyae Ucia siffa ye jin siffa nan yi wangi nan akika yandondo a kezhe da tsun Soko

eng: He knows what is in the heavens and on earth and He knows what ye conceal and what ye reveal yea Allah knows well the secrets of all hearts

eng: Has not the story reached you of those who rejected Faith aforetime So they tasted the evil result of their conduct and they had a grievous Penalty

eng: That was because there came to them messengers with Clear Signs but they said Shall mere human beings direct us So they rejected the Message and turned away But Allah can do without them and Allah is free of all needs worthy of all praise

eng: The Unbelievers think that they will not be raised up for Judgment Say Yea By my Lord Ye shall surely be raised up then shall ye be told the truth of all that ye did And that is easy for Allah

eng: Believe therefore in Allah and His Messenger and in the Light which we have sent down And Allah is well acquainted with all that ye do

eng: The Day that He assembles you all for a Day of Assembly- that will be a Day of mutual loss and gain among you and those who believe in Allah and work righteousness- He will remove from them their ills and He will admit them to Gardens beneath which Rivers flow to dwell therein for ever that will be the Supreme Achievement

eng: Knower of what is open Exalted in Might Full of Wisdom
nupe: Soko Etsu nan yi be kpikpe yan yandondo nan so nan to nan tula nan uyio Etsu nan zankpeu ta eti yandondo nan Etsu nan yi Egba dan jinjin yandondo nan u yio

eng: O Prophet! When ye do divorce women divorce them at their prescribed periods and count accurately their prescribed periods And fear Allah your Lord and turn them not out of their houses nor shall they themselves leave except in case they are guilty of some open lewdness those are limits set by Allah and any who transgresses the limits of Allah does verily wrong his own soul thou knowest not if perchance Allah will bring about thereafter some new situation
nupe: Ya wyoe Annabi to Muminizhi kpata kaminan ye ga la yawo be yinmi yezhii nan e laa yawo lokaci nan a ga alada yan etswa jin acia lo dan lilio nan Ye mae tswa lisafi yan efo iddauzhi etswa guta Ye mae sundan Soko be tswitswa yan dokau zhi e ga nyana tinya kataabo ma atso mana ga tinya ma sai a ga da lotun yan alfahsha nana tula nan ke yancin da nan Hukunci nan nanzhi doka yan Soko dano nano zaeni ndondo na ga doka Soko gbintu nan wuna eti tacinu jin gun Hakika ye kpea ko be edun na afe nbo acia jin idda nan Soko a la egbazhe yan alhairi dan tsakani yebo be dozhi

eng: Thus when they fulfil their term appointed either take them back on equitable terms or part with them on equitable terms and take for witness two persons from among you endued with justice and establish the evidence as before Allah Such is the admonition given to him who believes in Allah and the Last Day And for those who fear Allah He ever prepares a way out
nupe: Lokaci nan a ga idda yan yawo la jin zo nan Yea egwa suna be boloboloe kendoe Soko ga ba hukunci nan ko ma ye gan bea yin be bolobolo kendoe Soko ga ba hukunci nan Ye mae wa za guba nanzhia gwa sun addina na ebo a jin ri yan yawo lo ko gyara yawo la Ye mae la erie kue gikini tsakanie be Sokoe Hukunci nnazhi eti yawo lao za nanzhi ga imani jin be Sokoe acia imani jin be efo zobae nan ga a jin amfani beu yin eti dansun Soko bo Zaeni ndondo na gae tswa Soko nan Sokoa jin egwagan yau ganni be eko kpe yan alhairi zhii

eng: And He provides for him from sources he never could imagine And if any one puts his trust in Allah sufficient is Allah for him For Allah will surely accomplish his purpose verily for all things has Allah appointed a due proportion

eng: Such of your women as have passed the age of monthly courses for them the prescribed period if ye have any doubts is three months and for those who have no courses it is the same for those who carry life within their wombs their period is until they deliver their burdens and for those who fear Allah He will make their path easy
nupe: Yinzagi nanzhia kuku a mae jin shikan etswa bea nan Ye gae jin kelokezhin dan hukunci idda abo nyana yi etswa guta Acinga egi yinzagi nanzhi a laa ca haila yin jina nan ebo dzakanboabo idda yan atso yi etswa guta To yinzagi nan zhi yi be ewane nan  ebaazhi ga bee ya idda a yi kaminan a ga yan nan fi ewan azhio nan man nan idda a zo dano nan Akika zaeni ndondo nan gae sundan Soko cie tswa iyakau zhi nan Soko ga sauki laa dan alamari ndondoo yau

eng: Let the women live in ´iddat in the same style as ye live according to your means Annoy them not so as to restrict them And if they carry life in their wombs then spend your substance on them until they deliver their burden and if they suckle your offspring give them their recompense and take mutual counsel together according to what is just and reasonable And if ye find yourselves in difficulties let another woman suckle the child on the father´s behalf
nupe: E lugwa yinmi nanzhi ye ga ya nan afi dannan nanzhi ye tso gae fi nan har da lokaci nan iddaa a gun mi nan Ye mae ga jina gun ganni be eba yibae ma A gaa fe za nanzhi yi be ewane nan kaa wuna yi yiya gutao e fe yaa yangici gi be yandoci yan bukataazhi har da lokaci nan a ma yan nan fi ewana bo nan A ma gaa fedun eti eye la dan egi yezhio Yea laada ewo etun nan a lo nan laa yaa har da lokaci nan egi awa emi ebe o nan Ye mae fe jin bolobolo tsakanie bo be dozhi Kagan ye be lodozhi be yinmi yina eti egi kpa boa da wa yinzagi ndoci nana kpau nan

eng: Let the man of means spend according to his means and the man whose resources are restricted let him spend according to what Allah has given him Allah puts no burden on any person beyond what He has given him After a difficulty Allah will soon grant relief

eng: How many populations that insolently opposed the Command of their Lord and of His messengers did We not then call to account- to severe account- and We imposed on them an exemplary Punishment

eng: When some of them said Why do ye preach to a people whom Allah will destroy or visit with a terrible punishment- said the preachers To discharge our duty to your Lord and perchance they may fear Him
nupe: To kamina jamaa ndocizhi miniabo gan Ebo kiibo ye cie jin jamaa nazhi Soko ajin hallaka na ko ma wyuna jin a azaba tsuntsunnu na waazio Acigan yie jin jin ebo ulau fe uzuri-u ya yi lo eba tsoci ye uma jinwo be wunciny agaa fe za nazhie sundan sokona

eng: When they disregarded the warnings that had been given them We rescued those who forbade Evil but We visited the wrong-doers with a grievous punishment because they were given to transgression
nupe: Kamina abea tanba laalo yan nazhi asanatu be yin na Yia za na zhie na-wun cie kan etun dede na gangwa Yicia zanazhia eti taacinazhi jin zwalunci na wan be azaba bibiciy ebo etun fasikanci nazhi afe lo na

eng: When in their insolence they transgressed all prohibitions We said to them Be ye apes despised and rejected
nupe: Gancin kamina abea gbotika ke yan na akana na lugwa na Yici ganagan ye tsoa zhe ebegizhi nazhi yi eyan gbi gba ci zhi na

eng: Behold! thy Lord did declare that He would send against them to the Day of Judgment those who would afflict them with grievous penalty Thy Lord is quick in retribution but He is also Oft-forgiving Most Merciful
nupe: To kamina Tsoci wyoe yami na akika wyuna tun zadedezhi fia har da efo Alkiyami nazhia fe ya azaba dedezhi fin na hakika Tsoci wyoe Etsu nae din ye be jin jin azabae na uyio hakika ma wyiny Soko Etsu gafara uyio Etsu yegun uyio

eng: We broke them up into sections on this earth There are among them some that are the righteous and some that are the opposite We have tried them with both prosperity and adversity In order that they might turn to us
nupe: Yicia sa fi kinbo aciafe jamaa kpere kperezhi miniabo ade zaguruzhi fibo mini abo ma ade nazhi jin za guru zhia na Yima maacinle be eyan wangi zhi to be eyan dedezhi ko be wuncin-y a zheban eti ekpya dao lo eba Soko

eng: After them succeeded an evil generation They inherited the Book but they chose for themselves the vanities of this world saying for excuse Everything will be forgiven us Even so if similar vanities came their way they would again seize them Was not the covenant of the Book taken from them that they would not ascribe to Allah anything but the truth and they study what is in the Book But best for the righteous is the home in the Hereafter Will ye not understand
nupe: Gancin za zun mazhi ci be gwo gwa zunma yan zanazhia shi dzo nao acia litafi gigun kpikpeu acie da gwo eyan zwizwoci yan izhe gbi gba ci na na kini giba yan bawu Soko acie gan gan bele yin afa be yi yin Eyan zwi zwoci ci izhe yan haramu ndoci ga be yaa be a tagwa gwo yana Asa a la alkawali yan litafi bea yin ke de aga gan gan ndondo eti alamari Sokoo maa sai de na ga yi gaskiya naa Alali ma atso ayan nazhi fi li ta fio na gba hakika ma Emi yan zoba batsozhi ude alheri gan izhe na na ya za na zhi gae tswa Soko acie sundanuna Ngba kashi ye de ankali dea

eng: As to those who hold fast by the Book and establish regular prayer- never shall We suffer the reward of the righteous to perish
nupe: Zanazhi mae la gwa sun litafi na aci kezhea sallah ku gikini na hakika Yi yie ta ega gba yan zaguruzhi ya kpea

eng: When We shook the Mount over them as if it had been a canopy and they thought it was going to fall on them We said Hold firmly to what We have given you and bring ever to remembrance what is therein perchance ye may fear Allah
nupe: To kamina Yi la pati tu ta etiabo na wyo cia ye gan ko girgije uyio aci fe kpaye ke de hakika ugaa kpankpea na aci gan agan yea egwa sun yan na Yi la ya ye na be kagboe ye mae fepa yan na zhi fi bo na ujin wo be wunciny ye ga fe za na zhie tswa Soko acie sun danuna

eng: When thy Lord drew forth from the Children of Adam - from their loins - their descendants and made them testify concerning themselves saying Am I not your Lord who cherishes and sustains you- They said Yea! We do testify! This lest ye should say on the Day of Judgment Of this we were never mindful
nupe: Wyo mao pa lokaci na Tsoci wyoe la alkawali be egi yan Adama zhi-na dagan mini dzo dzoa zhio zuriyaazhi dan bo ucia atso laafe eri jincizhi ta eti tacinatso zhio uci gan Asa ujin Migayi Tsoci ye yea Acigan Eba acinga gao yima eri jin aci gan Ebo Efo Alkiyamio ye be gan gan Akika yi yia ya ye ke alkawali na na lugwa ma

eng: Or lest ye should say Our fathers before us may have taken false gods but we are their descendants after them wilt Thou then destroy us because of the deeds of men who were futile
nupe: Ko ma ye be gan gan Akika de yanmanci yi zhi tsa la yan pa Soko baci caba batso zhibo yi maafe zuriyaazhi zunmaabo Kashi Ngba wyo ga yi jin hallaka ebo le fi nazhi eza egbin zhi gan ma na zuncizhi jin nae

eng: Thus do We explain the signs in detail and perchance they may turn unto Us
nupe: Acinga ga ma Yi yia jin yi kpe aya zhi yeo be bayani zhi yino ujinwo be wunciny zawangizhia zheban da tsun Soko be ekpyadae

eng: Relate to them the story of the man to whom We sent Our signs but he passed them by so Satan followed him up and he went astray
nupe: Wyo mao gba labario yaa yan za na yi la aya Yi zhi be ya na ucia miniu wa ya dagan minia bo na gan cin shetan ci fe gbauza ucia fe dan mini zanazhia jin hallaka nao

eng: If it had been Our will We should have elevated him with Our signs but he inclined to the earth and followed his own vain desires His similitude is that of a dog if you attack him he lolls out his tongue or if you leave him alone he still lolls out his tongue That is the similitude of those who reject Our signs So relate the story perchance they may reflect
nupe: Uma ga ba Yi ba da Yi gau laatu be aya wuncin zhi amma de wyun tso egba wa dan kin bo ucia emi tu etun yan gbanu koton ci yan za wuncin wunafe ke koton ci eshigi na wyo ga wau wun ufe ce gin tara ka wyo ma gau ya yanu wunafe ce gintara na na ga yi koton ci yan jamaa nazhia aya Soko zhi yi gan ma nao gba etan labari na na yaa ujin wo be wunciny aga fe za na zhiekpa ye na

eng: Evil as an example are people who reject Our signs and wrong their own souls
nupe: Bibi wunajin tabatta ya koton ci yan jamaa nazhia aya Yizhi yi ganmana na eti tacinatso tsa ma ejin zwaluncioSurah Whom Allah doth guide- he is on the right path whom He rejects from His guidance- such are the persons who perishZandondo na Soko gaa la ke eko na wyun ga ke eko za na ma ugau gbin na To zawun cin zhi ga yi eza hassara zhio

eng: Many are the Jinns and men we have made for Hell They have hearts wherewith they understand not eyes wherewith they see not and ears wherewith they hear not They are like cattle- nay more misguided for they are heedless of warning
nupe: Hakika ma yi jin alittazhi ebo jahannamao nazhi dokun na mini aljanizhio to zawan gi zhio ayi be yan gban zhi egan zhi mae yea ama yi be eye zhiamae laa le ba yea ama yi be tukpa zhi amae laa wo gana zawuncin zhi ke dabba zhi na ayio Eba hakika ake ke gbu gbu gan dabbazhi eba egbino zawun cinzhi ga yi eye ya ci zhio

eng: The most beautiful names belong to Allah so call on him by them but shun such men as use profanity in his names for what they do they will soon be requited
nupe: Soko ma yi be sunna wan gi zhi ebo acino efebau yan be a yin ye mae dzun gan zana zhie nyin sunna Soko zhi ya nao Be le yin agaagba be iri etun nazhie lo na

eng: Of those We have created are people who direct others with truth And dispense justice therewith
nupe: A ma de dan mini alitta nazhi Yi jin na jamaazhi ayio e-wu zazhi ba be gaskiyae be uyin ma gae jin adalincio

eng: Those who reject Our signs We shall gradually visit with punishment in ways they perceive not
nupe: Zanazhi ma aya Yi zhi yi gan mana na Yia dzua lo edzun ba ndoci yi cia dzun fia dagan ba na ade kpi kpe wuna na

eng: Respite will I grant unto them for My scheme is strong and unfailing
nupe: Mimae pata pa yaa hakika tangi tso yan Mi ugbo ka sarau yin

eng: Do they not reflect Their companion is not seized with madness he is but a perspicuous warner
nupe: Kashi akpa ye kpaa ngan batan yan iladzun udan be maso yia yina hakika ufea sai de gan gba jin ci naa tu la na

eng: Do they see nothing in the government of the heavens and the earth and all that Allah hath created Do they not see that it may well be that their terms is nigh drawing to an end In what message after this will they then believe
nupe: Kashi acin le lo eba mulki yan sanmazhi to kin yina to iri yandondo na Soko jin jin naa uma jin wo gan ajali azhie laa tso ba niTo egan ki ci baci wuncino ke na yea jin imani be yin nao

eng: To such as Allah rejects from His guidance there can be no guide He will leave them in their trespasses wandering in distraction
nupe: Zaeni ndondo na Soko gau gbin na ade zan dondo naa lau kr eko wo naa uci gaa ya gun egbinazhio eza zhi zhi ci zhi

eng: They ask thee about the final Hour - when will be its appointed time Say The knowledge thereof is with my Lord alone None but He can reveal as to when it will occur Heavy were its burden through the heavens and the earth Only all of a sudden will it come to you They ask thee as if thou Wert eager in search thereof Say The knowledge thereof is with Allah alone but most men know not
nupe: Egbin wyo gan eti eka yan ekin na kiyamao foci wunajin tabbattao Gan gan hakika de kpi kpeu dan be tso ci mi yin Zandondo danbo najin bayani lokaciu wo naa sai de wyun tso Alamariu wuna lukpin dan mini samazhio to kin bo Umaa be ya yea sai de eti girikuo Acia fe gbin wyo gan ke wyoa ye gan ko wyo de kpi kpeu de na Gan gan hakika de kpi kpeu dan be Sokoe amma de ekun don do zawangizhi ade kpikpe

eng: Say I have no power over any good or harm to myself except as Allah willeth If I had knowledge of the unseen I should have multiplied all good and no evil should have touched me I am but a warner and a bringer of glad tidings to those who have faith
nupe: Gan gan mi de mulki yan eti tacin mi yan eyan anfani ndocia mima da eyan gun ndoci gwa wo ya eti tacin mi yina sai de yanna ga ba Soko uc jin na Da aci gan mi de kpikpe gaybu de yan naa swo na da mia dokun be jin jin alheri ganani eyan egun ndondo maa tomi gwaa mi de fea sai de gan gba jin ci Mimae ya labari yan gban fa ya jamaa na zhi gae jin imani na

eng: It is He Who created you from a single person and made his mate of like nature in order that he might dwell with her in love When they are united she bears a light burden and carries it about unnoticed When she grows heavy they both pray to Allah their Lord saying If Thou givest us a goodly child we vow we shall ever be grateful
nupe: Wyun ga yi Etsu na jin alitta ye dagan rayi ninio na Ucia yiwo jin yau dagan minia tso ebo ude bau fa yangbanu dan miniubo Kamina ubea nakan laa kpe una wuna de wan ewan na yi finfanci na uci fe lo yegboro beu yin Gancin kamina nakan bea lukpin na acia ya Soko aduwa yn ba Etsu nayi Tsoci na Hakika wyo ga ya yi egi guru de ma hakika yi gaafe dan mini zanazhie jin yebo nao

eng: But when He giveth them a goodly child they ascribe to others a share in the gift they have received but Allah is exalted high above the partners they ascribe to Him
nupe: To kamina Soko bea eyan wangi laaya naa yandonci ko zandonci laapau baci dan mini yanna ula yaanao Soko maa latu ke yannazhie la pau baci na lugwa

eng: Do they indeed ascribe to Him as partners things that can create nothing but are themselves created
nupe: Kashiala yanna jin alitta yandondo woa na apau baci alalima ajin alitta yan atso jin

eng: No aid can they give them nor can they aid themselves!
nupe: Ama la eyan taimako ndondo yaa woa atso ma jin  ti ta acina taimako woa

eng: If ye call them to guidance they will not obey For you it is the same whether ye call them or ye hold your peace!
nupe: Ka yema ga yian lo eko bawu aa alamitu ye niuyi yaye yeo ko ye yia ko ma ye laefe zanazhia sunsun na!

eng: If ye call them to guidance they will not obey For you it is the same whether ye call them or ye hold your peace!
nupe: Ka yema ga yian lo eko bawu aa alamitu ye niuyi yaye yeo ko ye yia ko ma ye laefe zanazhia sunsun na!

eng: Verily those whom ye call upon besides Allah are servants like unto you Call upon them and let them listen to your prayer if ye are indeed truthful!
nupe: Hakika zanazhi ye da yi ye ke Soko lugwa na wuzhizhi ayio dozhin ye tso zhio to efe yia-ye gancin ma ala ye yea gwo mi ala aduwa yezhia gwo wunayi za gaskiyazhi ye yio na

eng: Have they feet to walk with Or hands to lay hold with Or eyes to see with Or ears to hear with Say Call your ´god-partners´ scheme your worst against me and give me no respite!
nupe: Kashi ade bici ezando yan gwaatso de nae laa dazan na Kashi ade egwa yangwaatso de nae laa wan yan na Kashi ade eyezhi de yangwaatso nae la lebaye na Kashi ade tukpazhi de yan gwatsozhi nae laa wangan Eyi yannazhi ye laa pa Soko baci na beyn gancin ye cie tso tangi yan tanadi dede ye ya Mi ye mae ga shi tukpa ndondo ya Mima

eng: For my Protector is Allah Who revealed the Book from time to time and He will choose and befriend the righteous
nupe: Hakika Soko ga yi Ndakata mi yano Etsu nacin litafi be na Wyun ga mayi Etsu nae gwogwa ya za guruzhi nao

eng: But those ye call upon besides Him are unable to help you and indeed to help themselves
nupe: Za nazhi ma ye da yi ye ke Soko lugwa na ajin ye taimako ndondo woa ama jin eti taso taimako woa

eng: If thou callest them to guidance they hear not Thou wilt see them looking at thee but they see not
nupe: Ka ye ma ga yia lo eko bawu awoa Wyo ma alea ye afe cin wyo le amaa le yando yea

eng: Hold to forgiveness command what is right But turn away from the ignorant
nupe: Agwa sun yan na ga fan gan na fe fa be zazhi wyo mao feo jin foro be tun alheri wyo mao la etio panoke bojin yan jahilizhio lugwa

eng: If a suggestion from Satan assail thy mind seek refuge with Allah for He heareth and knoweth all things
nupe: Ko ma kandondo na wyo gae wo fifela ko ma sharya fu  yan shetan cie wagan wyuna fe wyo la na dada wa tswitswa be Sokoe hakika Soko Etsu nae wo na uyio Etsu na ma kpikpe na Uyio

eng: Those who fear Allah when a thought of evil from Satan assaults them bring Allah to remembrance when lo! they see aright!
nupe: Hakika za nazhi gae tswa Soko acie sundanu na kandondo na yekpa dede ndoci yan shetan ga be yaa na ajin a pa Soko gancin aci gaafe eza basirazhi eza hankalizhi

eng: But their brethren the evil ones plunge them deeper into error and never relax their efforts
nupe: Za nazhi mae sundan Sokoa na yegiazhi mini shetanzhio ajin afe jina taimako dan mini egbino amae cin faa

eng: If thou bring them not a revelation they say Why hast thou not got it together Say I but follow what is revealed to me from my Lord this is nothing but lights from your Lord and Guidance and mercy for any who have faith
nupe: Kagan ma wyo la aya ndoci be yaa agan Ki la wyo tso ci tswa yan gwa wyoa yano GanganHakika de mie la mi latu wahayi naga be yami dagan eba Tsoci mi bo na Nanaegan hankalizhia ayio dagan eba Tsoci yebo umayi bawu be ye guny ya jamaa nazhi gae jin imani na

eng: When the Qur´an is read listen to it with attention and hold your peace that ye may receive Mercy
nupe: Kandondo na ma agae gba katun Alkuranu na efe shi tukpa yan ye mae sunsun ujin wo be wunciny ye gade yegun

eng: And do thou O reader! Bring thy Lord to remembrance in thy very soul with humility and in reverence without loudness in words in the mornings and evenings and be not thou of those who are unheedful
nupe: Wyo mao feo tun Tsoci wyo yao ye dan mini yangban wyo bo be ekpedae to be dansuny zunmanci yan egan la tuo to lazhin to lozun wyo mao gaafe dan mini eye yaci zhio ma

eng: Those who are near to thy Lord disdain not to do Him worship They celebrate His praises and prostrate before Him
nupe: Hakika ma zanazhi dan eba Tsoci wyo bo na e gbo tika ke jin jin bauta Soko lugwaa amaajin afe liu be ekundo yan Tasbihuy Wyun ga ajin ajin sujada yao

eng: A questioner asked about a Penalty to befall-
nupe: Egan gbinci gbin gan eti azaba nan Soko jin kafiri zhi alkawali nanSurah  The Unbelievers the which there is none to ward off-Azaba na-nan nan Sokoa jin kafirizhi nan alitta ndondo danbo nan dau gwa ya wo naa

eng: A Penalty from Allah Lord of the Ways of Ascent
nupe: Azaba na-nan dagan eba Soko bou fe beo Nan gbanu be etanu yin ma gan dozhi

eng: The angels and the spirit ascend unto him in a Day the measure whereof is as fifty thousand years
nupe: Malaikazhi to malaika jibreeluajin a fe gun lo fiti Eba Soko ezana yan foe ni uyi dai dai be ezan eya kpuutsun danna da araa tae yan eya izhe nan nan eya kpa arata

eng: Therefore do thou hold Patience- a Patience of beautiful contentment
nupe: Annabi a hakuri jin hakuri nan yi wangi nan

eng: They see the Day indeed as a far-off event
nupe: Akika kafirizhi ajin a fe le azaba Soko ye ke yan nan a kpe ya bea yin nan

eng: But We see it quite near
nupe: Yi Soko mane leu ye yan na atsoba sarauyin nan

eng: The Day that the sky will be like molten brass
nupe: Efoe be dano nan nan sama gaafe ke azarfa ko emi nana zun nanSurah And the mountains will be like woolPati to takun zhi kpata ci ga fe ke eyin nan

eng: And no friend will ask after a friend
nupe: Efo wuncin a de masoyi naa gbin gan ba nan masoyiu dan naa

eng: Though they will be put in sight of each other- the sinner´s desire will be Would that he could redeem himself from the Penalty of that Day by sacrificing his children
nupe: Masoyi zhi a fe le dozhi ye egi a le ndau ye Nnan ma a le egiu ye Amaa lefi jin ci ndondo a fe wa sisa dagan azaba Soko ka wuna yi be egiu zhi yino

eng: His wife and his brother
nupe: Wuna fe wa sisa ka wuna yi be yinminu yino to be ye giu zhi

eng: His kindred who sheltered him
nupe: To dangiu zhi nan zhii wune bokeba bea yin nan

eng: And all all that is on earth- so it could deliver him
nupe: To alitta nanzhi kpe kinbo nan wuna wa gan a laa fe sisaa ya wyin dagan azaba Soko

eng: By no means! for it would be the Fire of Hell!-
nupe: U jin acina Akika enan yan Lazwa nane ke be kagboe nan gaa yi emi wuno

eng: Plucking out his being right to the skull!-
nupe: Enan yan Lazwa nane kpan epa yan eti zawangi ya nan

eng: Inviting all such as turn their backs and turn away their faces from the Right
nupe: Wuna jin u fe kpo gun yi za nana zunma zheta Soko nan Ucia jin kafirinci be bawu Sokoe nan

eng: Inviting all such as turn their backs and turn away their faces from the Right
nupe: Wuna jin u fe kpo gun yi za nana zunma zheta Soko nan Ucia jin kafirinci be bawu Sokoe nan

eng: And collect wealth and hide it from use!
nupe: Wuna fe kpo gun yi za nana dukiya kuyekan ciu swo har wune wa hakki Sokoa nan

eng: ruly man was created very impatient-
nupe: Akika Sokoa halitta zawangi jin wuna fe za nan de kwadari sarauyin nan

eng: Fretful when evil touches him
nupe: Mi man cinle ndoci yan yangban yin ga deu wune jin hakuria

eng: And niggardly when good reaches him-
nupe: Ba-- yan alhairi ma ga da be yau wuna zhiu yan-bo tanci

eng: Not so those devoted to Prayer-
nupe: Sai dai za nan zhie jin sallah nanezhe wuna a mae tanyan boa

eng: Those who remain steadfast to their prayer
nupe: Za nanzhi yangbanazhi a shi dan jin jin sallao kandondo nan

eng: And those in whose wealth is a recognised right
nupe: To za nanzhie la hakki yan Soko nan dan dukiyaa zhio nan wa nanke zakka be sadakae nan

eng: For the needy who asks and him who is prevented for some reason from asking
nupe: E laa wa ya talaka nane bayan za nan be talaka nan dea u ma yangban wu wune bayana nan

eng: And those who hold to the truth of the Day of Judgment
nupe: To za nanzhi a gaskiya ya be efo egagbae nan Efo nan addini gbaugi gaa gan za gwao nan

eng: And those who fear the displeasure of their Lord-
nupe: To za nanzhi a jin a fe sundan azaba Tsocia nan

eng: For their Lord´s displeasure is the opposite of Peace and Tranquillity-
nupe: Akika Azaba yan Soko u jin yan nan ezaa ya aminci be yin naa

eng: And those who guard their chastity
nupe: To za nanzhie la kangi dan itaa zhi ke zina lugwa nan

eng: And those who guard their chastity
nupe: To za nanzhie la kangi dan itaa zhi ke zina lugwa nan

eng: Except with their wives and the captives whom their right hands possess- for then they are not to be blamed
nupe: Sai dai ganni be yinmiazhi ko wuzhi inzagizhi nan a ga de eti ekun addini Musuluncio nan akika leifi u dan mini ema nan yea wo bea yin nana

eng: But those who trespass beyond this are transgressors-
nupe: Zaeni ndondo nan ga -- iyaka nna zhii gan nan akika za wuncin zhi gae gbin iyaka Soko tu o

eng: And those who respect their trusts and covenants
nupe: To za nanzhie tswa Amana zhi ganni be alkawalii nan

eng: And those who stand firm in their testimonies
nupe: To za anazhi a kpe gikini eti eri jin be gaskiyae nan

eng: And those who guard the sacredness of their worship-
nupe: To za nanzhie tswa lokaci to hakki yan Sallah nan

eng: Such will be the honoured ones in the Gardens of Bliss
nupe: Kpata za wuncin zhi za cin wanci zhi ayio fi mini aljannaazhio

eng: Now what is the matter with the Unbelievers that they rush madly before thee-
nupe: Ke jin kafiri zhi cia jin a fe jin dalodazhin zhi yegboro wyo bo

eng: From the right and from the left in crowds
nupe: Acia jin a gunye kan ekpo ekpo to gwalo to gwapin

eng: Does every man of them long to enter the Garden of Bliss
nupe: Kashi zaeni ndondo miniabo e wa wa gan a la wuna la ganadan aljannao U ma yi be etun guru ndondo yina

eng: By no means! For We have created them out of the base matter they know!
nupe: Wuna ye jin acina Akika ye zawangizhi yetso kpe yan nan Mi Soko a jin alitta ye nan Ebo acino alfahri ndoci u dan bo nan yea jin fi Soko naa

eng: Now I do call to witness the Lord of all points in the East and the West that We can certainly-
nupe: Mi Soko e zhi kuti be Etsu nan wun mulki ta eti eyi laa zhin to lozunI nan Yi gboka eti jin jin yandondo

eng: Substitute for them better men than they And We are not to be defeated in Our Plan
nupe: Na Yigaa sangwa Yi cii la halitta woro zhii jin nanzhi de alhairi gana nan Akika alitta ndondo gan Yi gwa woa

eng: So leave them to plunge in vain talk and play about until they encounter that Day of theirs which they have been promised!-
nupe: Ebo acino Annabi a ya a fea le izhe ganmanana za a maa fea dzo-dzoa za har da fo nan a be gun be efo nan Sokoa shi-shi eti alkawalio nan

eng: The Day whereon they will issue from their sepulchres in sudden haste as if they were rushing to a goal-post fixed for them-
nupe: Efo nan a fe dzun tinya da gan kabaria zhio nan acia fe sannin ke za nan zhie lo kuti wun zhi ko eba san zhinan

eng: Their eyes lowered in dejection- ignominy covering them all over! such is the Day the which they are promised!
nupe: Fo wuncin Fuskaazhi ga gba gba egba to zunyesun gaa rukpea Akika efo wuncin ga yi efo nan Soko a jin alitta zhi kpata alkawali nano

eng: We sent Noah to his People with the Command Do thou warn thy People before there comes to them a grievous Penalty
nupe: Akika Yia Annabi Nuhu tun fi za kin yinuzhi kinnane yi gan Kufa nan Yi ci ganu gan da-da jin za bao zhi gangba a kea gan be lemba Sokoe tun nan azaba nan tan sarauyin nan la tun etia nan

eng: He said O my People! I am to you a Warner clear and open
nupe: Ucia gan gan Ya ye zaba mizhi! Akika gangba jinci mi yi be eba ye yeo U ma yi gangba eti alamari nan tula nan

Saying ´Ask forgiveness from your Lord for He is Oft-ForgivingMi ma gan yagan e ba gafara be Tsocie yin akika Soko Etsu gafara uyio
