eng: Remember how the Unbelievers plotted against thee to keep thee in bonds or slay thee or get thee out of thy home They plot and plan and Allah too plans but the best of planners is Allah
nupe: Wyo mao pa lokaci na zanazhia jin kafirinci na fe pa makirinci eti wyobo na ebo ala wyoa kanadan koma ala wyo yaa wu koma ala wyo yaa nyan adzun ezhio na Acie dinyin fe jin makirinci Soko otso mae woa gbata be makirincia yin Soko ma ta eti zanazhie jin makirinci kpata na

eng: When Our Signs are rehearsed to them they say We have heard this before if we wished we could say words like these these are nothing but tales of the ancientsAma ga gba aya Yizhi yaa ajin agangan
nupe: Hakika yiwo nana leani uga bayi tso da yitso agan iri nana ma nana deufea saide ecin yan zamafarizhi

eng: Remember how they said O Allah if this is indeed the Truth from Thee rain down on us a shower of stones form the sky or send us a grievous penalty
nupe: To kamina agan gan ya wyoe Soko! Wunayi gan alamari nana wyun gayi gaskiya na fe be dagan eba wyobo nao to dule yan takun azaba be kpeyi dagan sanmao koma wyoobeo yayi be azaba ndoci na tan na

eng: But Allah was not going to send them a penalty whilst thou wast amongst them nor was He going to send it whilst they could ask for pardon
nupe: Soko mafe Etsu na ajina azaba naa alalima wyo yidan taacinabo naa Soko mafe Etsu naajina azaba naa alalima afe zanazhie ba gafara naa

eng: But what plea have they that Allah should not punish them when they keep out men from the sacred Mosque - and they are not its guardians No men can be its guardians except the righteous but most of them do not understand
nupe: Kima dan bea yino naala Soko cia jinazaba naa yino alaalima ekan zawangizhi ke masalaci Harami lugwa nao Uma jin atsawun hak yan tswi tswa wuna Hakika zanazhi wun hakika yan tswi tswauna aga yi zanazhi gae tswa Soko acie sundanUnao Ammade ekun dondo azhi ade kpikpea

eng: Their prayer at the House of Allah is nothing but whistling and clapping of hands Its only answer can be Taste ye the penalty because ye blasphemed
nupe: Sallaazhi ma eba kata kaabao ufea sai de iko-be be egwa-koe eboacino efe fin azaba ebo iri etun kafirinci nazhi ye fe lo na

eng: The Unbelievers spend their wealth to hinder man from the path of Allah and so will they continue to spend but in the end they will have only regrets and sighs at length they will be overcome and the Unbelievers will be gathered together to Hell-
nupe: Hakika zanazhia jin kafirinci be Sokoe na ajin afe wu dukiya azhi ebo adebaakan zawangi zhi ezan ta eti ekpa Soko to aga dukiyazhi wugagancin uci gaafe ro-- n kpe yaa gancin be acigaa zankpe zanazhi maajin kafirinci na a kuaku yekan lo ena jahanama

eng: In order that Allah may separate the impure from the pure put the impure one on another heap them together and cast them into Hell They will be the ones to have lost
nupe: Ebo Soko debau la eyan dedezhiu tsau ya dagan mini eyan wangi zhio Uciu la eyan dedezhiu kuukpe eti sashio uci gau laafe dan mini ena jahanamao Zawun ci zhi aga yi eza hassarazhio

eng: Say to the Unbelievers if now they desist from Unbelief their past would be forgiven them but if they persist the punishment of those before them is already a matter of warning for them
nupe: Gan ya zanazhia jin kafirinci na aga gwa kpe eti yan na Sokoa kan na aafa beayin yan yannazhi ajin shidzo na hakika ekpa hallaka yan za mafari zhi wuna shidzoa ni

eng: And fight them on until there is no more tumult or oppression and there prevail justice and faith in Allah altogether and everywhere but if they cease verily Allah doth see all that they do
nupe: Ye mae gunakun har fitina ndondo uga ke ma gancin adini jin baenio ulauzhe ebo Soko ya Soko gbuugi To aga bea egwa kpebo to hakika Sokoe cinale be iri etun nazhi elo na

eng: If they refuse be sure that Allah is your Protector - the best to protect and the best to help
nupe: Ama ga zunma zheta to ye kpe wo danona kede hakika Soko gayi Ndakata ye yeona Madanla be Etsu na yi Ndakatana Madanla be Etsu taimakoe

eng: And know that out of all the booty that ye may acquire in war a fifth share is assigned to Allah- and to the Messenger and to near relatives orphans the needy and the wayfarer- if ye do believe in Allah and in the revelation We sent down to Our servant on the Day of Testing- the Day of the meeting of the two forces For Allah hath power over all things
nupe: Ye mae kpe wo kede yan dondo na ye gade yan ganima na to Soko ga wun nini yan gutsun wuno to yan Tuci to eza tsonbazhi to ekungizhi to eza gwa gbagizhi ye gaafe gan yea imani jin be Sokoe be yanna yi cin be ya wuzhi Yi MUHAMMADUefo ekun-erikpe na efo na jamaa guba da gun dozhi na Soko ma Etsu iko uyio ta eti yandondo

eng: Remember ye were on the hither side of the valley and they on the farther side and the caravan on lower ground than ye Even if ye had made a mutual appointment to meet ye would certainly have failed in the appointment But thus ye met that Allah might accomplish a matter already enacted that those who died might die after a clear Sign had been given and those who lived might live after a Clear Sign had been given And verily Allah is He Who heareth and knoweth all things
nupe: Ye mae pa kamina yedan kansanta natso tsoba na ama dan kansata natsoa kpe ya na gancin kodagbaazhi ma afe kpankpanyin be eba ye aci dan tako yebo Kada ye ga jin dozhi alkawali jin eti ezan aningao da yega ce leba dozhi eba lokaci alkawalio Ammaa Sokou laafe aninga ebo ula hukunciu ba eti alamari ndoci na wyune wa gan ulaaufe na Ebo ma zana gajin hallaka na unjin hallaka eti bayanio Umaula zanaUgaa dan rayi naU dan rayi be dalili Hakika ma Soko Etsu nae wo yandondo na uyio Etsu kpikpe uyio

eng: Remember in thy dream Allah showed them to thee as few if He had shown them to thee as many ye would surely have been discouraged and ye would surely have disputed in your decision but Allah saved you for He knoweth well the secrets of all hearts
nupe: Wyo mao pa kamina Soko fe laa wu wye dan mini eleo ke jamaa degi ayio na daaci gan ulaa lawu wye kendoe adokun na da ye gaa wo dansun ye gaa to gbogun ye maafe gbomi be dozhi eti alamari wuncino ammaade Sokoa egwa kan Hakika wyin Soko Uyi be kpikpe yan yannazhi fi yangban zawangizhio na

eng: And remember when ye met He showed them to you as few in your eyes and He made you appear as contemptible in their eyes that Allah might accomplish a matter already enacted For to Allah do all questions go back for decision
nupe: Epa kamina ufe laa wu ye na kamina ye bea gun be dozhi na eye yebo afe eza de gi umaa yetso lafe eza degi dan eyeabo ebo Sokoula hukunciuba eti alamari ndoci na ga fe na Alamari kpata ma eba Soko ga a kezhe loo

eng: O ye who believe! When ye meet a force be firm and call Allah in remembrance much and often that ye may prosper
nupe: Ya ye nazhia imani jin na! ye ga bea gun gun be jama ndocizhi eti ekuno to yea kpe gikini Ye mae fe tun Sokoe ye sarauyin ujin wo be wuncin yega tso guri

eng: And obey Allah and His Messenger and fall into no disputes lest ye lose heart and your power depart and be patient and persevering For Allah is with those who patiently persevere
nupe: Ye mae la mie tu Soko be Tuciu yin ye mae ga gbomi yan cen leba be dozhi ma kacina ye ga to gbogun gancin kagboe ma gaa gan be yin ye mae la hakurie jin Hakika Soko ajin udan be zanazhi gae jin hakuri nae

eng: And be not like those who started from their homes insolently and to be seen of men and to hinder men from the path of Allah For Allah compasseth round about all that they do
nupe: Ye mae gaafe ke dozhin zanazhi tinya eti fahri jino be ebo zawangizhia leaye na ma acie kan zawangizhi ezanda ta eti ekpa Soko Soko maa etun nazhie lo kpatana makezhe

eng: Remember Satan made their sinful acts seem alluring to them and said No one among men can overcome you this day while I am near to you But when the two forces came in sight of each other he turned on his heels and said Lo! I am clear of you lo! I see what ye see not Lo! I fear Allah for Allah is strict in punishment
nupe: To kamina shaitan yina etun dedeazhi laa pa nin fia na Uci gan zandondo danbo mini zawangizhio naa zan yekpe na mi ma dan be ye yin kpan-yin Gancin kamina jamaa guba ba bea gunbe dozhi na shaitan cidauda zunma Uci gan Hakika mia egwa mi wa be ye yin! mi mae le yannazhi ye le yea na ye mi mae sundan Soko Soko ma Etsu uyio na gbota azaba jinona

eng: Lo! the hypocrites say and those in whose hearts is a disease These people- their religion has misled them But if any trust in Allah behold! Allah is Exalted in might Wise
nupe: To lokaci na munafukzhi to zanazhi batan dan yangbanabo na fe gangan gan  Adini yan za nanazhi wuna ta fi egbino zaeni ndondo na gaa yakpe Soko na to hakika Soko Etsu zankpe uyio Etsu hikima uyio

eng: If thou couldst see when the angels take the souls of the Unbelievers at death How they smite their faces and their backs saying Taste the penalty of the blazing Fire-
nupe: Be ma da aci gan wyo le ye lokaci na malaikazhi gae gwo rayi yan za nazhi ajin kafirinci na malaikazhie ciafe wua fuskaazhio to zunmaazhioacia fe ganagan E fe fin azaba yan ena kikeci

eng: Because of the deeds which your own hands sent forth for Allah is never unjust to His servants
nupe: Wuncin mayi ebo iri etun dede na egwa yetsozhi lashidzo yenao hakika ma Soko ujin Etsu azwalumi lo eba wuzhi ndondoa

eng: Deeds after the manner of the people of Pharaoh and of those before them They rejected the Signs of Allah and Allah punished them for their crimes for Allah is Strong and Strict in punishment
nupe: Kendoe alada yan jamaa yan firauna be zanazhi shiadzo na ajin kafirinci be aya Soko zhi Soko cia wan be lefiazhi hakika Soko Etsu kagbo uyio Etsu na ma gbota eba azaba jino na uyio

eng: Because Allah will never change the grace which He hath bestowed on a people until they change what is in their own souls and verily Allah is He Who heareth and knoweth all things
nupe: Wuncin ma afe ebona hakika Soko ufe Etsu naela egbazhe de de dan mini niima na uga la ya jamaa ndoci eti Emano naa sai de atso ga egbazhe de de laadan yangbanazhio Hakika Soko ma Etsu kpikpe uyio

eng: Deeds after the manner of the people of Pharaoh and those before them They treated as false the Signs of their Lord so We destroyed them for their crimes and We drowned the people of Pharaoh for they were all oppressors and wrong-doers
nupe: Kenadoe alada yan jamaa yan firaunazhi yi na to zanazhi shia dzo na to Yi cia jin hallaka be zunubia zhi yi cia jamaa yan firauna zhi gbin fi nuwan eduo kpataama afe azwalumizhi

eng: For the worst of beasts in the sight of Allah are those who reject Him They will not believe
nupe: Hakika dabba na biye uma wuye gan mini dabbazhio na eba Sokoona aga yi zanazhi-ajin kafirinci aci ye gan ajin imanianao

eng: They are those with whom thou didst make a covenant but they break their covenant every time and they have not the fear of Allah
nupe: Zanazhi wyo pa alkawali be yin miniabo na gancin acia jin afe lo alkawali ya kandondo na amaafe za nazhie tswa Sokoa amae sundan wyuna na

nupe: To wyo ga bea tswo gwa mini ekuno aala fe misali ya zazumaaazhi ebo alaabici ujin wo be wunciny uga afe sin san tu yaa

eng: If thou fearest treachery from any group throw back their covenant to them so as to be on equal terms for Allah loveth not the treacherous
nupe: Wyo ma gae be sundan yan TITA hainci dagan gwata jamaa ndoci zhio to a alkawalia ceya yaa kendoe atso jin na hakika Sokoe wa zanazhi gae jin hainci naa

eng: Let not the unbelievers think that they can get the better of the godly they will never frustrate them
nupe: Zanazhi maajin kafirnci na aga fe kpa ye gan ayea gan gwa ma hakika a gangwaa

eng: Against them make ready your strength to the utmost of your power including steeds of war to strike terror into the hearts of the enemies of Allah and your enemies and others besides whom ye may not know but whom Allah doth know Whatever ye shall spend in the cause of Allah shall be repaid unto you and ye shall not be treated unjustly
nupe: Ye mae dan shiri boe kaa be gwargwado yan yanna ye ga de kagbou yan kagbo na to doko yan ekun zhina ebo ye lae li makiyi Soko zhi dan to makiyi ye tso zhi to ndoci zhi nazhi jin ayeana ye kpea yea Soko de kpea ye yan dondo na ma ye ga wu fi eko Soko-ona Soko gaa egagba alheri shekpan ya ye ye maade zanaajin ye zwalunci naa

eng: But if the enemy incline towards peace do thou also incline towards peace and trust in Allah for He is One that heareth and knoweth all things
nupe: Ama gaya kasan lo wi wa yan edun fe lafiya be ye yin to wyotso-oya kasanolo wuncin wyomao lao yao kpe Soko Hakika wyun ga yi Etsu na ma yi be kpi kpe yandondo nao Etsu na ma yi be kpikpe yandondoe na

eng: Should they intend to deceive thee- verily Allah sufficeth thee He it is That hath strengthened thee with His aid and with the company of the Believers
nupe: Ama gaakpa gan ata wyoe to hakika Soko tsakun ke ya wyo-yao wyun ga yi Etsu na gbo wyo ka be taimakou yin nao to be muminizhi nao

eng: And moreover He hath put affection between their hearts not if thou hadst spent all that is in the earth couldst thou have produced that affection but Allah hath done it for He is Exalted in might Wise
nupe: Ucia cin cin laadan tsakani yangbanazhio be dozhi kada wyo ga yannazhifi kin bo kpatana wu yaa wyo la cincin dan tsakani yangba yangbanazhio woa ammaade Sokoa cincin laadan tsakaniabo Hakika Soko Etsu kpikpe uyio Etsu hikima ma uyio

eng: O Prophet! sufficient unto thee is Allah- unto thee and unto those who follow thee among the Believers
nupe: Ya wyoe Annabi! Sokoa kunke ya wyo yaani to zanazhi ga mi tu wyoe mini muminizhio na

eng: O Prophet! rouse the Believers to the fight If there are twenty amongst you patient and persevering they will vanquish two hundred if a hundred they will vanquish a thousand of the Unbelievers for these are a people without understanding
nupe: Ya wyoe Annabi! A evunba yan ekun laalo dan yangban yan muminizhio a ga de eza shi mini yebo nazhia hankuri jin na agaade zankpe galaba ta eti eza kpakoa ama ga de eza shitsun mini yebo agaa de zankpe ta eti za kpuu tsuno mini zanazhia jin kafirinci nao ebo na aezazhia ayio na egane ye ana

eng: O Prophet! rouse the Believers to the fight If there are twenty amongst you patient and persevering they will vanquish two hundred if a hundred they will vanquish a thousand of the Unbelievers for these are a people without understanding
nupe: Ya wyoe Annabi! A evunba yan ekun laalo dan yangban yan muminizhio a ga de eza shi mini yebo nazhia hankuri jin na agaade zankpe galaba ta eti eza kpakoa ama ga de eza shitsun mini yebo agaa de zankpe ta eti za kpuu tsuno mini zanazhia jin kafirinci nao ebo na aezazhia ayio na egane ye ana

eng: For the present Allah hath lightened your task for He knoweth that there is a weak spot in you But even so if there are a hundred of you patient and persevering they will vanquish two hundred and if a thousand they will vanquish two thousand with the leave of Allah for Allah is with those who patiently persevere
nupe: Gbani Sokoa sauki jin ya ye uma kpe-wo ke gbogun to wuna lo ye na Eboacino aga de eza shitsun na de hankurina dan mini ye bo agadegalaba zankpe ta eti za kpako ama ga de za kpuutsun mini ye bo agaade zankpeta eti za kpuutsun gubae be izini Sokoe Soko mae dan be zanazhi gae jin hankuri nae

eng: It is not fitting for a prophet that he should have prisoners of war until he hath thoroughly subdued the land Ye look for the temporal goods of this world but Allah looketh to the Hereafter And Allah is Exalted in might Wise
nupe: Ugwoyin ya Annabi ndondo na wyunade wuzhi zhi yan ekun naa sai de uga gun kun ucia de zankpe ta eti kinbo Ye ye kpa dide yan eyan zwoci yan izhe zhi Soko ma Etsu zan kpe uyio Etsu hikima ma uyio

eng: Had it not been for a previous ordainment from Allah a severe penalty would have reached you for the ransom that ye took
nupe: Kagan ujin ebo hukunci Sokonaashidzo dan litafio naa daa azaba na gbota na gae de ebo yannazhi yegwo eti sisaabo na

eng: But now enjoy what ye took in war lawful and good but fear Allah for Allah is Oft-forgiving Most Merciful
nupe: Eboacino egi mini ganima nazhi yega de ekun dao uci yi halali umayi wangi na Ye mae tswa Soko be edansun uyin hakika Soko Etsu gafara uyio Etsu ye gun uyio

eng: But now enjoy what ye took in war lawful and good but fear Allah for Allah is Oft-forgiving Most Merciful
nupe: Eboacino egi mini ganima nazhi yega de ekun dao uci yi halali umayi wangi na Ye mae tswa Soko be edansun uyin hakika Soko Etsu gafara uyio Etsu ye gun uyio

eng: O Prophet! say to those who are captives in your hands If Allah findeth any good in your hearts He will give you something better than what has been taken from you and He will forgive you for Allah is Oft-forgiving Most MercifulYa wyoe Annabi! Gan ya za nazhi fi gwa ye bo ama yi za win wan ci zhi na Soko ga tsun alheri fi mini yangban ye zhio wyuna yae alheri natso gan yanna agwo be ye yin nae umaajine gafara Soko ma Etsu ye gun uyio

But if they have treacherous designs against thee O Messenger! they have already been in treason against Allah and so hath He given thee power over them And Allah so He Who hath full knowledge and wisdom
nupe: Ama gae kpa gan ajin wyoe haainci hakika ajin to Sokootso hainci leani Soko cia wyo ya kagbo ta eti abo Soko ma Etsu kpikpe uyio Etsu hikima uyio

eng: Those who believed and adopted exile and fought for the Faith with their property and their persons in the cause of Allah as well as those who gave them asylum and aid- these are all friends and protectors one of another As to those who believed but came not into exile ye owe no duty of protection to them until they come into exile but if they seek your aid in religion it is your duty to help them except against a people with whom ye have a treaty of mutual alliance And remember Allah seeth all that ye do
nupe: Hakika zanazhia imani jin na aci kezhea kpe la ke eyan de de lugwa na aci jin jiadi kokari be dukiyaazhi to zanazhi twarya yan ecinbazhi na aci ke zhe jin taimako na za wuncin zhi maso yi zhi ayio ya dozhi Zanazhi maa imani jin na ama kpe laa na ye de yandoci naabo ye keba be dozhi naa sai kamina agaa kpela na Ama ga wa taimako be ye yin mini adinio ejina taimako sai de ugaazhe eti zandoci nazhi alkawali ndoci dan tsakani yebo bea yin na Soko mae cin ye cin le be iri etun nazhi ye lo na

eng: The Unbelievers are protectors one of another Unless ye do this protect each other there would be tumult and oppression on earth and great mischief
nupe: Zanazhi maajin kafirinci na sashiazhi masoyi saashizhi ayio kagan ye jin acina yeci wa dozhia fitina ndoci gaajin tabatta dan kinbo gan-ni be eyan nyin na wancin nae

eng: Those who believe and adopt exile and fight for the Faith in the cause of Allah as well as those who give them asylum and aid- these are all in very truth the Believers for them is the forgiveness of sins and a provision most generous
nupe: Zanazhi maa imani jin na acia kpela na aci jin jihadi kokari ta eti ekpa Soko ona to zanazhi twarya ecinbazhi ya muhajiruzhi na ama kezhe jin taimako na to za wuncinzhi gayi mumini yan gaskiya zhio gafara gajin tabbata yaa to arziki na wancin na

eng: And those who accept Faith subsequently and adopt exile and fight for the Faith in your company- they are of you But kindred by blood have prior rights against each other in the Book of Allah Verily Allah is well-acquainted with all things
nupe: Zanazhi ma ga imani jin dagan zumao na acia kpe la aci kezhe jin jihadi kokari keba be yeyin na to za wuncinzhi gayi zaba yezhio Dangizhi-ma sashizhi tsoba dozhi gan sashi dan mini litafi Soko Hakika Soko ma Etsu kpikpe uyio yan yandondo

eng: The Prophet frowned and turned away

eng: Because there came to him the blind man interrupting
nupe: Ebona Yebonci dade-ebaunan

eng: But what could tell thee but that perchance he might grow in spiritual understanding-

nupe: Egwa-wa danna dagan eba Soko to Tuciu lo eba zanazhi ye jin alkawali beyin mini zanazhie la yan pa Soko baci nao

nupe: Ebo acino efe dazan kpe eti kinbo har etswa gunni kafa uyio na Soko ya kafirizhi na ye mae kpe-ewo kede ye yegan Soko gwa woa na hakika ma Soko ga kafirizhi sunzunye

eng: f the Great Pilgrimage- that Allah and His Messenger dissolve treaty obligations with the Pagans If then ye repent it were best for you but if ye turn away know ye that ye cannot frustrate Allah And proclaim a grievous penalty to those who reject Faith
nupe: Emi-ya ma danna dagan eba Soko to Tuciuyin lo eba zawangizhi efo haji wanciko kede hakika Soko to Tuciu agwaa wa be zanazhie la yan pa Soko baci nae Ebo acino ye ga tuba jin to wuncinafe alheri yae gan ye ma ga zunma zheta to yekpe-ewo kede hakika ye gan Soko gwaa na wyo mao ya zanazhia jin kafirinci na labari yan azaba na yi tintanci na

eng: But the treaties are not dissolved with those Pagans with whom ye have entered into alliance and who have not subsequently failed you in aught nor aided any one against you So fulfil your engagements with them to the end of their term for Allah loveth the righteous

eng: But when the forbidden months are past then fight and slay the Pagans wherever ye find them an seize them beleaguer them and lie in wait for them in every stratagem of war but if they repent and establish regular prayers and practise regular charity then open the way for them for Allah is Oft-forgiving Most Merciful
nupe: Gancin-ma etswa yan alfurma zhi gaa gwo gan to egun mushirikizhi kun bandondo na ye ga tswoa gwa-na ye mae laae wan ye mae laae kanedan ye mae tsoe kaa ecinba ndondo Gancin aga bea tuba jin acia sallah ku gikini acia zakka dukiyaazhi wa to yea ekoa ya yaa Hakika Soko Etsu gafara uyio Etsu yegun ma uyio

eng: If one amongst the Pagans ask thee for asylum grant it to him so that he may hear the word of Allah and then escort him to where he can be secure That is because they are men without knowledge

eng: The Signs of Allah have they sold for a miserable price and many have they hindered from His way evil indeed are the deeds they have done

But even so if they repent establish regular prayers and practise regular charity- they are your brethren in Faith thus do We explain the Signs in detail for those who understand

eng: Will ye not fight people who violated their oaths plotted to expel the Messenger and took the aggressive by being the first to assault you Do ye fear them Nay it is Allah Whom ye should more justly fear if ye believe!

eng: Will ye not fight people who violated their oaths plotted to expel the Messenger and took the aggressive by being the first to assault you Do ye fear them Nay it is Allah Whom ye should more justly fear if ye believe!
nupe: Kashi yea gun zana zhia kutizhiazhi leba na kuna ama kezhea kpa gan aga tuci nyan-dzun naa agama kayn dzun fi ye eti wun bo Soko tsa gwoyin na yea sundanu nao wuna yi mumini zhi ye yio na

eng: Do ye make the giving of drink to pilgrims or the maintenance of the Sacred Mosque equal to the pious service of those who believe in Allah and the Last Day and strive with might and main in the cause of Allah They are not comparable in the sight of Allah and Allah guides not those who do wrong

eng: Those who believe and suffer exile and strive with might and main in Allah´s cause with their goods and their persons have the highest rank in the sight of Allah they are the people who will achieve salvation

eng: Their Lord doth give them glad tidings of a Mercy from Himself of His good pleasure and of gardens for them wherein are delights that endure

nupe: Ya ye nazhia imani jin na! Ega la mimaezhi to ye gi ezhi masoyi zhi ma a beke aga cin cin laaya kafirinci ta eti imanio na Za eni ndondo miniebo na ga laa masoyi na to zawunci zhi aga yi azwalumi zhio

nupe: Gan cin  wuna yi gan ba ba ye zhi to egi ye zhi to yegi ye zhi to nyimi ye zhi ko eba yazhi to dangi ye zhi to dukiya nazhi ye kuyekan na to woce na ye sundan zunzunyana aga baye gan Soko to tuciu to kokari jin ta ekpa Soko-bo to eda zhi zhie har da kamina Sokogala umurni forondoci be na! Soko mae la jamaa yan fasiki zhi ke ekoa

eng: Assuredly Allah did help you in many battle-fields and on the day of Hunain Behold! your great numbers elated you but they availed you naught the land for all that it is wide did constrain you and ye turned back in retreat
nupe: Hakika Soko jin ye taimako danna nazhi dokun nao to Efo Hunaynu kamina ekundo ye fe ya ye shaawa na uma kunke yaye wo be yandondo yina gancin ma kin cia yiku yaye bana ugwo dakan na gan cin yecia zunma zheta fe lo

eng: Again will Allah after this turn in mercy to whom He will for Allah is Oft-forgiving Most Merciful
nupe: Gancin zunma wuncino Soko cia -- tuba yan zanaga bauna Soko ma Etsu gafara uyio Etsu yegun uyio

eng: O ye who believe! Truly the Pagans are unclean so let them not after this year of theirs approach the Sacred Mosque And if ye fear poverty soon will Allah enrich you if He wills out of His bounty for Allah is All-knowing All-wise
nupe: Ya ye nazhi imani jin na! Hakika mushirikizhi nazhie la yan pa Soko baci na Shikan ayio ebo acino aga kara ye ba masallaci Harami baci eyaa nanao ma Ye ma gae sundan talauci to beleyin Sokoa jin kunkunke yaye dagan mini arzikiubo uga bau na Hakika Soko Etsu kpikpe UyioEtsu hikima Uyio

eng: Fight those who believe not in Allah nor the Last Day nor hold that forbidden which hath been forbidden by Allah and His Messenger nor acknowledge the religion of Truth even if they are of the People of the Book until they pay the Jizya with willing submission and feel themselves subdued
nupe: E gun zanazhie jin imani be Soko yinana to be Efozoba yinana ekun amae la yan na Soko be Tuciu yin gaa lazhe haramu na haramua na amae jin adini yan gaskiya tsoa fi mini zanazhi ala litafi ya na har sai aga edu yan jizya ya be egwaayin ama laafe eza gbagbangizhi

eng: The Jews call ´Uzair a son of Allah and the Christians call Christ the son of Allah That is a saying from their mouth in this they but imitate what the unbelievers of old used to say Allah´s curse be on them how they are deluded away from the Truth!
nupe: Ya huduzhi ma gan uzairu egi Soko uyio Nasarazhi ma gan Masihu egi Soko uyi wuncin de eganuyio nae dagan be misunzhina Amae san Laana Soko kuti ta eti abo! Ki-ila acie pana ke eko guru lugwao

eng: They take their priests and their anchorites to be their lords in derogation of Allah and they take as their Lord Christ the son of Mary yet they were commanded to worship but One Allah there is no god but He Praise and glory to Him Far is He from having the partners they associate with Him
nupe: Yahuduzhi A man yanazhi la to Nasarazhi a man-yanazhi la tsocizhi baci Soko acia Masihu egi maryamu la acinga Ama jina umurni ndoci jina saide ajin bau taaya Tsoci Nini ke te gbuugi Ade Tsoci ndocia sai wyuny Lili maajin tabbata ya Soko ke yan nazhi e-la pau baci na lugwa

eng: Fain would they extinguish Allah´s light with their mouths but Allah will not allow but that His light should be perfected even though the Unbelievers may detest it
nupe: E-wa gan a la haske-Sokoa nua ya be missunzhi Soko mae navo sai de uga haske u gun-mi kaa da ma kafiri zhi ga navo na

eng: It is He Who hath sent His Messenger with guidance and the Religion of Truth to proclaim it over all religion even though the Pagans may detest it
